Tɩ Azezi dɩkɛ borborɩ banuu, la zũma bayi la gorge bɩsɛ saazuo pʋ'ʋsɛ Nawẽnnɛ, dee fiise borborɩ la bɔ a karẽnbiisi la yetɩ, ba pʋɩ nẽrba la, dee dɩkɛ zũma bayi la fiise bɔ ba wuu.
Tɩ ba wuu di tɩgɛ.
Tɩ a karẽnbiisi la vaagɛ borbor-gito, la zũn-gito n deege pɩrɛ pɩtɔ pia la ayi.
Nẽrba la n daan di dia la, bʋraasɩ de la tʋsanuu.
Bɛla poorʋm tɩ Azezi darɛ basɛ tɩ a karẽnbiisi la kẽ õorŋɔ dẽŋɛ ẽ dɔɔra mõgrɛ la doone ke bɔba, Betisayida tẽŋa bɔba. Dee tɩ a mẽŋa weege tɩ a keese nẽrba la.
La ẽn keese ba la, a sẽŋɛ la tãŋa zuo tɩ a ka pʋ'ʋsɛ.
Tɩ wẽnnɛ kẽ tɩ õorŋɔ la bɔna ko-kãtɛ la tẽŋasʋka, dee tɩ Azezi bɔna doone ẽŋa ayɩla mã'a.

Tɩ Azezi yẽ tɩ a karẽnbiisi la n mõnnɩ õorŋɔ la nãmsrɩ mɛ zozo'e, se'ere n soe la, kʋsebgo n vugri tʋ'ʋsra ba. Tɩ beere yɔna wiire, tɩ a sẽnna ko'om na zuo wɛ'ɛsa ba bɔba, bɔɔra tɩ a gãŋɛ ba tole.
La ban yẽ ẽn sẽnnɩ ko'om na zuo la, ba tẽ'esɛ tɩ a de la ki-isgne, tɩ ba kaasɛ tagursi.
Ba wuu yẽ ẽ mɛ, tɩ dabeem kẽ ba. Tɩ a darɛ yele ba yetɩ: «La de la mam, keŋe-ya ya sũure, da zoe-ya dabeem!»
Dee zom ba zẽ'am õorŋɔ la pʋam, tɩ kʋsebgo la go'oge. Tɩ karẽnbiisi la palẽŋa ẽkɛ, tɩ ba zɛ yɛrɩ, se'ere n soe la,
ba ka bãŋɛ borborɩ bõn-yãlma la võorɛ, ba pʋtẽ'era ka like.
Ba pãrgɛ mõgrɛ la dooge paagɛ la Zenezarɛtɩ, ze'ele mõgrɛ la nõorʋm.
La ban daan ze'ele õorŋɔ la pʋam dooge la, tɩ nẽrba la bãŋɛ Azezi tɔtɔ.
Tɩ ba zoe kẽ so'olʋm na wuu, tɩ ba zɛ bã'adõma ba bõn-gã'ala pʋam wa'am, bãma n wõm tɩ Azezi boe zẽ'e-sɛka la.

La Azezi daan sãn ẽn sẽŋɛ zẽ'e-sɛka woo, tẽn-kãra, la tẽn-pɩgsɩ, la yiɛ n boe kẽnkɛrsɩ la, ba tarɩ la bã'adõma sẽnna gã'ata da'asɩ pʋam, dee bɛlna ẽ yetɩ, a basɛ tɩ bã'adõma la kalʋm a fuugo nõorɛ mã'a. La sɛba wuu n daan kalʋm a fuugo la yẽ ĩmã'asʋm mɛ.
Farisi dõma, la lɔɔ karẽnsãandõma basɛba n ze'ele Zerizalɛm daan wa'am wa lagsɛ Azezi zẽ'am,
yẽ tɩ a karẽnbiisi la basɛba diti la nu'usi n ka ãn sõŋa, la boorɩ tɩ la yetɩ ba ka peege nu'usi wʋ Zifdõma sisgo n yetɩ ba ɩta se'em na.
Farisi dõma, la Zifdõma wuu sãn ka wobse nu'usi wʋ ba yaabdõma malŋɔ la, ba ka diti.
Ba sãn ze'ele da'am wa'am, ba wʋn peege ba mẽŋa mɛ dee di. La malŋɔ basɛba zozo'e tɩ ba ɩtɩ, la de la wama, la yɔa, la kuto laasɩ peere.
Tɩ Farisi dõma, la lɔɔ karẽnsãandõma la soke Azezi yetɩ: «Bẽm tɩ fõn karẽnbiisi la ka sakra tɩ yaabdõma malŋɔ la, dita dia la nu'usi n ka ãn sõŋa?»
Tɩ Azezi lerge ba yetɩ: «A'ezayi n yʋʋn to'oge Nawẽnnɛ yetɔga la tɔgɛ ya yelle la, a tarɩ bʋʋrɔ, yãma de la pʋlibsum dõma wʋ lan gʋlsɛ se'em na. La gʋlsɛ tɩ Nawẽnnɛ yetɩ:
‹Nẽr-bãna pẽgrɩ mam na nõorɛ yetɔga,
la ba sũure la zãagɛ la mam mɛ.
Ban nã'asrɩ mam na,
la de la zãŋa.
Se'ere n soe la, ba zãsnɩ la zãsŋɔ n de nẽrsaalba nõorɛ.›
Ya basɛ Nawẽnnɛ nõorɛ mɛ dee dɔla nẽrsaalba malŋɔ.»
Azezi le yele ba yetɩ: «Ya sɩrɩ zagsɛ Nawẽnnɛ lɔɔ mɛ, dee tɩ ya dɔla ya mẽŋa malŋɔ.
Amoyisi yʋʋn yetɩ: Nanna fʋ sɔ, la fʋ ma. Dee le yetɩ: Nẽr-sɛka sãn tɔgɛ a sɔ bɩɩ a ma be'em, dẽnɩ tɩ ba kʋ ẽ.
La yãma yetɩ: Nẽra sãn yele a sɔ, bɩɩ a ma yetɩ: Mam n tarɩ bõn-sɛba tɩ m sõŋɛ fʋ la de la ‹Kɔrbã›, (a võorɛ de la ‹Nawẽnnɛ bõnɔ›),
la ka le masɛ tɩ a ɩta sɛla bɔ'ɔra a sɔ, la a ma.
Yãma mẽŋa malŋɔ la tɩ ya zãsnɩ nẽrba la, botɩ ya basɛ tɩ Nawẽnnɛ yetɔga la dɛna la zãŋa. La bõnɔ zozo'e n wõm na bɛla tɩ ya ɩtɩ.»
La Azezi le wi la nẽr-kʋʋŋɔ, tɩ ba wa'am a zẽ'am, tɩ a yele ba yetɩ: «Yãma wuu, selse-ya mam sõŋa wõm a võorɛ.
Sɛla n ze'etɩ yẽŋa kẽ'erɩ nẽrsaala pʋʋrʋm ka tã wʋn botɩ a dɛna dẽgrɔ. Bõn-sɛka n ze'etɩ nẽrsaala pʋam yɛsra n botɩ a dɛna dẽgrɔ. [
Sɛka n wõm yetɔga wã, a selse sõŋa sõŋa.]»
La a daan ze'ele nẽrba la zẽ'am kẽ la deem. Tɩ a karẽnbiisi la soke ẽ makrɛ la võorɛ.
Tɩ a yele ba yetɩ: «Yãma yɛm mẽ ka like? Yãma ka bãŋɛ tɩ sɛla n ze'etɩ yẽŋa kẽ'era nẽrsaala pʋʋrʋm ka tã wʋn botɩ a dɛna dẽgrɔ?
Se'ere n soe la, bõn-bãma ka kẽ'erɩ sũure pʋam, ba kẽ'erɩ la pʋʋrɛ pʋam tɩ ba yẽ'era ba basra.» (Azezi n daan yele bɛla la, a boorɩ tɩ a yetɩ dia ka bɔ'ɔrɩ dẽgrɔ, nẽra tã wʋn di dia wuu mɛ.)
Dee daan le yetɩ: «La de la bõn-sɛka n ze'etɩ nẽrsaala pʋam yɛsra n botɩ a dɛna dẽgrɔ.
Se'ere n soe la, pʋtẽ'e-yooro ze'etɩ la nẽrsaala sũure pʋam botɩ a bɔɔra tɩ a ẽŋɛ be'em: yalsɩ, la nayigum, la nẽr-kʋa,

la taaba pɔgba la taaba sɩrba gã'a, la nẽra n nõŋɛ bõnɔ, la pʋtʋʋlgɔ, la yɛmkẽgsɩga, la tõon-dẽgrɔ, la nẽra n ɩtɩ sũure la a tadãana bõnɔ, la pɔ'ɔrɛ yetɔga, la pa'al-m-mẽŋa, la yalm-tõoma.
Bõn-be'ero bãna wuu ze'etɩ la nẽrsaala sũure pʋam botɩ a dɛna dẽgrɔ.»
Azezi daan ze'ele zẽ'e-ẽŋa sẽŋɛ la Tiiri so'olʋm ka kẽ yire pʋam, dee ka bɔɔra tɩ nẽra bãŋɛ tɩ ẽŋa boe bilam. La a daan ka tã'agɛ sʋgɛ.
Tɩ pɔka ayɩla tɩ kʋlkã'arga daan dolɩ a pɔyʋa, wõm Azezi yelle, sẽŋɛ ka ka dũma tẽŋa a nẽŋam,
sose ẽ yetɩ, a dige kʋlkã'arga la tɩ a yese dee basɛ a pɔyʋa la. Pɔka la daan de la Grɛkɩ, ba dɔgɛ ẽ na Fenisi tẽŋa n boe Siiri so'olʋm pʋam.
Tɩ Azezi lerge ẽ yetɩ: «Basɛ tɩ kɔma dẽŋɛ di tɩgɛ, se'ere n soe la, la ka masɛ tɩ ba dɩkɛ kɔma dia bɔ baasɩ.»
Tɩ pɔka la lerge ẽ yetɩ: «M Zuudãana, la de la sɩra, la baasɩ n boe ba dãana taablɩ tilum diti la kɔma di-zõra n luti la.»
Tɩ Azezi yele ẽ yetɩ: «Fõn lerge se'em wã ĩyã, kule, tɩ kʋlkã'arga la basɛ fʋ pɔyʋa la.»
Tɩ pɔka la daan lebe kule, la ẽn paagɛ yire la, a yẽ tɩ a pɔyʋa la gã la bõn-gã'ala pʋam, la kʋlkã'arga la sɩrɩ yese dee basɛ ẽ mɛ.
Azezi le ze'ele Tiiri so'olʋm doose la Sidõ, doose Dekapɔlɩ tẽnsɩ pʋam lebe Galile mõgrɛ la bɔba.
Tɩ ba tarɩ bʋraa n de waŋa, dee ka tãna tɔgra sõŋa wa'am a zẽ'am, wa belem ẽ yetɩ, a dɩkɛ a nu'ugo paglɛ waŋa la zuo.
Tɩ Azezi tarɩ ẽ nẽr-kʋʋŋɔ la pʋam yese kẽnkɛrŋa dɩkɛ a nu'ubiɛ tũm a tʋba pʋam, dee tʋbsɛ nõtõorʋm kalʋm bʋraa la zɩlɩŋa.
Dee gorge saazuo sĩ'im vo'ose fõo, dee yele bʋraa la yetɩ: «Efata», a võorɛ de la «yo'oge!»
Bilam mẽŋa tɩ bʋraa la tʋba yo'oge, tɩ a zɩlɩŋa lakɛ, tɩ a tɔgra sõŋa sõŋa.
Tɩ Azezi kã'an ba yetɩ, ba da tɔgɛ bɔ nẽra nẽra. La ẽn daan kã'an ba yetɩ, ba da tɔgɛ bɔ nẽra nẽra la, ba daan tõn tɔgra mɛ zozo'e.
Tɩ la di'ige ba zozo'e halɩ tɩ ba yɛta tɩ: «A ẽŋɛ sɛla woo la sõŋa, botɩ wansɩ wõnna, tɩ mugro tɔgra.»
Dabs-bãma pʋam nẽr-kʋʋŋɔ n daan le lagsɛ, tɩ dia ka bɔna tɩ ba wʋn di. Tɩ Azezi wi a karẽnbiisi la yele ba yetɩ:
«Nẽr-kʋʋŋɔ wã ninbãalga n tarɩ mam, se'ere n soe la, dabsa atã tɩ ba boe mam zẽ'am dee ka tara dia wʋn di.
Mam sãn basɛ ba tɩ ba kule ba yiɛ la kɔm, ba wʋn ka vibe mɛ sore, se'ere n soe la, basɛba ze'ele la zẽ'a n zãagɛ wa'am.»
Tɩ a karẽnbiisi la lerge ẽ yetɩ: «Tɩ wʋn ẽŋɛ la wãne tã'agɛ yẽ dia tɩ la seke nẽr-bãna wuu, zẽ'e-ẽna n de mõom wã?»
Tɩ Azezi soke ba yetɩ: «Yãma tarɩ la borborɩ balɛ?» Tɩ ba lerge yetɩ: «Bayopɔɩ.»
Tɩ a botɩ nẽrba la zĩ'ire tẽŋa. Dee dɩkɛ borborɩ bayopɔɩ la pʋ'ʋsɛ Nawẽnnɛ, dee fiise bɔ a karẽnbiisi la tɩ ba pʋɩ nẽrba la. Tɩ ba pʋɩ nẽr-kʋʋŋɔ la.
La ba daan tarɩ la zũn-pɩgsɩ mẽ fẽe. Tɩ Azezi pʋ'ʋsɛ Nawẽnnɛ zũma la ĩyã, dee botɩ a karẽnbiisi la dɩkɛ pʋɩ nẽrba la.
Tɩ nẽrba la daan di tɩgɛ. Dee tɩ a karẽnbiisi la vaagɛ dia n weege pɩrɛ pɩtɔ bayopɔɩ.
Nẽrba la n daan di dia la, bʋraasɩ de wʋ tʋsanaasɩ. Tɩ Azezi daan botɩ ba kule,
dee tɩ ẽŋa la a karẽnbiisi la kẽ õorŋɔ sẽŋɛ Dalmanuta so'olʋm.
Tɩ Farisi dõma daan wa'am wa wẽ'era nõke'ene la Azezi, yetɩ ba makɛ ẽ bɩsɛ, yele ẽ yetɩ, a botɩ bõn-yãlma ze'ele saazuo ẽŋɛ n pa'alɩ tɩ ẽŋa ze'ele la Nawẽnnɛ yire.
Tɩ Azezi sĩ'im vo'ose fõo, dee soke yetɩ: «Bẽm tɩ zamãana ẽna nẽrba ɛɛra bõn-yãlma? Mam yetɩ ya la sɩra, tɩ mam kãn botɩ bõn-yãlma n pa'alɛ bɛla ẽŋɛ tɩ zamãana ẽna yẽ.»
La Azezi basɛ ba mɛ dee le kẽ õorŋɔ dɔɔra mõgrɛ la doone ke bɔba.
Tɩ a karẽnbiisi la daan yĩm ka dɩkɛ borborɩ, sãn dagna borborɩ ayɩla mã'a tɩ ba tarɩ õorŋɔ la pʋam.
Tɩ Azezi kã'an ba yetɩ: «Guuse-ya ya mẽŋa la Farisi dõma, la naba A'erɔdɩ dãbɩllɛ la.»
Tɩ karẽnbiisi la tɔgra la taaba yetɩ: «Tõma n ka tarɩ borborɩ la ĩyã tɩ a yele bɛla.»
Tɩ Azezi daan bãŋɛ, soke ba yetɩ: «Bẽm tɩ ya tɔgra la taaba tɩ la de la yãma n ka tarɩ borborɩ la ĩyã? Yãma ka wõm a võorɛ? Yãma yɛm ka like?
Yãma tarɩ la nini dee ka yẽta? Ya tarɩ la tʋba dee ka wõnna? Yãma ka tẽrɩ?
Mam n daan fiise borborɩ banuu la bɔ bʋraasɩ tʋsanuu tɩ ba di la, borborɩ gito n deege la, pɩtɔ balɛ tɩ yãma daan vaagɛ?» Tɩ ba lerge ẽ yetɩ: «Pɩtɔ pia la ayi.» Tɩ a le soke ba yetɩ:
«La mam n daan fiise borborɩ bayopɔɩ la pʋɩ bʋraasɩ tʋsanaasɩ la, yãma daan vaagɛ sɛba n deege la pɩtɔ balɛ?» Tɩ ba lerge yetɩ: «Pɩtɔ bayopɔɩ.»
Tɩ a soke ba yetɩ: «Yãma nãn ka wõm a võorɛ?»
Azezi la a karẽnbiisi la daan sẽŋɛ la Betisayida. Tɩ ba tarɩ fʋa wa'am Azezi zẽ'am wa belem ẽ yetɩ a kalʋm ẽ.
Tɩ Azezi gʋrɛ fʋa la nu'ugo ve'ege ẽ tẽŋa la pʋam yese kẽnkɛrŋa, ka tʋbsɛ nõtõorʋm ẽŋɛ a nini, dee dɩkɛ a nu'usi paglɛ a zuo, soke ẽ yetɩ: «Fõn yẽtɩ sɛla mɛ bɩɩ?»
Tɩ bʋraa la dɔ'ɔgɛ zuugo bɩsɛ, yetɩ: «Mam yẽtɩ nẽrba tɩ ba ãna wʋ tɩɩsɩ la, la ba sẽnnɩ mɛ.»
Tɩ Azezi le dɩkɛ a nu'usi kalʋm fʋa la nini. Tɩ a nini pike yɩlɩŋɛ, tɩ a yẽta sɛla woo sõŋa sõŋa.
Tɩ Azezi basɛ ẽ yetɩ a kule, a da le kẽ tẽŋa la pʋam.
La Azezi la a karẽnbiisi la daan we'esɩ la tẽnsɩ n lɛm tẽŋa yʋ'ʋrɛ n de Filipi Sezaare. La ban boe sore wɛ'ɛsa la, tɩ a soke ba yetɩ: «Nẽrba yetɩ mam de la ãne?»

Tɩ ba lerge yetɩ: «Sɛba yetɩ fõn de la Azã n daan misri nẽrba ko'om pʋam na. Tɩ basɛba yetɩ fõn de la Nawẽnnɛ nõtɔ'ɔsa A'eli. Tɩ sɛba yetɩ fõn de la Nawẽnnɛ nõtɔ'ɔsrɩba n yʋʋn boe la nẽra ayɩla.»
Tɩ a soke ba yetɩ: «La yãma yetɩ mam de la ãne?» Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ lerge yetɩ: «Fõn de la Krisi tɩ Nawẽnnɛ tõm na.»
Tɩ Azezi kã'an ba yetɩ, ba da tɔgɛ ẽŋa yelle bɔ nẽra nẽra.

Tɩ Azezi yãŋa zãsna a karẽnbiisi la, yele ba yetɩ: «Dẽnɩ tɩ mam n de Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la nãmsɛ zozo'e. Tẽŋa wã kẽma, la kãabgɔ kẽma nẽŋadõma, la lɔɔ karẽnsãandõma nifo wʋn kẽ mam mɛ, tɩ ba kʋ mam, la dabsa atã daarɛ mam wʋn vo'oge mɛ.»
A daan tɔgɛ ba la vẽelga vẽelga. Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ wi ẽ yese kẽnkɛrŋa ka yele ẽ yetɩ, a da le tɔgɛ bɛla.
Tɩ Azezi gelge bɩsɛ a karẽnbiisi la, dee tãsɛ Apɩyɛɛrɩ yetɩ: «Asũtãana, sẽŋɛ lebe mam poorʋm, se'ere n soe la, fʋ tẽ'esgɔ la dagɩ Nawẽnnɛ tẽ'esgɔ, la de la nẽrsaala tẽ'esgɔ.»

Dee wi nẽr-kʋʋŋɔ la, la a karẽnbiisi la a zẽ'am, yele ba yetɩ: «Nẽra sãn bɔɔra tɩ a doose mam, dẽnɩ tɩ a basɛ a mẽŋa n boorɩ se'em, dee sakɛ nãmsgɔ daarɛ woo wʋ nẽra n buke a kũm dɔ-puurŋa dɔla mam.
Nẽr-sɛka woo n boorɩ tɩ a gu a vɔm, a wʋn koŋe ẽ. La nẽr-sɛka woo n sakɛ tɩ a koŋe a vɔm mam ĩyã, la kõ-yẽlga la ĩyã, a wʋn yẽ vɔm.
Nẽra sãn yẽ dũnia sɛla woo dee koŋe vɔm Nawẽnnɛ zẽ'am, a yõorɔ de la bẽm?
Bẽm tɩ nẽrsaala wʋn dɩkɛ teege vɔm? Sɛla kaɩ.

Nẽr-sɛka n zoe yãnnɛ mam ĩyã, la mam yetɔga la ĩyã, zamãana ẽna wã n ka dolɩ Nawẽnnɛ la sɩra, dee dɛna tõon-be'ero dõma wã tẽŋasʋka, Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la mẽ wʋn zoe yãnnɛ na ẽ, wakat-sɛka tɩ a wʋn leme wa'am la a Sɔ Nawẽnnɛ na'am pãŋa, la a malɛkadõma la.»
La a le yele ba yetɩ: «Mam yetɩ ya la sɩra, tɩ yãma nẽr-sɛba n boe kalam wã, basɛba kãn ki, sãn dagna tɩ ba wa yẽ la Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm n sẽm na pãŋa.»
Tɩ dabsa ayoobɩ daan tole, tɩ Azezi botɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ, la Azakɩ, la Azã mã'a doose ẽ tɩ ba sẽŋɛ kẽnkɛrŋa ka zom tãn-kãtɛ zuo. Tɩ a nẽŋa teege ba nẽŋam.
Tɩ a futo pelge yɩlɩ yɩlɩ yẽgra halɩ, tɩ nẽra ka bɔna dũnia wã zuo tãna wʋn peege tɩ ba pelge bɛla.
Tɩ A'eli, la Amoyisi puke ba zẽ'am tɔgra la Azezi.
Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ yele Azezi yetɩ: «Karẽnsãama, tõma n boe kalam wã, la ãn sõŋa mɛ. Basɛ tɩ tɩ tĩ põnsɩ batã, bɔ fõn ayɩla, bɔ Amoyisi ayɩla, bɔ A'eli ayɩla.»
A daan ka mi ẽŋa n tɔgɛ se'em, se'ere n soe la, dabeem n daan kẽ ba.
Tɩ sawatɛ wa'am wa lile ba la a mã'asʋm. Tɩ kõa ze'ele sawatɛ la pʋam yetɩ: «Ẽna de la mam Dayʋa tɩ mam nõŋɛ. Selse-ya a yetɔga.»
Bilam mẽŋa tɩ ba bɩsɛ kaagɛ ka le yẽ nẽra, sãn dagna Azezi mã'a n boe ba zẽ'am.
Tɩ ba ze'ele tãŋa la zuo sigra, tɩ Azezi kã'an ba yetɩ: «Da tɔgɛ-ya pa'alɛ nẽra nẽra yãma n yẽ sɛla la, sãn dagna tɩ Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la wa ki mɛ, dee vo'oge.»
Tɩ ba to'oge ẽn yele se'em na, dee sɔkra taaba yetɩ: «Kũm vo'ore võorɛ de la bẽm?»
Tɩ ba soke Azezi yetɩ: «Bẽm tɩ lɔɔ karẽnsãandõma yetɩ, dẽnɩ tɩ A'eli dẽŋɛ wa'am, tɩ Krisi yãŋa wa'am poorʋm?»
Tɩ a lerge ba yetɩ: «Asɩra, A'eli n wʋn dẽŋɛ wa'am wa malgɛ sɛla woo. La bẽm tɩ la gʋlsɛ Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la yelle yetɩ, a wʋn nãmsɛ mɛ zozo'e dee yẽ pɔ'ɔrɛ?
La mam yetɩ ya mɛ tɩ A'eli põn wa'am mɛ, tɩ nẽrba ẽŋɛ ẽ ban boorɩ se'em, wʋ lan gʋlsɛ a yelle Nawẽnnɛ gõŋɔ pʋam se'em na.»
Ban lebe ka lɛm karẽnbiisi basɛba la zẽ'am na, ba yẽ la nẽr-kʋʋŋɔ zozo'e n kaagɛ ba, tɩ lɔɔ karẽnsãandõma basɛba wẽ'era nõkɛ'ɛma la ba.
La nẽrba la n daan yẽ Azezi la, la di'ige ba mɛ, tɩ ba zoe ka pʋ'ʋsɛ ẽ.
Tɩ Azezi soke ba yetɩ: «Bẽm yelle tɩ yãma wẽ'era nõke'ene la ba?»
Tɩ nẽra ayɩla ze'ele nẽr-kʋʋŋɔ la tẽŋasʋka yele yetɩ: «Karẽnsãama, mam tarɩ la m dayʋa wa'am fõn zẽ'am, kʋlkã'arga n dolɩ ẽ botɩ a dɛna muko.

La kʋlkã'arga la sãn ẽn girge ẽ, a lʋbrɩ ẽ mɛ tɩ nõtõn-fulunfuka yɛsra, tɩ a ɔbra yẽna dee gorŋe. Bɛla tɩ mam tarɩ ẽ wa'am wa sose fʋ karẽnbiisi la yetɩ ba dige kʋlkã'arga la tɩ a yese, tɩ ba ka yãŋɛ.»
Tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: «Zamãan-ẽna nẽrba, ya ka bɔ'ɔrɩ mam sɩra, mam wʋn bɔna la yãma mã'agɛ m mẽŋa halɩ ka paagɛ la wakat-kãna? Tarɩ-ya bia la wa'am.»
Tɩ ba tarɩ ẽ wa'am a zẽ'am. La kʋlkã'arga la n yẽ Azezi la, bilam mẽŋa a dãan bia la mɛ, tɩ a lui tẽŋa bilna, tɩ nõtõn-fulunfuka yɛsra a nõorʋm.
Tɩ Azezi soke bia la sɔ yetɩ: «Wakat-kãna tɩ bõn-ẽna ẽŋɛ ẽ?» Tɩ a lerge yetɩ: «A bõnbɩ'ɩlʋm.
La kʋlkã'arga la ẽn lʋbɛ ẽ na bugum, bɩɩ ko'om pʋam, bɔɔra tɩ a kʋ ẽ. Fʋ sãn tãna wʋn ẽŋɛ sɛla, zoe tɩ ninbãalga sõŋɛ tɔ.»
Tɩ Azezi lerge ẽ yetɩ: «Bẽm tɩ fʋ yetɩ, fõn sãn tãna? Nẽr-sɛka woo n bɔ Nawẽnnɛ sɩra, a tã wʋn ẽŋɛ sɛla woo bɔ ẽ mɛ.»
Bilam mẽŋa tɩ bia la sɔ tɔgɛ ke'enke'em yetɩ: «Mam bɔ sɩra, la sõŋɛ mam tɩ m bɔ sɩra pa'asɛ.»
La Azezi daan yẽ tɩ nẽr-kʋʋŋɔ n zotɩ sẽna a zẽ'am, tɩ a tãsɛ kʋlkã'arga la yetɩ: «Kʋlkã'arga n botɩ nẽra dɛna muko la waŋa, mam yetɩ fʋ yese dee basɛ ẽ, da le doose ẽ.»
Tɩ kʋlkã'arga la kaasɛ tagurga, dee bigse bia la ke'enke'em, dee yese. Tɩ bia la ãna wʋ kũm na. Tɩ nẽrba zozo'e yetɩ a ki mɛ.
Tɩ Azezi gʋrɛ a nu'ugo zẽkɛ ẽ, tɩ a isge ze'ele saazuo.
La Azezi daan kẽ la deem, ẽŋa la a karẽnbiisi la mã'a, tɩ ba soke ẽ yetɩ: «Bẽm tɩ tõma ka tã'agɛ dige kʋlkã'ar-ẽna?»
Tɩ a lerge ba yetɩ: «Sãn dagna pʋ'ʋsgɔ, sɛla sɛla ka boe n tã wʋn dige kʋlkã'ar-ẽna buuri.»
La ba daan yese bilam doose la Galile tẽŋa tole. La Azezi daan ka boorɩ tɩ nẽra bãŋɛ ẽŋa n boe zẽ'a.
A daan zãsʋm a karẽnbiisi la yetɩ: «Ba wʋn dɩkɛ Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la ẽŋɛ la nẽrba nu'usum, tɩ ba kʋ ẽ. La ba sãn kʋ ẽ, dabsa atã daarɛ a wʋn vo'oge mɛ.»
Tɩ ba daan ka bãŋɛ yetɔga la võorɛ, dee zɔta ka soke ẽ.
Tɩ ba sẽŋɛ ka paagɛ Kapɛrnaʋm kẽ deem. Tɩ Azezi soke a karẽnbiisi la yetɩ: «Bẽm yelle tɩ yãma wẽ'erɩ nɩ nõke'ene sore zuo la?»
Tɩ ba sĩna, se'ere n soe la, ba wẽ'erɩ la nõke'ene la taaba bɔɔra tɩ ba bãŋɛ sɛka n de nẽr-kãtɛ gãnna.
Tɩ Azezi zĩ'ire, wi a karẽnbiisi pia la ayi la yele ba yetɩ: «Nẽra sãn bɔɔra tɩ a dɛna nẽŋadãana, dẽnɩ tɩ a dɛna poorʋm dãana, la nẽrba wuu tõntõnna.»
Azezi yele bɛla dee tarɩ la bi-pɩka wa ze'ele ba tẽŋasʋka, dɩkɛ a nu'usi kɔkɛ bia la, dee yele ba yetɩ:
«Nẽra sãn to'oge bi-pɩka ẽna tadãana mam yʋ'ʋrɛ ĩyã, a to'oge la mam mẽŋa, la nẽra sãn to'oge mam mẽŋa, la dagɩ mam tɩ a to'oge, a to'oge la sɛka n tõm mam na.»
Tɩ Azã yele ẽ yetɩ: «Karẽnsãama, tõma daan yẽ la bʋraa n tarɩ fõn yʋ'ʋrɛ digra kʋlkã'arsɩ, la ẽŋa n ka po dɛna tõma nẽra la ĩyã tɩ tõma gu ẽ.»
Tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: «Da gu-ya ẽ, se'ere n soe la, nẽra ka boe wʋn tõm tõon-yãlma la mam yʋ'ʋrɛ, dee tɩ la ẽŋɛ fẽe tɩ a le tã'agɛ tɔgɛ mam be'em.
Nẽr-sɛka n ka sisri tõma, a de la tõma nẽra.
Mam yetɩ ya la asɩra, tɩ nẽra sãn bɔ ya ko'om tɩ ya yũ, yãma n de mam n de Krisi nẽrba la ĩyã, ẽŋa dãana kãn koŋe a yɔɔrɔ.
La nẽra sãn botɩ kɔm-pɩgsɩ bãna wã n bɔ mam sɩra la ayɩla basɛ Nawẽnnɛ sore, sɩbgrɛ sɛka tɩ a wʋn yẽ la, ba sãn dɩkɛ nẽerɛ kug-kãtɛ lʋ yulse a yugla lobe ẽ basɛ ko-kãtɛ pʋam n sõɩ.
La fʋ nu'ugo sãn yetɩ a botɩ fʋ basɛ Nawẽnnɛ sore, fʋ wike ẽ basɛ, se'ere n soe la, fʋ sãn tara nu'u-yẽŋɔ dee kẽ Nawẽnnɛ yire vɔa, n sõɩ fõn wʋn tara nu'usi bayi dee kẽ bug-tẽŋa, [
zẽ'e-ẽŋa tɩ zũnzũa boe mĩ dita nẽrba ĩyã ka kiira, dee tɩ bugum na ka kĩŋra.]

La fʋ nã'arɛ sãn yetɩ a botɩ fʋ basɛ Nawẽnnɛ sore, fʋ wike ẽ basɛ, se'ere n soe la, fʋ sãn tara nã'a-yẽŋɔ dee kẽ Nawẽnnɛ yire vɔa, n sõɩ fõn wʋn tara nãma bayi dee tɩ ba dɩkɛ fʋ lobe basɛ bug-tẽŋa, [
zẽ'e-ẽŋa tɩ zũnzũa boe mĩ dita nẽrba ĩyã ka kiira, dee tɩ bugum na ka kĩŋra.]
La fʋ nifo sãn yetɩ a botɩ fʋ basɛ Nawẽnnɛ sore, fʋ kɩrgɛ ẽ basɛ, se'ere n soe la, fʋ sãn tara nin-yẽŋɔ dee kẽ Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm, n sõɩ fõn wʋn tara nini bayi dee tɩ ba lobe fʋ basɛ bug-tẽŋa,
zẽ'e-ẽŋa tɩ zũnzũa boe mĩ dita nẽrba ĩyã ka kiira, dee tɩ bugum na ka kĩŋra.
Ba wʋn dɩkɛ la bugum makɛ nẽrba wuu wʋ ban dɩkɛ yaarʋm yugse sɛla.
Yaarʋm ãn sõŋa mɛ, la yaarʋm sãn sabgɛ, ba wʋn ẽŋɛ la wãne botɩ a le ãna yẽlʋm?
Ãna-ya wʋ yaarʋm n tarɩ yẽlʋm se'em na, dee tara sũ-mã'asʋm la taaba.»
La Azezi daan ze'ele zẽ'e-ẽŋa sẽŋɛ la Zude so'olʋm, Zʋrdẽ doone ke bɔba. Tɩ nẽrba zozo'e le lagsɛ a zẽ'am, tɩ a zãsna ba wʋ ẽŋa n ẽn ɩta se'em na.
Tɩ Farisi dõma basɛba wa'am tɩ ba di a yɛm bɩsɛ, soke ẽ yetɩ: «Bʋraa tarɩ nõorɛ tɩ a lebse a pɔga mɛ bɩɩ?»
Tɩ a lebe soke ba yetɩ: «Amoyisi yʋʋn bɔ ya nõorɛ yetɩ bẽm?»
Tɩ ba lerge yetɩ: «Amoyisi yʋʋn sakɛ tɩ tɩ gʋlsɛ la pɔgdire lebsgo gõŋɔ, dee tarɩ ẽ ka lebse.»
Tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: «La de la ya sũure n kɛ tɩ ya ka sakɛ pa'algɔ la ĩyã tɩ Amoyisi yʋʋn gʋlsɛ nõor-ẽŋa bɔ ya.
La halɩ dũnia pĩ'iluŋo, Nawẽnnɛ n yʋʋn nãam nẽrsaalba la, a nãam la bʋraa la pɔka.
Bɛla ĩyã tɩ bʋraa wʋn basɛ a sɔ, la a ma, dee lagɩm na a pɔga.
La ba ka le dɛna bayi, ba lebge la ayɩla.
Bɛla, sɛla tɩ Nawẽnnɛ lagɩm na taaba, nẽrsaala da welge ba.»
La Azezi la a karẽnbiisi la kẽ la deem, tɩ ba le soke ẽ yelle ẽŋa võorɛ.
Tɩ a yele ba yetɩ: «Bʋraa sãn lebse a pɔga dee di pɔka ayẽma, a ẽŋɛ la be'em wʋ nẽra n gã'arɩ la a tadãana pɔga.
La pɔka mẽ sãn basɛ a sɩra dee ele bʋraa ayẽma, a mẽ ẽŋɛ la be'em wʋ a gã'arɛ la bʋraa n dagɩ a sɩra.»
Tɩ nẽrba zozo'e tarɩ kɔm-pɩgsɩ wa'am Azezi zẽ'am tɩ a dɩkɛ a nu'usi paglɛ ba zuto. Tɩ a karẽnbiisi la zɛbɛ nẽrba la.

La Azezi n yẽ bɛla la, la ka ẽŋɛ a sũure yẽlʋm, tɩ a yele ba yetɩ: «Basɛ-ya kɔm-pɩgsɩ la tɩ ba wa'am mam zẽ'am, da gu'ura-ya ba, se'ere n soe la, Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm de la nẽr-sɛba n ãn wʋ kɔma wã bõnɔ.
Mam yetɩ ya la sɩra, tɩ nẽr-sɛka n ka sakɛ tɩ Nawẽnnɛ sɔna ẽ wʋ bia la, a kãn kẽ Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm pʋam.»
A yele bɛla, dee to'ose kɔma la mɛ, dɩkɛ a nu'usi paglɛ ba zuto kã kã'a-sõma bɔ ba.
Azezi daan basɛ bilam dee le dɩkɛ la sore sẽnna. Tɩ bʋraa zoe wa'am a zẽ'am, wa ka dũma a nẽŋam soke ẽ yetɩ: «Karẽnsãama, fõn de la nẽr-sõŋɔ, mam wʋn ẽŋɛ la wãne yẽ vɔm n ka ba'asrɩ?»
Tɩ Azezi yele ẽ yetɩ: «Bẽm tɩ fõn wi'ira mam tɩ nẽr-sõŋɔ? Nẽra ka boe n ãn sõŋa sãn dagna Nawẽnnɛ mã'a.
Fõn mi Nawẽnnɛ n bɔ nõorɛ tɩ ba ɩta se'em: ‹Da kʋ nẽra, da gã'arɛ la fʋ tadãana pɔga, da zũ, da tɔgɛ põmpɔrŋɔ kaseto, da wẽgɛ nẽra, nanna fʋ sɔ, la fʋ ma.› »
Tɩ bʋraa la lerge ẽ yetɩ: «Karẽnsãama, halɩ mam bõnbɩ'ɩlʋm tɩ mam põn sakra bõn-bãma wuu.»

Tɩ Azezi bɩsɛ ẽ nõŋɛ ẽ, dee yele ẽ yetɩ: «Sɛla ayɩla n deege dɛna fʋ ẽŋɛ: Sẽŋɛ ka koose fõn tarɩ sɛla la wuu dɩkɛ ligri la bɔ nasdõma, tɩ fʋ wʋn yẽ bõntarsõm Nawẽnnɛ yire, dee wa'am wa dɔla mam.»
La ẽn wõm wãna la, tɩ a nẽŋa zũŋe tɩ a fõrgɛ la sũ-sã'aŋɔ, se'ere n soe la, a tarɩ la bõntarsõm zo'oge.
Tɩ Azezi bɩsɛ a karẽnbiisi la kaagɛ, dee yele ba yetɩ: «La tɔ mɛ bɔ bõntatba tɩ ba kẽ Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm pʋam.»
Tɩ a yetɔga la di'ige a karẽnbiisi la. Tɩ Azezi le yele ba yetɩ: «M kɔma, la tɔ mɛ tɩ nẽra kẽ Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm pʋam.
La de la nãana tɩ yʋgnɛ doose fupĩim yoko pʋam yese, gãnna bõntarsa n wʋn kẽ Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm pʋam.»
Tɩ la di'ige ba halɩ zozo'e, tɩ ba sɔkra taaba yetɩ: «La sãn dɛna bɛla, ãne n wʋn tã'agɛ yẽ fãarɛ?»
Tɩ Azezi bɩsra ba dee yetɩ: «Nẽrsaala ka tã wʋn ẽŋɛ bõn-ẽna, la Nawẽnnɛ tã wʋn ẽŋɛ mɛ. Se'ere n soe la, Nawẽnnɛ tã sɛla woo ɩta mɛ.»
Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ yele ẽ yetɩ: «Tõma basɛ sɛla woo mɛ dee dɔla fõn.»
Tɩ Azezi yele yetɩ: «Mam yetɩ ya la sɩra, tɩ nẽr-sɛka n basɛ a yire, bɩɩ a kẽendõma, la a yɩbsɩ, bɩɩ a ma, bɩɩ a sɔ, bɩɩ a kɔma, bɩɩ a vatɔ mam ĩyã, la Nawẽnnɛ kõ-yẽlga la ĩyã,
dũnia wã zuo a wʋn to'oge yiɛ, la kẽendõma, la yɩbsɩ, la madõma, la kɔma, la vatɔ nõor-kɔbga, la a wʋn yẽ nãmsgɔ. La wakatɛ n sẽm, a wʋn yẽ vɔm n ka ba'asrɩ.
La nẽŋam dõma zozo'e wʋn lebge poorʋm dõma, tɩ poorʋm dõma lebge nẽŋam dõma.»

Ba daan boe la sore wɛ'ɛsa Zerizalɛm, tɩ Azezi bɔna ba nẽŋa. Tɩ a karẽnbiisi la palẽŋa ẽgra, dee tɩ dabeem tara nẽr-sɛba n daan dolɩ ba la. Tɩ Azezi le tarɩ a karẽnbiisi pia la ayi la sẽŋɛ ka tɔgra pa'ala ba bõn-sɛba n wʋn wa ẽŋɛ ẽŋa,

yetɩ: «Ya yẽ ya, tɩ we'esɩ la Zerizalɛm, bilam tɩ ba wʋn dɩkɛ Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la ka ẽŋɛ Nawẽnnɛ kãabgɔ kẽma nẽŋadõma, la lɔɔ karẽnsãandõma nu'usum. Tɩ ba wʋn tɔgɛ a yelle kʋ yetɩ a masɛ la kũm, dɩkɛ ẽ ẽŋɛ bu-zãŋsɩ nu'usum,
tɩ ba la ẽ, dee tʋbsɛ nõtõorʋm mĩ ẽ, wẽ ẽ na ka'asa dee kʋ ẽ. La a wʋn vo'oge dabsa atã daarɛ.»
Tɩ Azebede kɔma Azakɩ la Azã sẽŋɛ lɛm Azezi yele ẽ yetɩ: «Karẽnsãama, tõma boorɩ la tõma n wʋn sose fõn bõn-sɛka la, fʋ ẽŋɛ bɔ tɔ.»
Tɩ a soke ba yetɩ: «Yãma boorɩ tɩ m ẽŋɛ la bẽm bɔ ya?»
Tɩ ba lerge ẽ yetɩ: «Fʋ sãn wa dita fʋ na'am na, botɩ tõma nẽra ayɩla zĩ'ire fʋ zʋʋgɔ, tɩ ayɩla zĩ'ire fʋ gɔbga.»
Tɩ Azezi lerge ba yetɩ: «Ya ka mi yãma n sosrɩ sɛla. Ya wʋn tã'agɛ nãmsɛ nãmsgɔ sɛka tɩ mam nãmsrɩ wã, bɩɩ ya wʋn tã'agɛ nãmsɛ wʋ mam n sakɛ tɩ m nãmsɛ se'em na halɩ ka ki?»
Tɩ ba yele ẽ yetɩ: «Tɩ wʋn tã'agɛ ẽŋɛ bɛla.» Tɩ Azezi lebe yele ba yetɩ: «Asɩra, ya wʋn nãmsɛ nãmsgɔ sɛka tɩ mam nãmsrɩ wã halɩ ka ki.
La, la dagɩ mam n wʋn looge sɛka n wʋn zĩ'ire mam zʋʋgɔ bɩɩ mam gɔbga. Nawẽnnɛ mãasʋm zẽ'e-bãma tɩ a bɔ la nẽr-sɛba tɩ a yetɩ a bɔ la.»
La karẽnbiisi pia la n wõm bɛla la, ba sũure n isge la Azakɩ la Azã.
Tɩ Azezi wi ba wuu, yele ba yetɩ: «Ya mi tɩ dũnia wã na'adõma soe ba nẽrba la pãŋa, dee tɩ kɛ'ɛndõma pẽrgra nẽrba tɩ ba ɩta bãma n boorɩ se'em.
La yãma pʋam, la kãn dɛna bɛla. Nẽr-sɛka n boe ya pʋam bɔɔra tɩ a lebge nẽr-keko, la masɛ mɛ tɩ a dɛna ya tõntõnna.
La nẽr-sɛka n boorɩ tɩ a dɛna nẽŋadãana ya pʋam, la masɛ mɛ tɩ a dɛna ya wuu yamŋa.
Se'ere n soe la, Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la ka wa'am tɩ nẽrba tõm bɔ ẽ, a wa'am tɩ a tõm mɛ bɔ, dee dɩkɛ a vɔm bɔ tɩ nẽrba zozo'e yẽ fãarɛ.»

Azezi la a karẽnbiisi la daan sẽŋɛ ka paagɛ dɔla la Zeriko tẽŋa pʋam tɔlla, la ban daan ze'ele tẽŋa la pʋam yɛsra la, nẽr-kʋʋŋɔ n dolɩ ba. Tɩ fʋa zẽa sore nõorʋm sɔsra, a yʋ'ʋrɛ de la Abartime, a de la Atime dayʋa.
La ẽn wõm tɩ ba tɔgrɩ tɩ la de la Azezi n ze'ele Nazarɛtɩ la, tɩ a tĩi tɔgra yetɩ: «Azezi, Adavidi yɩɩŋa, zoe m ninbãalga.»
Tɩ nẽrba zozo'e tãsɛ ẽ yetɩ: «Go'oge fʋ yetɔga la.» Tɩ a malɩn tĩi tɔgɛ yetɩ: «Adavidi yɩɩŋa, zoe m ninbãalga.»
Tɩ Azezi ze'ele dee yetɩ: «Wi-ya ẽ tɩ a wa'am.» Tɩ ba wi ẽ yele ẽ yetɩ: «Keŋe fʋ sũure, isge tɩ a wi'iri fo.»
Tɩ a lobe a fugɔbga basɛ, dee vaa isge sẽŋɛ Azezi zẽ'am.
Tɩ Azezi soke ẽ yetɩ: «Fõn boorɩ tɩ m ẽŋɛ la bẽm bɔ fɔ?» Tɩ a yetɩ: «M Zuudãana, mam boorɩ tɩ m le yẽta mɛ.»
Tɩ Azezi yele ẽ yetɩ: «Sẽŋɛ, fõn bɔ mam sɩra la ĩyã tɩ fʋ yẽ laafɛ.» Tɩ fʋa la yẽta bilam mẽŋa, dɔla Azezi sore la zuo.
Azezi la a karẽnbiisi la daan sẽŋɛ ka yɔna la Zerizalɛm, lɛm Betɩfaazɩ la Betani, Oliivi tãŋa la zẽ'am. Tɩ a tõm a karẽnbiisi bayi,
yele ba yetɩ: «Sẽŋɛ-ya tẽn-sɛka n boe ya nẽŋa la pʋam. Ya sãn paagɛ mĩ, ya wʋn yẽ bõn-biire tɩ ba lʋ ze'ele, tɩ nẽra nãn ka bã ẽ. Ya lorge ẽ tarɩ wa'am.
La nẽra sãn soke ya yetɩ: ‹Wãne tɩ ya lɔrgra ẽ?›, ya lerge ẽ yetɩ: ‹Zuudãana la n boorɩ ẽ›, tɩ a wʋn basɛ tɩ ya tarɩ ẽ leme wa'am tɔtɔ.»
Tɩ ba sẽŋɛ ka yẽ bõn-biire la n lʋ zanõrʋm sore nõorʋm, tɩ ba lorge ẽ.
La nẽrba basɛba n daan ze bilam soke ba yetɩ: «Wãne tɩ yãma lɔrgra bõn-biire la?»
Tɩ ba lerge wʋ Azezi n yele ba se'em na, tɩ nẽrba la basɛ ba.
Tɩ ba tarɩ bõn-biire la sẽŋɛ Azezi zẽ'am, ka dɩkɛ ba futo paglɛ a zuo, tɩ Azezi bã.
Tɩ nẽrba zozo'e yɛrgɛ ba futo sore zuo, tɩ basɛba sẽŋɛ va'am ka kɔ võorɔ wa yɛrgɛ sore zuo.
Tɩ nẽr-sɛba n boe a nẽŋa, la sɛba n boe a poorʋm na daan tĩi tɔgra yetɩ:
«Ozaana! Pẽgɛ-ya nẽr-sɛka n sẽm
la Zuudãana Nawẽnnɛ yʋ'ʋrɛ la.
Pẽgɛ-ya nẽr-sɛka n sẽm tɩ a di tɩ yaaba Adavidi na'am na.
Ozaana! Nã'asɛ-ya Nawẽnnɛ n boe saazuum.»
Tɩ Azezi paagɛ Zerizalɛm kẽ Wẽnde-kãtʋm na bɩsɛ sɛla woo kaagɛ. Tɩ wẽnnɛ mã'agɛ, tɩ ẽŋa la a karẽnbiisi pia la ayi la yese sẽŋɛ Betani.
Tɩ beere wiige, tɩ ba ze'ele Betani lɛbra Zerizalɛm, tɩ Azezi kɔm dõnna.

Tɩ a yẽ kẽnkãŋa n ze zãazãarɛ tara võorɔ, tɩ a sẽŋɛ tɩ a ka bɩsɛ a na'an wʋn yẽ sɛla kẽnkãŋa la zuo. La ẽn paagɛ la, a ka yẽ sɛla a zuo, a yẽ la võorɔ mã'a. Se'ere n soe la, kẽnkãma wakatɛ daan nãn ka paagɛ.
Tɩ Azezi yele kẽnkãŋa la yetɩ: «Nẽra kãn le malɩn di fʋ biɛ.» Tɩ a karẽnbiisi la wõm.

Tɩ ba paagɛ Zerizalɛm, tɩ Azezi kẽ Wẽnde-kãtɛ la zẽnzakam digra nẽr-sɛba n koosrɩ, la sɛba n da'arɩ Wẽndeem na tɩ ba yɛsra. Dee zã'agɛ lig-tɛɛrba taablɩdõma, la sɛba n koosrɩ na'adawɛma la kʋgsɩ lʋbɛ.
La a daan ka sakɛ tɩ nẽra zɛɛra sɛla dɔla Wẽnde-kãtɛ la zẽnzakam.
Dee daan zãsna nẽrba la yetɩ: «La gʋlsɛ Nawẽnnɛ gõŋɔ pʋam tɩ Nawẽnnɛ yetɩ: ‹Ba wʋn wi'ira mam deego la tɩ pʋ'ʋsgɔ deego buuri wuu ĩyã.› La yãma dɩkɛ ẽ ẽŋɛ la nayigba lagsgɔ zẽ'a.»
Tɩ Nawẽnnɛ kãabgɔ kẽma nẽŋadõma, la lɔɔ karẽnsãandõma wõm bɛla, ɛɛra bãma n wʋn ẽŋɛ se'em kʋ ẽ, la ba zotɩ ẽ mɛ, se'ere n soe la, a zãsŋɔ la daan kẽ nẽr-kʋʋŋɔ la sũure mɛ zozo'e.
Tɩ zaanõorɛ daan mã'agɛ, tɩ Azezi la a karẽnbiisi yese tẽŋa la pʋam.
Tɩ bulika yʋ'ʋŋɔ yʋ'ʋŋɔ tɩ ba dɔla sore la, yẽ kẽnkãŋa la n kʋɩ la yẽga wuu.
Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ tẽegɛ lan ẽŋɛ se'em na, yele Azezi yetɩ: «Karẽnsãama, bɩsɛ, kẽnkãŋa la tɩ fʋ kã be'em bɔ ẽ na kʋɩ mɛ.»
Tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: «Bɔ-ya Nawẽnnɛ sɩra.
Mam yetɩ ya la asɩra, tɩ nẽra sãn yele tãn-ẽna yetɩ: ‹Võogɛ ka lui mõgrɛ pʋam›, dee bɔ sɩra a sũure pʋam tɩ ẽŋa n yele se'em na wʋn ẽŋɛ, dee ka sẽ'ena, la wʋn sɩrɩ ẽŋɛ.
Bɛla tɩ mam yetɩ, ya sãn pʋ'ʋsra Nawẽnnɛ sɔsra sɛla, bɔ-ya Nawẽnnɛ sɩra tɩ ya to'oge ya, tɩ ya wʋn sɩrɩ to'oge.
La ya sãn bɔna mĩ pʋ'ʋsra Nawẽnnɛ, ya sãn tara yelle la nẽra, basɛ-ya ẽ taalɛ, tɩ ya Sɔ Nawẽnnɛ n boe saazuum mẽ basɛ ya tõon-be'ero taalɛ. [
Yãma sãn ka basɛ nẽr-sɛba n ẽŋɛ ya be'em na taalɛ, ya Sɔ Nawẽnnɛ n boe saazuum mẽ kãn basɛ ya tõon-be'ero taalɛ.]»
Azezi la a karẽnbiisi la le sẽŋɛ la Zerizalɛm, tɩ Azezi kẽ Wẽnde-kãtʋm na ɛɛra. Tɩ kãabgɔ kẽma nẽŋadõma, la lɔɔ karẽnsãandõma, la tẽŋa la kẽma sẽŋɛ a zẽ'am,
ka soke ẽ yetɩ: «Fõn yẽ nõorɛ la bɛ ɩta bõn-bãna? Bɩɩ ãne n bɔ fõn nõorɛ tɩ fõn ɩta bõn-bãna?»
Tɩ Azezi lerge ba yetɩ: «Mam wʋn soke ya sokre ayɩla, tɩ ya sãn lerge mam, mam mẽ wʋn yele ya nõor-sɛka tɩ mam tarɩ ɩta bõn-bãna.
Azã n daan misri nẽrba ko'om pʋam na, la de la Nawẽnnɛ n tõm ẽ bɩɩ, la de la nẽrsaalba? Lerge-ya ma.»
Tɩ ba bãm na taaba yetɩ: «Tɩ sãn lerge yetɩ, la de la Nawẽnnɛ n tõm ẽ, a wʋn yetɩ, bẽm ĩyã tɩ tõma ka sakɛ ẽ?
Tɩ mẽ kãn tã'agɛ yetɩ la de la nẽrsaalba n tõm ẽ.» Ba daan zotɩ la nẽrba la, se'ere n soe la, nẽrba la wuu daan sakɛ tɩ Azã sɩrɩ de la Nawẽnnɛ nõtɔ'ɔsa.
Tɩ ba koŋe lerge ẽ yetɩ: «Tõma ka mi.» Tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: «Mam mẽ kãn yele ya mam n yẽ nõorɛ zẽ'e-sɛka ɩta bõn-bãma.»

Bɛla poorʋm, Azezi daan magsrɩ la magsa tɔgra bɔ'ɔra ba yetɩ: «Bʋraa ayɩla n daan kɔ a va'am sele tɩɩsɩ yʋ'ʋrɛ n de viinye, mẽ lalga kaagɛ ẽ, dee tũ boko tɩ ba wẽkra viinye la biɛ, dee mẽ de-woko tɩ ba zɔnna bɩsra a va'am na, yãŋa dɩkɛ va'am na bɔ nẽrba tɩ ba bɩsra, dee sẽŋɛ sore.
Tɩ viinye la biɛ go'osgo wakatɛ paagɛ, tɩ a tõm a tõntõnna tɩ a sẽŋɛ sɛba n bɩsrɩ va'am na zẽ'am ka to'oge a pʋrɛ wa'am wa bɔ ẽ.
Tɩ ba yõkɛ tõntõnna la wẽ, botɩ a lebe kule zãŋa.
Tɩ va'am na dãana le tõm nẽra ayɩla ba zẽ'am, tɩ ba wẽ a zuugo ãagɛ, dee yaalɛ ẽ.
Tɩ a le malɩn tõm nẽra ayɩla, tɩ ba kʋ ẽ. Tɩ a tõm nẽrba zozo'e, tɩ ba wẽ basɛba, dee kʋ basɛba.
La nẽra ayɩla mã'a n daan deege tɩ a tãna wʋn tõm, la de la a bi-nõŋrɛ. Tɩ a daan tõm ẽ sɛba n bɩsrɩ va'am na zẽ'am, dee tẽ'esra yetɩ: ‹Ẽna n de mam dayʋa la, ba wʋn nan ẽ.›
Tɩ sɛba n bɩsrɩ va'am na yele taaba yetɩ: ‹Ẽna n wʋn wa sɔɔgɛ sɔna a sɔ bõntarsõm na, basɛ-ya tɩ tɩ kʋ ẽ, tɩ bõntarsõm na lebge tõma bõnɔ.›
Tɩ ba yõkɛ ẽ kʋ, tarɩ ẽ yese va'am na kẽnkɛrŋa ka basɛ.
Bɛla, va'am na dãana yãŋa wʋn ẽŋɛ la wãne? A wʋn wa'am wa kʋ sɛba n bɩsrɩ va'am na mɛ, dee to'oge va'am na bɔ basɛba.
Yãma põn karẽŋɛ Nawẽnnɛ gõŋɔ zẽ'e-sɛka n gʋlsɛ yetɩ:
‹Kug-sɛka tɩ tõnmẽtba zagsɛ la
n lebge kugre n botɩ deego la tara pãŋa.
La de la Zuudãana Nawẽnnɛ n ẽŋɛ bõn-ẽna,
tɩ la dɛna yel-di'iŋa bɔ tõma.› »
Tɩ Zifdõma nẽŋadõma la daan ɛɛra tɩ ba yõkɛ Azezi, se'ere n soe la, ba mi tɩ la de la bãma ĩyã tɩ a makɛ makrɛ ẽŋa, la ba daan zotɩ la nẽrba la, tɩ ba basɛ ẽ dee fõrgɛ.
Tɩ ba tõm Farisi dõma basɛba, la naba A'erɔdɩ nẽrba basɛba, tɩ ba sẽŋɛ ka soke Azezi sokre tɩ a tɔgɛ tuuge tɩ ba yẽ sore yõkɛ ẽ.

Tɩ ba wa'am wa yele ẽ yetɩ: «Karẽnsãama, tõma mi tɩ fõn de la sɩra dãana, dee ka fabla nẽrba n tɔgrɩ fõn yelle se'em na, fõn ka tũ'usri nẽrba, la fõn zãsnɩ nẽrba Nawẽnnɛ sore yɛla la sɩra. Tõma yetɩ tɩ soke bɩsɛ, sore boe tɩ tɩ yɔ lampo bɔ Rom na-keko bɩɩ, sore ka boe? Tɩ yɔ bɩɩ tɩ da yɔ?»
Tɩ Azezi bãŋɛ tɩ ba boorɩ tɩ ba bẽrɛ ẽŋa mɛ, soke ba yetɩ: «Bẽm tɩ ya bẽta ma? Tarɩ-ya lagfɔ wa'am tɩ m bɩsɛ.»
Tɩ ba tarɩ lagfɔ la wa'am wa bɔ ẽ. Tɩ Azezi soke ba yetɩ: «Ãne yinyisŋa, la ãne yʋ'ʋrɛ n gʋlsɛ a zuo?» Tɩ ba lerge yetɩ: «La de la Rom na-keko la.»
Tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: «Bɔ-ya na-keko la ẽŋa n soe bõn-sɛka, dee bɔ Nawẽnnɛ ẽn soe bõn-sɛka.» Tɩ Azezi yetɔga la di'ige ba.
Saduse dõma n yetɩ nẽra sãn ki a kãn vo'oge la, bãma nẽrba basɛba n wa'am Azezi zẽ'am wa soke ẽ yetɩ:
«Karẽnsãama, Amoyisi yʋʋn gʋlsɛ bɔ tõma yetɩ: ‹Nẽra sɔbia sãn ki deege a pɔga dee ka tara bia, a di pɔkõorɛ la dɔgɛ kɔma bɔ sɛka n ki la.›
La bʋraasɩ bayopɔɩ n daan boe dɛna sɔbiisi. Tɩ pɔspɔsɩ dãana la di pɔga, ki dee ka dɔgɛ bia.
Tɩ bʋyi dãana la di pɔkõorɛ la, mẽ ki dee ka dɔgɛ bia. Tɩ bʋtã dãana la mẽ ẽŋɛ bɛla.
La bãma bayopɔɩ la wuu lagɩm di pɔka la mɛ, ki dee ka dɔgɛ bia. Bɛla poorʋm tɩ pɔka la mẽ ki.
Bãma bayopɔɩ wuu n lagɩm di pɔka la dee ki la, ba sãn wa vo'oge kũm vo'ore daarɛ, ãne n wʋn sɔna pɔka la?»
Tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: «Ya tuuge mɛ, yãma n ka mi Nawẽnnɛ gõŋɔ n yele se'em, la Nawẽnnɛ pãŋa n ãn se'em na ĩyã.
Kũm vo'ore daarɛ, bʋraasɩ ka diti pɔgba, la pɔgsɩ mẽ ka ellɩ sɩrba, ba wuu wʋn ãna wʋ malɛkadõma n boe Nawẽnnɛ yire la.

La sãn dɛna kũm vo'ore yelle, yãma nãn ka karẽŋɛ Amoyisi gõŋɔ la pʋam Nawẽnnɛ n yʋʋn ze'ele tũntuugo la pʋam tɔgɛ la ẽ se'em na? A yʋʋn yele yetɩ: ‹Mam de la Abraham, la A'izakɩ, la Azakɔbɩ Nawẽnnɛ.›
La pa'alɛ tɩ bãma wuu vɔa mɛ Nawẽnnɛ zẽ'am, se'ere n soe la, Nawẽnnɛ dagɩ sɛba n ki Nawẽnnɛ, a de la sɛba n vɔa Nawẽnnɛ. Ya tuuge mɛ zozo'e.»

Tɩ lɔɔ karẽnsãandõma nẽra ayɩla wõm ban tɔgrɩ la taaba, dee bãŋɛ tɩ Azezi lerge Saduse dõma la sõŋa, tɩ a lɛm ẽ, soke ẽ yetɩ: «Nawẽnnɛ n bɔ nõorɛ tɩ ba ɩta se'em na wuu pʋam, bõn-kãna n gãnnɩ?»
Tɩ Azezi lerge ẽ yetɩ: «Sɛka n gãnnɩ wuu n wãna: ‹Ɩsrayɛlɩ dõma, selse-ya. Zuudãana n de tɩ Nawẽnnɛ na, de la Zuudãana ayɩla.
Nõŋɛ Nawẽnnɛ n de fʋ Zuudãana la fʋ sũure wuu, la fʋ sɩa wuu, la fʋ yɛm wuu, la fʋ pãŋa wuu.›
La bʋyi dãana n wãna: ‹Nõŋɛ fʋ tadãana wʋ fõn nõŋɛ fʋ mẽŋa se'em na.› Nõorɛ ayẽma ka boe n gãnnɩ bãna.»
Tɩ lɔɔ karẽnsãama la yele ẽ yetɩ: «Karẽnsãama, fõn yele se'em na ãn sõŋa, la de la sɩra, Nawẽnnɛ de la ayɩla, ayẽma ka boe sãn dagna ẽŋa mã'a.
Fʋ nõŋɛ Nawẽnnɛ la fʋ sũure wuu, la fʋ yɛm wuu, la fʋ pãŋa wuu, la fʋ nõŋɛ fʋ tadãana wʋ fõn nõŋɛ fʋ mẽŋa se'em na, ãn sõŋa mɛ gãnna kãabgɔ buuri wuu.»
Tɩ Azezi yẽ ẽn lerge la yɛm na, tɩ a yele ẽ yetɩ: «Fʋ ka zãagɛ la Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm.» Tɩ nẽra nẽra ka le saagɛ soke ẽ sokre.
Azezi n daan zãsnɩ nẽrba Wẽnde-kãtʋm na, a soke ba yetɩ: «Wãne tɩ lɔɔ karẽnsãandõma yetɩ Krisi de la naba Adavidi yɩɩŋa?
Dee tɩ Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa yʋʋn botɩ Adavidi mẽŋa tɔgɛ yetɩ:
‹Zuudãana Nawẽnnɛ yele mam Zuudãana yetɩ,
zĩ'ire m zʋʋgɔ bɔba halɩ tɩ m wa ẽŋɛ fʋ bɛ'ɛba la tɩ ba bɔna fʋ nãma tẽŋa.›
Adavidi mẽŋa sãn wi ẽ yetɩ: ‹Zuudãana›, la wʋn ẽŋɛ la wãne tɩ a dɛna Adavidi yɩɩŋa?» Tɩ nẽr-kʋʋŋɔ la sɛlsra a yetɔga la sũ-yẽlʋm.
Azezi n zãsnɩ nẽrba la, a yele ba yetɩ: «Guuse ya mẽŋa la lɔɔ karẽnsãandõma n eerɩ kaara la fu-wogro bɔɔra tɩ nẽrba pʋ'ʋsra nã'asra ba da'asʋm,
dee bɔɔra nã'asgɔ zẽ'esɩ wẽndeto pʋam, la dia zẽ'esʋm tɩ ba zẽa la.
Ba to'osrɩ la pɔkõpa n tarɩ sɛla la wuu, dee pʋ'ʋsra Nawẽnnɛ pʋ'ʋs-wogro tɩ nẽrba bɩsra ba. Ba wʋn yẽ sɩbgrɛ gãnna wuu.»
Azezi daan zĩ la Wẽnde-kãtʋm ligri daka la zẽ'am dee bɩsra nẽr-kʋʋŋɔ la n sẽnnɩ ɩta ligri daka la pʋam. Tɩ bõntatba zozo'e ɩta ligri pãɩ.
Tɩ pɔkõorɛ n de nasa wa'am wa dɩkɛ lig-kõb-pɩgsɩ bayi mã'a ẽŋɛ mĩ.
Tɩ Azezi wi a karẽnbiisi la, yele ba yetɩ: «Mam yetɩ ya la asɩra, tɩ pɔkõorɛ ẽna n de nasa la ẽŋɛ ligri daka la pʋam zo'oge gãnna ba wuu mɛ.
Se'ere n soe la, bãma wuu looge la bãma n tarɩ sɛla pãɩ la pʋam wa ẽŋɛ mĩ. La ẽŋa n de nasa la, dɩkɛ la a dia ligri wuu wa ẽŋɛ mĩ.»
Azezi daan ze'ele la Wẽnde-kãtʋm na yɛsra, tɩ a karẽnbia ayɩla yele ẽ yetɩ: «Karẽnsãama, bɩsɛ kuga n ba ãna sõŋa tɩ ba dɩkɛ mẽ de-kãra se'em.»
Tɩ Azezi yele ẽ yetɩ: «Fõn yẽ de-kãra wã, ba wʋn lʋbɛ ba wuu mɛ saam saam tɩ kugre baa ayɩla kãn weege a tadãana zuo.»
La Azezi daan sẽŋɛ ka zẽa la Oliivi tãŋa zuo tɩ a nẽŋa bɩsra Wẽnde-kãtɛ la. La Apɩyɛɛrɩ, la Azakɩ, la Azã, la A'ãndre mã'a n daan boe a zẽ'am,
soke ẽ yetɩ: «Yele to, wakat-kãna tɩ bõn-ẽŋa wʋn ẽŋɛ, la bẽm n wʋn pa'alɛ tɩ wakatɛ la paagɛ mɛ tɩ bõn-bãma wuu wʋn ẽŋɛ?»
Tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: «Guuse-ya tɩ nẽra da pã'asɛ ya tɩ ya tuuge.
Nẽrba zozo'e n wʋn dɩkɛ mam yʋ'ʋrɛ wa'am wa pã'asra ya, tɩ ba nẽra woo yetɩ: ‹Mam n de Krisi la.› La ba wʋn botɩ nẽrba zozo'e tuuge mɛ.
Ya sãn wa wõm zɛbrɛ dãmnɛ, la zɛbrɛ yelle, da basɛ-ya tɩ dabeem kẽ ya, dẽnɩ tɩ bõn-bãma ẽŋɛ. La, la nãn ka de dũnia ba'asgɔ.

Buuri ayɩla wʋn isge zɛbra la buuri ayẽma, tɩ so'olʋm ayɩla isge zɛbra la so'olʋm ayẽma. La tẽŋa wʋn tĩi mĩim mɛ zẽ'esɩ zozo'e, la kɔm wʋn bɔna. Bɛla wuu nãn de la toogo la sẽŋrɛ, la ãn wʋ pɔka virgre toogo n nãn sẽŋrɩ la.

Guuse ya mẽŋa, tɩ nẽrba wʋn tarɩ ya mɛ sẽŋɛ ka sãm ba sarɩyadia zẽ'esʋm, tɩ ba wẽ ya ba wẽndeto pʋam. La ba wʋn tarɩ ya sẽŋɛ gɔmnadõma, la na'adõma nẽŋam mam ĩyã. La ya wʋn tɔgɛ mam yɛla pa'alɛ ba.
La dẽnɩ tɩ Nawẽnnɛ kõ-yẽlga la dẽŋɛ mõolɛ bɔ buuri wuu, dee tɩ dũnia ba'asgɔ paagɛ.

La ba sãn wa yõgɛ ya tarɩ sẽŋɛ ka sãm sarɩyadia zẽ'am, ya da fabla yãma n wʋn tɔgɛ se'em, wakatɛ sãn wa paagɛ, tɔgɛ-ya yetɔg-sɛba tɩ Nawẽnnɛ wʋn bɔ ya la, se'ere n soe la, la dagɩ ya mẽŋa n wʋn tɔgɛ, la de la Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa n wʋn sõŋɛ ya.
Sɔbia wʋn botɩ ba yõkɛ sɔbia kʋ, tɩ sɔ mẽ wʋn ẽŋɛ a bia bɛla, la kɔma wʋn zɛbra la ba sɔdõma, la ba madõma botɩ ba kʋ ba.
Nẽrba zozo'e wʋn sise ya mam yʋ'ʋrɛ ĩyã. La nẽr-sɛka n wʋn mõrgɛ ze'ele kãŋkãŋɛ ka paagɛ ba'asgɔ wʋn yẽ fãarɛ.

Ya wʋn wa yẽ sɛka n de bõn-be'ego n sã'anɩ sɛla woo la, tɩ a boe zẽ'e-sɛka n ka masɛ tɩ a bɔna la.» (Sɛka n karẽŋrɩ la mõrgɛ wõm a võorɛ.) «Ya sãn yẽ bɛla, sɛba n boe Zude zoe zom tãnsɩ zuo.
La nẽr-sɛka n boe gɔsgɔ da sige bɔɔra tɩ a kẽ deem dɩkɛ sɛla.
La nẽr-sɛka n boe va'am da kãn lebe kule yire tɩ a dɩkɛ a fuugo.
Dabs-bãma, la wʋn dɛna la toogo bɔ pɔg-sɛba n tarɩ pʋa la, la sɛba n tarɩ kɔma tɩ ba mõgra la.
Sose-ya Nawẽnnɛ tɩ yel-bãma da wa dɛna ɔɔrɔ wakatɛ.
Se'ere n soe la, dabs-bãma wʋn dɛna la toogo zozo'e, tɩ ba nãn ka yẽ halɩ pĩ'iluŋo tɩ Nawẽnnɛ nãam dũnia wa paam zĩna, la toog-ẽŋa buuri kãn le malɩn wa'am.
Nawẽnnɛ sãn ka bo'oge nɩ dabs-bãma sõorɛ, nẽra ka boe nɩ n wʋn põsɛ. La Nawẽnnɛ mẽŋa nẽrba tɩ a looge la ĩyã, tɩ a bo'oge dabs-bãma sõorɛ.
La nẽra sãn yele ya yetɩ: ‹Bɩsɛ-ya, Krisi boe la kalam›, bɩɩ ‹bɩsɛ-ya, a boe la ke›, ya da sakɛ.

Nẽrba n wʋn wa'am wa parɩm tɩ bãma n de Krisi, la nẽrba n wʋn wa'am wa parɩm tɩ bãma n de Nawẽnnɛ nõtɔ'ɔsrɩba tõm tõon-yãlma, la yel-kɩrsɩ, bɔɔra tɩ ba sãn tã'agɛ, ba botɩ nẽr-sɛba tɩ Nawẽnnɛ looge la tuuge doose ba.
Guuse ya mẽŋa, tɩ mam dẽŋɛ yele ya sɛla woo mɛ.»
Azezi le yele yetɩ: «Toogo la dabsa poorʋm, wẽntulle wʋn sobge mɛ, tɩ wõrga kãn le nẽera a peelem.
La wõrbiɛ wʋn ze'ele saazuum lui. La bõn-sɛba n boe saazuum wʋn mĩim mɛ.
La ba wʋn yẽ Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la n boe sawara pʋam sẽna la pãn-kãtɛ, tɩ a na'am pãŋa peelem nẽegɛ.
La a wʋn tõm a malɛkadõma mɛ tɩ ba sẽŋɛ dũnia gɔbga la zʋʋgɔ, la dapoore la zanõrɛ, ka lagsɛ nẽr-sɛba tɩ a looge la halɩ ka paagɛ dũnia tɛka wuu.»
Azezi le yele ba yetɩ: «Dɩkɛ-ya makrɛ la kẽnkãŋa bãŋɛ zãsŋɔ la võorɛ. Kẽnkãŋa wila sãn wa pusra võorɔ, ya mi tɩ sigre lɛm mɛ.
Bɛla mẽ, ya sãn wa yẽ tɩ bõn-bãma wuu ɩtɩ, ya bãŋɛ tɩ Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la lɛm mɛ, a boe la zanõrʋm.
Mam yetɩ ya la sɩra, tɩ bõn-bãna wʋn ɩta mɛ dee tɩ zamãan-ẽna yãŋa tole.
Saazuum la tẽŋa wʋn tole mɛ, la mam yetɔga kãn malɩn tole.
Nẽra nẽra ka mi daar-sɛka la wakat-sɛka tɩ Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la wʋn leme wa'am. Baa malɛkadõma n boe Nawẽnnɛ yire, bɩɩ Dayʋa la mẽŋa ka mi, sãn dagna Sɔ Nawẽnnɛ mã'a.
Guuse ya mẽŋa sõŋa, la ya mãasʋm, se'ere n soe la, ya ka mi wakatɛ la.
La wʋn ãna wʋ bʋraa n we'esɩ sore dee dɩkɛ a yire gu'ule a tõntõnɩba, bɔ tõntõnna woo a tõonɛ, dee yele zanõr-gu'ura tɩ a gu'ura.
Bɛla ĩyã gu'ura-ya, se'ere n soe la, ya ka mi wakat-sɛka tɩ yidãana la wʋn leme wa'am. A tã wʋn leme wa'am zaanõorɛ mɛ, bɩɩ sõnsʋa, bɩɩ nõ-rɔɔgɔ kaasga wakatɛ, bɩɩ bulika.
Guuse-ya tɩ yidãana la da wa'am wa di'ige ya, tɩ ya gĩsri mɛ.
Mam n yetɩ ya se'em na, mam yetɩ nẽrba wuu la bɛla, gu'ura-ya.»
La daan deege la dabsa ayi tɩ Zɔɔg-basɛ kibsa tɩ ba obrɩ borborɩ n ka tarɩ dãbɩllɛ dabsa paagɛ. Tɩ kãabgɔ kẽma nẽŋadõma, la lɔɔ karẽnsãandõma ɛɛra sore tɩ ba sʋgɛ yõkɛ Azezi kʋ.
Tɩ ba yele taaba yetɩ: «Tɩ da kãn ẽŋɛ-ya bɛla kibsa wã pʋam, tɩ nẽrba la wʋn gire mɛ.»

Azezi daan boe la Betani, Asimõ n wa dɛna kõnkonne yire, tɩ ba daan bɔna mĩ dita. Tɩ pɔka tarɩ albatrɩ dugla n pɩrɛ la tɩdarɛ ka-sõma ligri n zo'oge tɩ ba wi'iri tɩ naarɩ, wa'am wa vuke dugla la, ka'agɛ kaam na ẽŋɛ Azezi zuugo.
Tɩ nẽrba basɛba n boe bilam na sũure sã'am, tɩ ba yele taaba yetɩ: «Bẽm tɩ pɔka la sã'am ka-sõma la wãna?
Ba tã nɩ wʋn koose ba gãŋɛ lig-kõba kɔbstã mɛ, dɩkɛ ligri la bɔ nasdõma.» Tɩ ba zɛrgɛ pɔka la.
Tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: «Basɛ-ya pɔka la bãalam, bẽm tɩ ya tɔgra ẽ tɩ a sũure sã'am? Ẽn ẽŋɛ sɛla bɔ mam na de la tõon-sõŋɔ.
Nasdõma boe la ya lɛ mɛ wakatɛ wuu, ya tã wʋn ẽŋɛ ba sõŋa mɛ yan boorɩ wakat-sɛka, la mam kãn bɔna la ya lɛ wakatɛ wuu.
Ẽŋa n tarɩ sɛla la, tɩ a ẽŋɛ. Ẽn ka'agɛ ka-sõma la ẽŋɛ mam ĩyã la, a dẽŋɛ ẽŋɛ la ban wʋn ẽŋɛ mam se'em mam laarɛ daarɛ.
Mam yetɩ ya la asɩra, tɩ dũnia wã zẽ'e-sɛka wuu tɩ ba wʋn wa mõolɛ Nawẽnnɛ kõ-yẽlga la, ba mẽ wʋn tɔgɛ pɔka wã n ẽŋɛ mam se'em wã, tɩ ba tẽra a yelle.»
Tɩ Azudaasɩ Iskariyo n de Azezi karẽnbiisi pia la ayi la nẽra ayɩla sẽŋɛ kãabgɔ kẽma nẽŋadõma zẽ'am, ka yele ba tɩ ẽŋa wʋn pa'alɛ tɩ ba yõkɛ Azezi.
La ban daan wõm ẽn yele se'em na, tɩ ba sũure ẽŋɛ yẽlʋm, tɩ ba yetɩ bãma wʋn bɔ ẽ ligri. Tɩ Azudaasɩ yãŋa ɛɛra so-sɛka tɩ a wʋn pa'alɛ tɩ ba yãŋɛ yõkɛ ẽ na.

Borborɩ n ka tarɩ dãbɩllɛ kibsa la pɔspɔsɩ daarɛ tɩ ba kʋʋrɩ pebilsi dita Zɔɔg-basɛ kibsa la n daan paagɛ. Tɩ Azezi karẽnbiisi la soke ẽ yetɩ: «Fõn boorɩ tɩ tɩ sẽŋɛ la bɛ ka mãasʋm Zɔɔg-basɛ kibsa la tɩ fʋ di?»
Tɩ Azezi tõm a karẽnbiisi bayi yele ba yetɩ: «Sẽŋɛ-ya tẽŋa la pʋam, tɩ ya wʋn tʋ'ʋsɛ bʋraaga n tʋ yoore la ko'om, ya doose ẽ
sẽŋɛ yi-sɛka tɩ a wʋn kẽ la, ka yele yidãana la yetɩ: ‹Karẽnsãama la yetɩ, deego boe la bɛ, tɩ ẽŋa la a karẽnbiisi wʋn di Zɔɔg-basɛ kibsa la?›
A wʋn pa'alɛ ya de-kãtɛ n boe ayẽma zuo, tɩ sɛla woo mãasʋm bɔna mĩ. Bilam tɩ ya wʋn mãasʋm tɩ tɩ di kibsa la.»
Tɩ a karẽnbiisi la yese sẽŋɛ tẽŋa la pʋam ka yẽ sɛla woo wʋ Azezi n yele ba se'em na. Tɩ ba mãasʋm Zɔɔg-basɛ kibsa la bilam.
Tɩ wẽnnɛ daan mã'agɛ, tɩ Azezi la a karẽnbiisi pia la ayi la wa'am,
wa zẽa dita, tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: «Mam yetɩ ya la asɩra, tɩ ya nẽra ayɩla n diti la mam kalam n wʋn pa'alɛ tɩ ba yõkɛ mam.»
Tɩ la daan sã'am ba sũure. Tɩ ba sɔkra ẽ ayɩla ayɩla yetɩ: «La de la mam?»
Tɩ a lerge ba yetɩ: «La de la ya nẽrba pia la ayi la nẽr-sɛka n wʋn yɛglɛ la mam tũm a nu'ugo laaga pʋam na.
Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la wʋn ki wʋ lan põn gʋlsɛ a yelle Nawẽnnɛ gõŋɔ pʋam se'em na. La sɛka n yetɩ a pa'alɛ tɩ ba yõkɛ Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la wʋn yẽ toogo. Nẽr-ẽŋa ma sãn ka dɔgɛ nɩ ẽ n sõɩ.»
La ban daan diti la, tɩ Azezi dɩkɛ borborɩ pʋ'ʋsɛ Nawẽnnɛ, dee fiise bɔ a karẽnbiisi la yetɩ: «To'oge-ya di, ẽna wã de la mam ĩyã.»
Dee dɩkɛ bõn-yũula pʋ'ʋsɛ Nawẽnnɛ, dee bɔ ba, tɩ ba wuu yũ.
Dee yele ba yetɩ: «Bãna wã de la mam zɩɩm n wʋn yese saagɛ nẽrba zozo'e ĩyã, pa'alɛ tɩ Nawẽnnɛ bĩŋe nõorɛ la ba.
Mam yetɩ ya la asɩra, tɩ mam kãn le yũ viinye biɛ bõn-yũula wã, halɩ tɩ la ka paagɛ daar-sɛka tɩ mam wʋn le yũ ba Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm pʋam.»
Tɩ ba yõom yõoma pẽgɛ Nawẽnnɛ, dee yese wɛ'ɛsa Oliivi tãŋam.
Tɩ Azezi yele a karẽnbiisi la yetɩ: «Yãma wuu wʋn lebe la poorʋm dee basɛ mam, se'ere n soe la, la gʋlsɛ Nawẽnnɛ gõŋɔ pʋam yetɩ: ‹Mam wʋn kʋ dũnsĩina dee tɩ piisi la wɩrgɛ.› »
La Azezi le yele ba yetɩ: «La mam sãn wa vo'oge, mam wʋn dẽŋɛ ya sẽŋɛ Galile.»
Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ yele ẽ yetɩ: «Baa ba wuu sãn lebe poorʋm dee basɛ fõn, mam kãn basɛ fõn.»
Tɩ Azezi yele ẽ yetɩ: «Mam yetɩ fʋ la sɩra, tɩ zĩna, yʋ'ʋŋɔ ẽna wã, lan dẽŋɛ nõ-rɔɔgɔ n wʋn kaasɛ nõorɛ ayi, fʋ wʋn sɩ'ɩsɛ nõorɛ atã tɩ fõn ka mi mam.»
Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ le tɔgɛ ke'enke'em yetɩ: «Baa la sãn dɛna tɩ mam lagɩm na fõn ki, mam kãn malɩn sɩ'ɩsɛ fõn.» Tɩ karẽnbiisi la wuu lagɩm yele bɛla.
Tɩ ba paagɛ zẽ'e-sɛka yʋ'ʋrɛ n de Getsemane la. Tɩ Azezi yele a karẽnbiisi la yetɩ: «Zĩ'ire-ya kalam dee tɩ m sẽŋɛ ka pʋ'ʋsɛ Nawẽnnɛ.»
La a tarɩ la Apɩyɛɛrɩ, la Azakɩ, la Azã sẽŋɛ. Tɩ a sũure sã'am zozo'e, tɩ la dãan ẽ.
Tɩ a yele ba yetɩ: «Sũ-sã'aŋɔ n tarɩ mam zozo'e tɩ mam ãna wʋ m yetɩ m ki mɛ na. Weege-ya kalam gu'ura, da gĩse-ya.»
La a sẽŋɛ la nẽŋa fẽe, ka võglɛ tẽŋa pʋ'ʋsɛ Nawẽnnɛ yetɩ, la sãn tãna, toogo la fõrgɛ dee basɛ ẽ.
Dee yetɩ: «M Sɔ, fõn tã sɛla woo ɩta, basɛ tɩ nãmsgɔ ẽna fõrgɛ dee basɛ ma. La, la da kãn dɛna mam n boorɩ se'em, la dɛna fõn boorɩ se'em.»
La a leme a karẽnbiisi batã la zẽ'am wa yẽ tɩ ba gĩsri mɛ, tɩ a soke Apɩyɛɛrɩ yetɩ: «Asimõ, fõn gĩsri mɛ? Fõn ka tã wʋn gu karf-ayɩla ka gĩse?»
Dee yele ba yetɩ: «Basɛ-ya gẽem dee pʋ'ʋsɛ Nawẽnnɛ tɩ yelle da paagɛ ya tɩ ya lui. Ya sɩa la boorɩ mɛ, la ya ĩyã ka tara pãŋa.»
La a daan le lebe ka pʋ'ʋsɛ Nawẽnnɛ wʋ ẽn pʋ'ʋsɛ se'em na.
Dee le leme wa yẽ tɩ ba gĩsri mɛ, se'ere n soe la, gẽem n ba tarɩ ba. Tɩ ba ka mina ban wʋn yele ẽ se'em.

A daan le sẽŋɛ mɛ, dee leme wa'am nõorɛ atã pʋam wa soke ba yetɩ: «Ya ken vɔ'ɔsra mɛ dee gĩsra? La ẽŋɛ ba'asɛ mɛ, wakatɛ paagɛ mɛ tɩ ba wʋn dɩkɛ Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la ẽŋɛ tõon-be'ero dõma nu'usum.
Isge-ya tɩ sẽŋɛ, tɩ sɛka n wʋn pa'alɛ tɩ ba yõkɛ mam na n wãna sẽm.»

Azezi n daan ken tɔgra la, tɩ Azudaasɩ n de a karẽnbiisi pia la ayi la nẽra ayɩla, doose la nẽr-kʋʋŋɔ sẽŋɛ paam. La nẽr-kʋʋŋɔ la daan tarɩ la sʋkɔbrɔ, la dɔa dɔla ẽ. La de la kãabgɔ kẽma nẽŋadõma, la lɔɔ karẽnsãandõma, la tẽŋa la kẽma n tõm ba.
La Azudaasɩ n wʋn pa'alɛ tɩ ba yõkɛ ẽ na, põn tɔgɛ mɛ pa'alɛ ba yetɩ: «Sɛka tɩ mam wʋn kɔkɛ ẽ na, ẽŋa n bɛla, yõkɛ-ya ẽ, tarɩ ẽ sõŋa fõrgɛ.»
La Azudaasɩ n paam na, a sẽŋɛ lɛm na Azezi, yele ẽ yetɩ: «Karẽnsãama.» Dee kɔkɛ ẽ.
Tɩ nẽrba la paagɛ yõkɛ ẽ.
Tɩ nẽr-sɛba n daan boe mĩ na nẽra ayɩla fooge a sʋkɔbgɔ sɛ kãabgɔ kẽma nẽŋadãana tõntõnna tʋbrɛ fiige.
Tɩ Azezi soke ba yetɩ: «Yãma tarɩ la sʋkɔbrɔ, la dɔa sẽna tɩ ya yõkɛ mam wʋ mam de la fãara la?
Mam daan boe la yãma lɛ Wẽnde-kãtʋm na daarɛ woo zãsna nẽrba, tɩ ya ka yõkɛ mam. La, la de la tɩ bõn-sɛka n gʋlsɛ Nawẽnnɛ gõŋɔ pʋam na ẽŋɛ.»
Tɩ a karẽnbiisi la wuu zoe dee basɛ ẽ.
La budib-polle ayɩla n daan lobe fugɔbga mã'a dɔla Azezi. Tɩ ba daan zɛ ẽ tɩ ba yõkɛ,
tɩ a basɛ a fugɔbga la dee zoe beele fõrgɛ.
Ba daan tarɩ Azezi sẽŋɛ la kãabgɔ kẽma nẽŋadãana la yire, bilam tɩ kãabgɔ kẽma nẽŋadõma, la tẽŋa la kẽma, la lɔɔ karẽnsãandõma la wuu tigse.
Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ daan bɔna poorʋm zãazãarɛ dɔla, ka paagɛ kẽ kãabgɔ kẽma nẽŋadãana la yire zẽnzakam, zẽa la tõntõnɩba ɔɔsra bugum.
La kãabgɔ kẽma nẽŋadõma, la sarɩyaditba la wuu daan eerɩ la yelle tɩ ba dõrɛ Azezi botɩ ba kʋ ẽ, la ba ka yẽ.
Tɩ nẽrba zozo'e daan parɩm bɔ Azezi, la ba yetɔga la ka doose taaba.
Tɩ nẽrba basɛba daan isge parɩm bɔ ẽ yetɩ:
«Tõma wõm tɩ a yetɩ: ‹Mam wʋn wõrgɛ Wẽnde-kãtɛ la tɩ nẽrsaalba mẽ la, dee le mẽ ayẽma dabsa atã pʋam n dagɩ nẽrsaalba mẽa.› »
Baa bõn-ẽŋa pʋam ba yetɔga la ka doose taaba.
Tɩ kãabgɔ kẽma nẽŋadãana la isge ze'ele ba wuu nẽŋam soke Azezi yetɩ: «Ban tɔgɛ fõn se'em na, fõn kãn lerge se'ere?»
Tɩ Azezi daan sĩna ka lerge se'ere. Tɩ kãabgɔ kẽma nẽŋadãana la le soke ẽ yetɩ: «Fõn de la Krisi, Nawẽnnɛ tɩ tõma pẽgrɩ la Dayʋa la?»
Tɩ Azezi lerge yetɩ: «Ẽe, mam de la ẽŋa. La ya wʋn yẽ Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la tɩ a zĩ Nawẽnnɛ n de pãŋa dãana la zʋʋgɔ bɔba, ya wʋn yẽ tɩ a boe sawara pʋam sẽna.»
Tɩ kãabgɔ kẽma nẽŋadãana la ãasʋm a mẽŋa futo, dee yetɩ: «Tɩ le ɛɛra la bẽm kaset-dõma?
Ya wõm ẽn sã'am Nawẽnnɛ yʋ'ʋrɛ. Yãma tẽ'esɛ la wãne?» Tɩ ba wuu yetɩ: «A masɛ la kũm.»
Tɩ ba nẽrba basɛba daan sẽŋɛ tʋbsra nõtõorʋm ɩta Azezi, dɩkɛ tãnnɛ pĩ a nini, mũm kũnkũra wẽ ẽ, dee yɛta ẽ tɩ: «Bãŋɛ pa'alɛ tɔ nẽr-sɛka n wẽ fɔ?» Tɩ gu'urba la to'oge ẽ, wẽ a pɛgsɩ.
La Apɩyɛɛrɩ daan ken bɔna la zẽnzakam na, tɩ kãabgɔ kẽma nẽŋadãana tõntõn-pɔka wa'am mĩ,
wa yẽ Apɩyɛɛrɩ n ɔɔsrɩ bugum na, tɩ a bɩsra ẽ, dee yetɩ: «Fõn mẽ daan po bɔna la Nazarɛtɩ bʋraa Azezi lɛ.»
Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ sɩ'ɩsɛ yetɩ: «Mam ka mi, mam ka bãŋɛ fõn yele se'em na võorɛ.» Apɩyɛɛrɩ yele bɛla dee yese ka zɛ la zanõrʋm, tɩ nõ-rɔɔgɔ kaasɛ.
Tɩ tõntõn-pɔka la le yẽ ẽ, yele sɛba n boe mĩ na yetɩ: «Bʋra-ẽna de la Azezi nẽra ayɩla.»
Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ le sɩ'ɩsɛ. Tɩ la ẽŋɛ fẽe, tɩ nẽr-sɛba n ze mĩ na le yele Apɩyɛɛrɩ yetɩ: «Asɩra, fõn de la ba nẽra ayɩla. Fõn de la Galile nẽra.»
Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ pɔɩ Nawẽnnɛ yetɩ: «Mam ka mi bʋra-sɛka tɩ ya tɔgrɩ a yelle wã.»

Bilam mẽŋa tɩ nõ-rɔɔgɔ le kaasɛ nõorɛ ayi pʋam. Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ tẽegɛ Azezi n daan yele ẽ yetɩ: «Lan dẽŋɛ nõ-rɔɔgɔ n wʋn kaasɛ nõorɛ ayi, fʋ wʋn sɩ'ɩsɛ nõorɛ atã tɩ fõn ka mi mam» na. Tɩ a sũure sã'am, tɩ a kɛlla.
Beere n daan wiige bulika, tɩ kãabgɔ kẽma nẽŋadõma, la tẽŋa la kẽma, la lɔɔ karẽnsãandõma, bãma wuu n de sarɩyaditba la daan lagsɛ mɛ tɔgɛ kʋ, botɩ ba lʋ Azezi tarɩ ẽ sẽŋɛ Apilatɩ zẽ'am.
Tɩ Apilatɩ soke Azezi yetɩ: «Fõn de la Zifdõma naba?» Tɩ a lerge yetɩ: «La de la fõn yele se'em na.»
Tɩ kãabgɔ kẽma nẽŋadõma la dõrɛ ẽ yɛla zozo'e.
Tɩ Apilatɩ le soke Azezi yetɩ: «Fõn wõm yetɔg-sɛba wuu tɩ ba tɔgɛ bɔ fʋ wã, fõn kãn lerge se'ere?»
Tɩ Azezi ka le lerge se'ere, tɩ la di'ige Apilatɩ.
Zɔɔg-basɛ kibsa woo Apilatɩ daan ẽn botɩ ba yese la nẽr-sɛka tɩ nẽrba la boorɩ la yʋ'a deem basɛ.
La bʋraa ayɩla yʋ'ʋrɛ n de Abarabasɩ, ẽŋa la nẽrba basɛba n daan dãmɛ tẽŋa, kʋ nẽra tɩ ba yõgɛ ba yʋ.
Tɩ nẽr-kʋʋŋɔ la sẽŋɛ Apilatɩ zẽ'am ka sose ẽ yetɩ, a ẽŋɛ ẽŋa n ɩtɩ se'em na bɔ ba.
Tɩ a soke ba yetɩ: «Ya boorɩ tɩ m yese la Zifdõma naba la basɛ bɔ ya?»
Se'ere n soe la, a bãŋɛ tɩ kãabgɔ kẽma nẽŋadõma la ẽŋɛ la sũure botɩ ba yõkɛ Azezi wa bɔ ẽ.
La kãabgɔ kẽma nẽŋadõma la daan sa'asɛ nẽr-kʋʋŋɔ la mɛ, tɩ ba sẽŋɛ ka sose Apilatɩ tɩ a yese Abarabasɩ basɛ bɔ ba.
Tɩ Apilatɩ le soke ba yetɩ: «Bɛla, sɛka tɩ ya wi'iri tɩ Zifdõma naba la, yãma boorɩ tɩ m ẽŋɛ ẽ na wãne?»
Tɩ ba tɔgra ke'enke'em yetɩ: «Ka ẽ dɔ-puurŋa zuo.»
Tɩ Apilatɩ soke ba yetɩ: «A ẽŋɛ la bẽm n de be'em?» Tɩ ba malɩn tɔgra ke'enke'em yetɩ: «Ka ẽ dɔ-puurŋa zuo.»
La Apilatɩ daan boorɩ tɩ a ẽŋɛ tɩ nẽrba la sũure n ẽŋɛ yẽlʋm, tɩ a yese Abarabasɩ basɛ bɔ ba. Dee botɩ ba wẽ Azezi la ka'asa, dee dɩkɛ ẽ bɔ tɩ ba ka ẽ dɔ-puurŋa zuo.
Tɩ sʋdaasɩ tarɩ Azezi kẽ gɔmna la yire zẽnzakam, dee wi sʋdaasɩ la wuu, tɩ ba lagsɛ.
Tɩ ba dɩkɛ fuugo n de gomusga yɛ Azezi, dee dɩkɛ gõ'osɩ wʋgɛ mũŋa vuge ẽ.
Dee yãŋa pʋ'ʋsra ẽ yetɩ: «Zifdõma naba, naa!»
Dee dɩkɛ dasaarɛ wẽ a zuugo, tʋbsɛ nõtõorʋm mĩ ẽ, dee ka dũma tẽŋa a nẽŋam nã'asra ẽ.
Ban yaalɛ ẽ kɩ'ɩlɩm na, ba yɛɛgɛ gomusga fuugo la mɛ, dee le yɛ ẽ a futo, tarɩ ẽ yese tɩ ba sẽŋɛ ka ka dɔ-puurŋa zuo kʋ.

Ban daan tarɩ Azezi wɛ'ɛsa la, ba daan tʋ'ʋsɛ la bʋraaga ayɩla yʋ'ʋrɛ n de Asimõ n ze'ele Sirɛnɩ, a de la Alɛgsãndrɩ la Arufusi sɔ. A daan ze'ele la va'am lɛmna. Tɩ sʋdaasɩ la pẽrgɛ ẽ, tɩ a to'oge Azezi kũm dɔ-puurŋa la buke.
Ba daan tarɩ Azezi sẽŋɛ la zẽ'a tɩ ba wi'iri tɩ Golgota, a võorɛ de la zuwaŋrɛ zẽ'a.
Ba daan dɩkɛ la dãam n gaam na tɩɩm yʋ'ʋrɛ n de miiri bɔ ẽ tɩ a yũ, tɩ a zagsɛ ka yũ.
Tɩ ba daan ka ẽ dɔ-puurŋa zuo, dee dɩkɛ a futo tɩ ba pʋɩ taaba, pɔsɛ tɩ ba bãŋɛ nẽra woo n wʋn to'oge se'em.
La daan de la bulika karf-awɛɩ wakatɛ tɩ ba ka ẽ dɔ-puurŋa zuo.
Ba daan gʋlsɛ la gʋlsgɔ pa'alɛ bõn-sɛka n botɩ ba ka ẽ lablɛ dɔ-puurŋa la zuo. Ba daan gʋlsɛ yetɩ: «Zifdõma naba.»
Ba daan tarɩ la fãarba bayi wa po ka dɔ-puursi zuto, ayɩla a zʋʋgɔ bɔba, ayẽma a gɔbga bɔba. [
La de la bɛla, tɩ Nawẽnnɛ gõŋɔ n gʋlsɛ se'em na ẽŋɛ. La gʋlsɛ yetɩ: «Ba geele ẽ pa'asɛ la tõon-be'ero dõma pʋam.»]
Tɩ nẽr-sɛba n dolɩ bilam tɔlla la lɔbra ba zuto, dee tʋʋra ẽ yetɩ: «Ẽhẽe, faa! Dagɩ fõn yetɩ fõn wʋn wõrgɛ Wẽnde-kãtɛ la dee le mẽ ẽ dabsa atã pʋam?
Fãagɛ fʋ mẽŋa dɔ-puurŋa la zuo sige.»
Tɩ kãabgɔ kẽma nẽŋadõma, la lɔɔ karẽnsãandõma la mẽ la'ara ẽ yɛta taaba yetɩ: «A daan fãagrɩ nẽrba basɛba mɛ, dee ka tãna wʋn fãagɛ a mẽŋa.
A sãn dɛna Krisi, Ɩsrayɛlɩ dõma naba la, a ze'ele dɔ-puurŋa la zuo sige nãnannɛ wã tɩ tɩ yẽ dee sakɛ.» Tɩ nẽr-sɛba tɩ ba ka dɔ-puursi zuto lɛm ẽ na mẽ tɔgɛ ẽ be'em.
Wʋntɛɛŋa zuu-tẽŋasʋka n daan paagɛ, tɩ tẽŋa la wuu lebge lika halɩ ka paagɛ zaanõorɛ karf-atã.
Karf-atã la wakatɛ tɩ Azezi tɔgɛ ke'enke'em yetɩ: «Eloi, Eloi, lama sabaktani.» La võorɛ de la: «Mam Wẽnnaam, mam Wẽnnaam, bẽm n soe tɩ fõn basɛ mam?»
Tɩ sɛba n ze bilam na basɛba wõm bɛla, yetɩ: «Selse-ya, a wi'iri la A'eli.»
Tɩ nẽra ayẽma zoe ka dɩkɛ nẽtɩŋa lʋsɛ dã-mĩ'isgo pʋam zẽkɛ la dɔɔgɔ bɔ ẽ tɩ a yũ, dee yetɩ: «Basɛ-ya tɩ tɩ gu bɩsɛ A'eli la sãn wʋn wa sike ẽ dɔ-puurŋa la zuo.»
Tɩ Azezi le kaasɛ ke'enke'em dee yãŋa ki.
Wakat-ẽŋa, tɩ fuugo la n yuli Wẽnde-kãtɛ la pʋam beŋe zẽ'e-sõŋɔ la ãagɛ pʋsʋka saazuum ka paagɛ tẽŋa.
Tɩ Rom sʋdaasɩ kɛ'ɛma daan zɛ Azezi nẽŋam yẽ ẽn ki se'em, tɩ a yetɩ: «Bʋra-ẽna wã sɩrɩ de la Nawẽnnɛ Dayʋa.»
La pɔgsɩ basɛba n mẽ daan boe mĩ zɛ kẽnkɛrŋa bɩsra. Amaari n ze'ele Magdala, la Amaari n de Azakɩ pɩka la Azoze ma, la Asalome n daan boe ba pʋam.
Azezi n daan boe Galile la, ba daan dolɩ ẽ mɛ dee sõŋra ẽ. La pɔgsɩ basɛba zozo'e n daan lagɩm doose ẽ wa'am Zerizalɛm n boe mĩ.
Tɩ wẽnnɛ daan bɔna mĩ kẽ'era, la daan de la beere n wʋn wiige Zifdõma vo'osgo daarɛ, tɩ ba daan bɔna mĩ mãasna.

Tɩ bʋraa ayɩla yʋ'ʋrɛ n de Azozɛfʋ, a ze'ele la Arimate, a de la sarɩyaditba la nẽra ayɩla tɩ ba nannɩ. A mẽ daan gu'uri la Nawẽnnɛ n wʋn wa'am wa di na'am nẽrba tẽŋasʋka. Lan daan de beere n wʋn wiige vo'osgo daarɛ la ĩyã, tɩ a kɛ'ɛm sũure sẽŋɛ Apilatɩ zẽ'am ka sose Azezi kũm na.
La Apilatɩ n wõm tɩ Azezi darɛ ki mɛ na, la di'ige ẽ mɛ. Tɩ a botɩ ba wi sʋda-kɛ'ɛma la, tɩ a soke bãŋɛ Azezi ki yuuge mɛ?
La Apilatɩ n wõm sʋda-kɛ'ɛma la lergre la, tɩ a bɔ Azozɛfʋ sore tɩ a sike kũm na.
Tɩ Azozɛfʋ da tãnnɛ sike kũm na dɔ-puurŋa la zuo, dɩkɛ tãnnɛ la vile ẽ, tarɩ ẽ sẽŋɛ ka laagɛ yɔɔgɔ tɩ ba daan tũ tãmpĩa ĩyã, yãŋa bilge kug-kãtɛ lige yɔɔgɔ la nõorɛ.
Amaari n ze'ele Magdala, la Azoze ma Amaari daan ze mɛ bɩsra zẽ'e-sɛka tɩ ba bĩŋe ẽ na.
Zifdõma vo'osgo daarɛ n daan tole, tɩ Amaari n ze'ele Magdala, la Azakɩ ma Amaari, la Asalome da tɩdarɛ yũuŋo n ãn sõŋa tɩ ba tarɩ sẽŋɛ ka ẽŋɛ Azezi ĩyã.
Tɩ Lasrɩ daarɛ bulika wẽnnɛ n doorɩ se'em mã'a la, tɩ ba wɛ'ɛsa yɔɔm na,
dee tɔgra la taaba sore yetɩ: «Ãne n wʋn bilge kugre la yɔɔgɔ la nõorʋm bɔ tɔ?»
La ban paagɛ la, ba yẽ tɩ kugre la n ba ãna kãtɛ la põn bilge mɛ gã.
Tɩ ba kẽ yɔɔgɔ la pʋam, yẽ budib-polle n yɛ fu-pɛɛlga zẽa zʋʋgɔ bɔba, tɩ ba palẽŋa ẽkɛ.

Tɩ a yele ba yetɩ: «Da basɛ-ya tɩ ya palẽŋa ẽgra, mam mi tɩ ya eerɩ la Azezi n ze'ele Nazarɛtɩ, tɩ ba ka dɔ-puurŋa zuo kʋ la. A vo'oge mɛ, a ka boe kalam. Bɩsɛ-ya zẽ'e-sɛka tɩ ba daan bĩŋe ẽ na n wãna.
Sẽŋɛ-ya ka yele Apɩyɛɛrɩ, la a karẽnbiisi basɛba la yetɩ: ‹A wʋn dẽŋɛ ya nẽŋa sẽŋɛ Galile. Bilam tɩ ya wʋn yẽ ẽ, wʋ ẽn daan yele ya se'em na.› »
Tɩ ba yɛm bɔɩ, tɩ ba ĩyã gõgra, tɩ ba yese yɔɔgɔ la pʋam zoe, la ba daan ka yele nẽra nẽra sɛla, se'ere n soe la, dabeem n tarɩ ba.
Azezi n daan vo'oge Lasrɩ daarɛ bulika yʋ'ʋŋɔ yʋ'ʋŋɔ la, a dẽŋɛ dɩkɛ a mẽŋa pa'alɛ la Amaari n ze'ele Magdala. La de la ẽŋa tɩ kʋlkã'arsɩ bayopɔɩ daan dolɩ ẽ tɩ Azezi dige ba, tɩ ba yese la.
Tɩ a sẽŋɛ ka yele nẽr-sɛba n daan dolɩ Azezi la. Ba daan zĩ la sũ-sã'aŋɔ la nintãm.
La ban daan wõm tɩ Azezi vo'oge mɛ tɩ Amaari yẽ ẽ na, ba daan ka sakɛ.
Bɛla poorʋm tɩ Azezi le teege nẽŋa ayẽma dɩkɛ a mẽŋa pa'alɛ a karẽnbiisi bayi n daan boe sore wɛ'ɛsa tẽn-pɩka ayɩla.
Tɩ ba lebe ka yele ba taaba la, tɩ ba ka sakɛ.

La bɛla poorʋm, tɩ a karẽnbiisi pia la ayɩla la daan zẽa dita, tɩ Azezi dɩkɛ a mẽŋa pa'alɛ ba. Dee zɛbɛ ba, ban daan ka bɔ sɩra, la ba sũure n kɛ la ĩyã. Se'ere n soe la, ba daan ka sakɛ sɛba n daan yẽ ẽ yetɩ a vo'oge mɛ na yetɔga.
A yele bɛla, dee yele ba yetɩ: «Sẽŋɛ-ya dũnia zẽ'a woo ka mõolɛ Nawẽnnɛ kõ-yẽlga la bɔ nẽrba wuu.
Sɛka woo n bɔ sɩra, botɩ ba mise ẽ ko'om pʋam, a wʋn yẽ fãarɛ. La sɛka woo n ka bɔ sɩra, ba wʋn di a sarɩya sɩbgɛ ẽ.
La sɛba n wʋn bɔ mam sɩra la, wʋn ɩta la bõn-yãlma bãna pa'alɛ Nawẽnnɛ pãŋa: Ba wʋn dɩkɛ la mam yʋ'ʋrɛ digra kʋlkã'arsɩ, dee tɔgra yetɔg-zãŋsɩ.
La ba sãn yõgɛ bõnsɛ'ɛdõma, bɩɩ yũ yabga, la kãn ẽŋɛ ba sɛla. La ba wʋn dɩkɛ ba nu'usi paglɛ bã'adõma zuto, tɩ ba yẽ ĩmã'asʋm.»
Zuudãana Azezi n daan tɔgɛ la ba kɩ'ɩlɩm na, a zẽkɛ mɛ zom Nawẽnnɛ yire, ka zĩ'ire Nawẽnnɛ zʋʋgɔ.
Tɩ a karẽnbiisi la sẽŋɛ ka mõolɛ kõ-yẽlga la zẽ'esɩ wuu. Tɩ Zuudãana la sõŋɛ ba, botɩ ba tõm tõon-yãlma pa'alɛ tɩ ba kõa la mõolgɔ de la sɩra.]
Mam sɩr-sõŋɔ Ateofili, nẽrba zozo'e n mõrgɛ gʋlsɛ yel-sɛba wuu n ẽŋɛ tõma zẽ'am na.
Ba gʋlsɛ yel-bãma wuu wʋ nẽrba basɛba n daan yẽ yɛla la wuu halɩ ba pĩ'iluŋo, dee mõolɛ kõ-yẽlga la tɔgɛ pa'alɛ tɩ tõma wõm se'em na.
Bɛla ĩyã tɩ mam mã'agɛ m mẽŋa doose yel-bãma nãma sõŋa sõŋa halɩ ba pĩ'iluŋo pʋam, tɩ mam tẽ'esɛ tɩ la ãn sõŋa tɩ m gʋlsɛ yɛla la n doose taaba se'em na bɔ fɔ.
Mam gʋlsrɩ wãna tɩ fʋ bãŋɛ mɛ tɩ yel-bãna wuu tɩ ba pa'alɛ fʋ la de la sɩra.

Se'emwẽnʋm tɩ A'erɔdɩ daan de Zude tẽŋa naba la, bʋraa n daan boe tɩ a yʋ'ʋrɛ dɛna Azakari. A daan de la Zifdõma kãabgɔ kẽema, a de la Abiya buuri nẽra. Tɩ a pɔga yʋ'ʋrɛ dɛna A'elizabɛtɩ, ẽŋa mẽ daan de la kãabgɔ kẽma nẽŋadãana Aarõ buuri.
Bãma bayi daan de la nẽrba n ɩtɩ sõŋa Nawẽnnɛ nifum, dee sakra Nawẽnnɛ nõorɛ, la a lɔɔ la wuu sõŋa.
La ba daan ka tarɩ bia, se'ere n soe la, A'elizabɛtɩ daan de la kõndɔgrɛ, la bãma bayi la wuu mẽ kʋrgɛ mɛ.
La wakatɛ n daan paagɛ tɩ Abiya buuri kẽ Wẽnde-kãtɛ la pʋam tɩ ba tõm. Tɩ Azakari mẽ kẽ tɩ a tõm.
Kãabgɔ kẽma la malŋɔ daan de la ba pɔsɛ looge nẽr-sɛka n wʋn kẽ zẽ'e-sõŋɔ pʋam yõ tɩdarɛ bɔ Nawẽnnɛ. Tɩ ba daan pɔsɛ, tɩ la yõkɛ Azakari. Tɩ Azakari kẽ tɩ a yõ.
La tɩdarɛ la yõ'a wakatɛ nẽr-kʋʋŋɔ la wuu boe la yẽŋa pʋ'ʋsra Nawẽnnɛ.
Tɩ Nawẽnnɛ malɛka darɛ wa'am Azakari zẽ'am wa zɛ tɩdarɛ yõ'a bĩmbĩnne na zʋʋgɔ bɔba.
La Azakari n yẽ ẽ na, a palẽŋa n ẽkɛ halɩ, tɩ dabeem kẽ ẽ.
Tɩ malɛka la yele ẽ yetɩ: «Azakari, da zoe dabeem, tɩ Nawẽnnɛ wõm fʋ pʋ'ʋsgɔ mɛ. Fʋ pɔga A'elizabɛtɩ wʋn dɔgɛ la budibla, tɩ fʋ sɩ a yʋ'ʋrɛ tɩ Azã.
La fʋ wʋn ẽŋɛ sũ-yẽlga sɩrʋm. La nẽrba zozo'e wʋn ẽŋɛ sũ-yẽlga bia la dɔka ĩyã.
A wʋn dɛna la nẽr-keko Zuudãana Nawẽnnɛ nifum, la a kãn yũ dãam bɩɩ bõn-yũula n bugri. Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa wʋn bɔna la ẽ halɩ lan pɔsɛ ẽn boe a ma pʋʋrʋm, la wakatɛ wuu.
A wʋn botɩ Ɩsrayɛlɩ nẽrba zozo'e lebe sakɛ ba Zuudãana Nawẽnnɛ.

La a wʋn dẽŋɛ Zuudãana nẽŋam tara Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa pãŋa wʋ Nawẽnnɛ nõtɔ'ɔsa A'eli n daan tarɩ se'em na. La a wʋn naagɛ sɔdõma la ba kɔma yɛla, dee wʋn botɩ nẽr-sɛba n sɩ'ɩsrɩ Nawẽnnɛ nõorɛ la tara yɛm ɩta wʋ sɛba n ɩtɩ sɛla n masɛ la. A wʋn botɩ nẽrba mãasʋm sõŋa gu'ura tɩ Zuudãana.»
Tɩ Azakari soke malɛka la yetɩ: «Bẽm n wʋn botɩ mam bãŋɛ tɩ bõn-ẽna de la sɩra? Se'ere n soe la, mam de la bʋra-yã'aŋa dee tɩ mam pɔga mẽ kʋrgɛ.»
Tɩ malɛka la lerge ẽ yetɩ: «Mam yʋ'ʋrɛ de la Agabrɩyɛlɩ, mam ze la Nawẽnnɛ nẽŋam. Ẽŋa n tõm mam yetɩ, m wa'am yele fʋ yetɔg-yẽlga wã.

La fõn ka sakɛ mam yetɔga la ĩyã, fʋ nõorɛ n wʋn mãam. La wakatɛ sãn paagɛ, bõn-sɛba tɩ mam yele fʋ la wʋn ẽŋɛ. La fʋ kãn le tãna tɔgra, halɩ tɩ la paagɛ daar-sɛka tɩ bõn-bãna wʋn ẽŋɛ la.»
Wakat-ẽŋa, nẽrba la daan gu'uri mɛ tɩ Azakari yese. La ẽn daan boe zẽ'e-sõŋɔ la pʋam yuura la, ba palẽŋa n ẽkɛ.
La ẽn yãŋa wa yese la, a ka tã'agɛ tɔgɛ la nẽrba la. A nõorʋm n mãam tɩ a tara nu'usi magra pa'ala ba. Bɛla tɩ ba bãŋɛ tɩ a yẽ la bõn-yãlma zẽ'e-sõŋɔ la pʋam.
Dabs-sɛba tɩ Azakari daan wʋn tõm Wẽnde-kãtɛ la pʋam n ba'asɛ la, a daan lebe kule la a yire.
Dabs-bãna poorʋm, tɩ a pɔga A'elizabɛtɩ yõkɛ pʋʋrɛ bɔna yire wõr-sɩnuu.
Dee yetɩ: «Wãna de la Zuudãana Nawẽnnɛ tõoma. Wakat-ẽna ẽŋa n yãŋa bɩsɛ mam yelle, dee yese bõn-ẽna n de nɩ yãnnɛ bɔ mam nẽrba tẽŋasʋka.»

Pugla ayɩla n daan boe Galile tẽŋa ayɩla yʋ'ʋrɛ n de Nazarɛtɩ, tɩ a yʋ'ʋrɛ dɛna Amaari. A daan nãn ka mi bʋraa. La bʋraa ayɩla yʋ'ʋrɛ n de Azozɛfʋ n yetɩ a di ẽ. Azozɛfʋ de la naba Adavidi buuri nẽra. La wakat-sɛka tɩ A'elizabɛtɩ daan tarɩ pʋʋrɛ wõr-sɩyoobɩ pʋam na, tɩ Nawẽnnɛ tõm a malɛka Agabrɩyɛlɩ tɩ a sẽŋɛ Amaari zẽ'am.
Tɩ malɛka la sẽŋɛ Amaari zẽ'am ka pʋ'ʋsɛ ẽ yetɩ: «Fʋ tõoma. Zuudãana Nawẽnnɛ boe la fʋ mɛ, a ẽŋɛ fʋ yel-sõnnɛ mɛ.»
La Amaari n daan wõm malɛka yetɔga la, a palẽŋa n ẽkɛ, tɩ a tẽ'esra malɛka la n yele se'em na võorɛ n de sɛla.
Tɩ malɛka la yele ẽ yetɩ: «Amaari, da zoe dabeem, tɩ Nawẽnnɛ ẽŋɛ fʋ yel-sõnnɛ mɛ.
Fʋ wʋn yõkɛ la pʋʋrɛ dɔgɛ budibla, sɩ a yʋ'ʋrɛ tɩ Azezi.
A wʋn dɛna la nẽr-keko. La ba wʋn wi'ira ẽ tɩ, Nawẽnnɛ n gãnnɩ wuu Bia. La Zuudãana Nawẽnnɛ wʋn bɔ ẽ a yaaba Adavidi na'am,
tɩ a dɛna Azakɔbɩ buuri naba wakatɛ wuu, a na'am na kãn malɩn ba'asɛ.»
Tɩ Amaari soke malɛka la yetɩ: «Mam ka mi bʋraa, la wʋn ẽŋɛ la wãne tɩ mam yõkɛ pʋʋrɛ?»
Tɩ malɛka la lerge ẽ yetɩ: «Nawẽnnɛ n gãnnɩ sɛla wuu Sɩa wʋn sige fʋ zuo, la Nawẽnnɛ pãŋa wʋn bɔna la fɔ, bɛla bia la tɩ fʋ wʋn dɔgɛ la wʋn welge la to'ore, ba wʋn wi'ira ẽ tɩ Nawẽnnɛ Dayʋa.
Bãŋɛ tɩ fʋ sõogɔ A'elizabɛtɩ tɩ ba yetɩ a de la kõndɔgrɛ la, a tarɩ la pʋʋrɛ wõr-sɩyoobɩ n wãna. Baa la ẽn kʋrgɛ la, a wʋn dɔgɛ la budibla.
Se'ere n soe la, sɛla sɛla ka boe tɩ Nawẽnnɛ ka tã ɩta.»
Tɩ Amaari lerge yetɩ: «Mam de la Zuudãana Nawẽnnɛ tõntõn-pɔka. Nawẽnnɛ botɩ la ẽŋɛ wʋ fõn yele se'em na.» Tɩ malɛka la fõrgɛ dee basɛ ẽ.
La dabsa bãma pʋam, tɩ Amaari isge sẽŋɛ tɔtɔ paagɛ Zude so'olʋm tẽŋa ayɩla tɩ tãnsɩ boe mĩ.
La ẽn paagɛ la, a kẽ la Azakari yire pʋ'ʋsɛ A'elizabɛtɩ.
La A'elizabɛtɩ n wõm a pʋ'ʋsgɔ la, bia la wẽrgɛ mɛ a pʋʋrʋm. Tɩ Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa wa'am A'elizabɛtɩ zẽ'am la pãŋa,
tɩ a tĩi tɔgɛ yetɩ: «Nawẽnnɛ ẽŋɛ la fõn yel-sõnnɛ gãnna pɔgsɩ la wuu. La bia la tɩ fʋ wʋn dɔgɛ la, tarɩ yel-sõnnɛ mɛ.
Mam de la ãne tɩ mam Zuudãana ma sẽna mam zẽ'am?
Se'ere n soe la, mam wõm fõn pʋ'ʋsgɔ la, bia la n boe mam pʋʋrʋm na wẽrgɛ mɛ la sũ-yẽlga.
Fõn sakɛ tɩ Zuudãana Nawẽnnɛ yetɔga tɩ a tɔgɛ bɔ fʋ la wʋn sɩrɩ ẽŋɛ la, fʋ yẽ zu-yẽlga.»
Tɩ Amaari yele yetɩ:
«Mam pẽgrɩ Zuudãana Nawẽnnɛ la m sũure wuu.
Mam tarɩ sũ-yẽlga mɛ, Nawẽnnɛ n de mam Fãagra la ĩyã,
se'ere n soe la, a bɩsɛ mam n de a tõntõn-pɔg-tarma la yelle mɛ.
Bɛla lan pɔsɛ lɛɛlɛ wã wɛ'ɛsa, zamãana wuu nẽrba wʋn wi'ira mam tɩ zu-yẽlga dãana.
Se'ere n soe la, Nawẽnnɛ n tã wuu la n ẽŋɛ bõn-kãra bɔ mam.
A de la pʋpeelem dãana.
La nẽr-sɛba n zotɩ ẽ na,
a zotɩ ba ninbãalga mɛ zamãana wuu.
A dɩkɛ la a nu'ugo tõm tõon-kãra,
dee botɩ zẽk-m-mẽŋa dõma la zoe wɩrgɛ la ba zẽk-m-mẽŋa pʋtẽ'era la.
La sãn dɛna pãnsɩ dõma,
a sikri ba mɛ ba na'am pʋam,
dee zẽkra sik-m-mẽŋa dõma.
La sɛba n ka tarɩ sɛla la,
a bɔ'ɔrɩ ba bõntarsõm zɔ'ɔra mɛ,
dee botɩ bõntatba lebe fõrgɛ dee ka to'oge sɛla sɛla.
A tẽerɩ zɔta tõma Ɩsrayɛlɩ nẽrba n de a tõntõnɩba la ninbãalga mɛ, dee sõŋra tõma,
wʋ ẽn yʋʋn bĩŋe a nõorɛ la tõma yaaba Abraham, la tõma sɔ-yaabdõma, la ba yɩɩsɩ la wuu tɩ a wʋn sõŋra tõma wakatɛ wuu se'em na.»
La Amaari daan weege A'elizabɛtɩ zẽ'am ẽŋɛ wʋ wõr-sɩtã, dee yãŋa lebe kule.
A'elizabɛtɩ dɔka wakatɛ n daan paagɛ la, a dɔgɛ la budibla.
Tɩ a sawiiba, la a yir-dõma wõm tɩ Zuudãana Nawẽnnɛ zoe a ninbãalga zo'oge, tɩ ba wuu lagɩm ɩta sũ-yẽlga la ẽ.
Bia la dɔka dabsa anii daarɛ tɩ ba wa'am tɩ ba wã ẽ, daan bɔɔra tɩ ba sɩ a yʋ'ʋrɛ a sɔ Azakari yʋ'ʋrɛ.
La a ma ka sakɛ, yetɩ: «Ayɛɩ, a yʋ'ʋrɛ wʋn dɛna la Azã.»
Tɩ ba lerge yetɩ: «Ya yir-dõma la pʋam nẽra ka boe mĩ tɩ a yʋ'ʋrɛ dɛna Azã.»
Tɩ ba yɩbsɛ la nu'usi soke bia la sɔ tɩ ba bãŋɛ ẽŋa n boorɩ tɩ ba sɩ bia la yʋ'ʋrɛ se'em.
Tɩ a botɩ ba bɔ ẽ dɔ-palaka, tɩ a to'oge gʋlsɛ yetɩ: «A yʋ'ʋrɛ de la Azã.» Tɩ la di'ige nẽrba la waa wuu.
La ẽn gʋlsɛ yele bɛla la, bilam mẽŋa tɩ a zɩlɩŋa lakɛ, tɩ a tã'agɛ tɔgra pẽgra Nawẽnnɛ.
Tɩ dabeem yõkɛ sɛba n lɛm bilam na wuu. Tɩ kõ-ẽŋa saagɛ Zude tẽn-sɛba tɩ tãnsɩ boe mĩ na wuu.
Bãma wuu n daan wõm yɛla la, ba daan tẽ'esrɩ mɛ dee sɔkra yetɩ: «Bi-ẽna yetɩ a wa ãna la wãne?» Zuudãana Nawẽnnɛ pãŋa boe la ẽ mɛ.
Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa n wa'am bia la sɔ Azakari zẽ'am la pãŋa. Tɩ a to'oge Nawẽnnɛ yetɔga tɔgɛ yetɩ:
«Basɛ-ya tɩ pẽgɛ Nawẽnnɛ n de Ɩsrayɛlɩ Zuudãana la,
se'ere n soe la, a wa'am mɛ wa bɩsɛ a nẽrba yelle, fãagɛ ba basɛ.
A bɔ tõma la Fãagra n tarɩ pãŋa n wʋn yese a tõntõnna Adavidi buuri la pʋam,
wʋ ẽŋa n yʋʋn botɩ a nõtɔ'ɔsrɩba tɔgra kʋrʋm se'em na.
A yetɩ a wʋn fãagɛ tɔ tɩ bɛ'ɛba nu'usum,
la nẽr-sɛba n sisri tõma la nu'usum.
Bɛla, a zoe tɩ yaabdõma ninbãalga mɛ,
dee tẽegɛ ẽn yʋʋn bĩŋe a nõorɛ la ba la yelle.
Se'ere n soe la, a yʋʋn bĩŋe nõorɛ mɛ la tɩ yaaba Abraham
tɩ a wʋn fãagɛ tɔ tɩ bɛ'ɛba nu'usum,
dee wʋn botɩ tɩ tõm a tõoma, tɩ dabeem kana.
Dee dɔla ẽ la pʋpeelem,
dee ɩta tɩ la masra ẽn boorɩ se'em ka paagɛ tɩ vɔm tɛka.
La fõn, m bia, ba wʋn wi'ira fʋ tɩ Nawẽnnɛ n gãnnɩ wuu nõtɔ'ɔsa.
Bɛla ĩyã, fõn wʋn dẽŋɛ tɩ Zuudãana la nẽŋam malgɛ sore bɔ ẽ,
dee yele Nawẽnnɛ nẽrba la tɩ ba bãŋɛ tɩ a wʋn fãagɛ ba basɛ ba tõon-be'ero taalɛ.
La de la Nawẽnnɛ n zotɩ tõma ninbãalga la ĩyã
tɩ a wʋn botɩ a peelem n ãn wʋ wʋntɛɛŋa n yẽkɛ bulika la,
nẽegɛ bɔ nẽr-sɛba n boe lika pʋam,
la nẽr-sɛba n zotɩ kũm dabeem na,
dee pa'alɛ tɩ so-sɛka tɩ tɩ wʋn doose yẽ sũ-mã'asʋm.»
Tɩ bia la daan bɩta, tɩ a pʋtẽ'erɛ pa'asra. A daan boe la weem ka paagɛ daar-sɛka tɩ a wa'am Ɩsrayɛlɩ dõma la zẽ'am tɩ ba bãŋɛ ẽ.
Ban daan dɔgɛ Azã la, wakat-ẽŋa tɩ na-keko A'ogisti daan bɔ nõorɛ yetɩ, ba kãalɛ a tẽŋa la wuu nẽrba.
La daan de la pɔspɔsɩ n bɛla tɩ ba kãalɛ nẽrba la, wakat-sɛka tɩ Akirinusi daan de Siiri tẽnsɩ gɔmna la.
Tɩ nẽrba wuu kule ba mẽnsɩ tẽnsʋm tɩ ba kãalɛ ba.
Tɩ Azozɛfʋ mẽ yese Nazarɛtɩ n boe Galile so'olʋm sẽŋɛ Bɛtelɛm n boe Zude so'olʋm pʋam, zẽ'e-ẽŋa tɩ ba yʋʋn dɔgɛ naba Adavidi. Se'ere n soe tɩ a sẽŋɛ bilam na, a de la naba Adavidi buuri.
Ẽŋa la Amaari n de pɔg-sɛka n yetɩ a ele ẽ na sẽŋɛ mɛ tɩ ba kãalɛ ba, wakat-ẽŋa Amaari tarɩ la pʋʋrɛ.
La ban nãn boe Bɛtelɛm la, tɩ a dɔka daarɛ paagɛ.
Tɩ a dɔgɛ a budib-kẽema, vile ẽ na fuugo gã'arɛ dũnsi yɔnnɔ daka pʋam. Se'ere n soe la, zẽ'a n ka boe sãama yire la pʋam tɩ ba wʋn gã'arɛ.
La tẽn-ẽŋa dũnsĩima daan boe la sẽkam gu'ura ba dũnsi yʋ'ʋŋɔ.
Tɩ Nawẽnnɛ malɛka sige ba zẽ'am. Tɩ Nawẽnnɛ na'am pãŋa peelem nẽegɛ gilge ba. Tɩ dabeem ba kẽ ba halɩ.
Tɩ malɛka la yele ba yetɩ: «Da zoe-ya dabeem, tɩ mam tarɩ la kõ-yẽlga tɩ m yele ya, n wʋn basɛ tɩ nẽrba wuu sũure ẽŋɛ yẽlʋm.
La de la yʋ'ʋŋ-ẽna tɩ ba dɔgɛ ya Fãagra la Adavidi tẽŋa pʋam, ẽŋa n de Zuudãana Krisi la.
La bõn-ẽna n wʋn botɩ ya bãŋɛ tɩ la de la sɩra, ya wʋn yẽ bilɩa tɩ ba vile ẽ na fuugo gã'arɛ dũnsi yɔnnɔ daka pʋam.»
Tɩ Nawẽnnɛ malɛkadõma kʋʋŋ-kʋʋŋɔ darɛ wa'am wa naagɛ la ayɩla la. Tɩ ba pẽgra Nawẽnnɛ yetɩ:
«Nawẽnnɛ n boe saazuum n soe pẽka, la nẽr-sɛba tɩ a nõŋɛ la tarɩ sũ-mã'asʋm dũnia zuo.»
La malɛkadõma la lebe la Nawẽnnɛ yire, dee tɩ dũnsĩima la yele taaba yetɩ: «Basɛ-ya tɩ tɩ sẽŋɛ Bɛtelɛm ka bɩsɛ sɛla n ẽŋɛ tɩ Nawẽnnɛ yele tɩ la.»
La ba isge mɛ tɔtɔ sẽŋɛ ka paagɛ yẽ Amaari, la Azozɛfʋ, la bilɩa la tɩ a gã dũnsi yɔnnɔ daka pʋam.
La dũnsĩima la n yẽ ẽ na, ba tɔgɛ bia la yelle wʋ malɛka la n yele ba se'em na.
Tɩ sɛba wuu n wõm dũnsĩima la n yele se'em na, la di'ige ba mɛ.
La Amaari tẽ'esrɩ yɛla wã wuu mɛ a sũure pʋam.
Dee tɩ dũnsĩima la daan lɛbra dee pẽgra Nawẽnnɛ yʋ'ʋrɛ zozo'e, se'ere n soe la, ba wõm dee yẽ malɛka la n yele ba se'em na.

La dabsa anii la daarɛ n daan paagɛ, tɩ ba botɩ ba wã bia la wʋ Amoyisi gõŋɔ n pa'alɛ tɩ ba wã ba budimto se'em na. Tɩ ba sɩ a yʋ'ʋrɛ tɩ Azezi, yʋ'ʋr-sɛka tɩ malɛka daan yele ba tɩ ba sɩ ẽ na, wakat-sɛka tɩ Amaari daan nãn ka yõkɛ a pʋʋrɛ la.
La wakatɛ la n paagɛ tɩ Amaari malgɛ a mẽŋa Nawẽnnɛ zẽ'am wʋ Amoyisi lɔɔ gõŋɔ n yele se'em na. Tɩ Azozɛfʋ la Amaari tarɩ bia la sẽŋɛ Zerizalɛm Wẽnde-kãtʋm tɩ ba dɩkɛ ẽ bɔ Nawẽnnɛ.
Se'ere n soe la, la gʋlsɛ Nawẽnnɛ lɔɔ gõŋɔ la pʋam tɩ budib-kẽema woo wʋn dɛna la Nawẽnnɛ bõnɔ.
Ba daan sẽŋɛ tɩ ba kãabɛ la sɛla bɔ Nawẽnnɛ wʋ Nawẽnnɛ lɔɔ la n yele se'em na. La yetɩ, ba bɔ mõom dawɛma bayi bɩɩ na'adawen-biɛ bayi.
Wakat-ẽŋa tɩ bʋraa daan boe Zerizalɛm tɩ a yʋ'ʋrɛ dɛna Asimeyõ. A de la nẽr-sõŋɔ dee sakra Nawẽnnɛ sõŋa, dee gu'ura Ɩsrayɛlɩ Fãagra la n sẽm na. Tɩ Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa bɔna la ẽ.
La Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa la daan põn yele ẽ tɩ a kãn ki, sãn dagna tɩ a yẽ la Krisi tɩ Zuudãana Nawẽnnɛ wʋn tõm tɩ a wa'am na.
Tɩ Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa la botɩ a sẽŋɛ Wẽnde-kãtʋm na, la wakat-ẽŋa tɩ Azezi sɔ, la a ma daan tarɩ ẽ sẽŋɛ tɩ ba ẽŋɛ Nawẽnnɛ lɔɔ n yele se'em na.
Tɩ Asimeyõ to'oge bia la a nu'usum, pʋ'ʋsɛ Nawẽnnɛ yetɩ:
«Zuudãana, lɛɛlɛ wã, fõn bĩŋe nõorɛ se'em na ẽŋɛ mɛ.
Fʋ yãŋa tã basɛ mam n de fõn tõntõnna sore
tɩ m basɛ dũnia dee wa'am fõn yire la sũ-mã'asʋm.
Se'ere n soe la, m nini yẽ Fãagra la tɩ fʋ tõm na,
ẽŋa tɩ fʋ mãasʋm bɔ tɩ dũnia nẽrba wuu yẽ.
Ẽŋa n de peelem n wʋn botɩ la nẽegɛ bɔ buuri wuu tɩ ba bãŋɛ fõn,
dee wʋn botɩ tõma Ɩsrayɛlɩ dõma n de fõn nẽrba yẽ pẽka.»
La Asimeyõ n tɔgɛ bia la yɛla la, la daan di'ige bia la sɔ, la a ma mɛ.

Tɩ Asimeyõ kã kã'a-sõma bɔ ba, dee yele bia la ma Amaari tɩ Nawẽnnɛ looge bi-ẽna tɩ a botɩ Ɩsrayɛlɩ dõma zozo'e lui mɛ, dee tɩ zozo'e mẽ isge. Ẽŋa n wʋn pa'alɛ Nawẽnnɛ tõoma, dee tɩ nẽrba zozo'e wʋn zagsɛ ẽ.
Ẽŋa n wʋn nẽegɛ pa'alɛ sɛla n sʋgɛ ba pʋtẽ'era pʋam na. Dee yetɩ, Amaari mẽŋa wʋn yẽ sũ-sã'aŋɔ wʋ sʋ'a tɩ ba sɩɩsɛ lʋ nẽra sũure la.

Wakat-ẽŋa Nawẽnnɛ nõtɔ'ɔs-pɔka n mẽ daan boe tɩ a yʋ'ʋrɛ dɛna A'annɩ. Tɩ a sɔ yʋ'ʋrɛ dɛna Afanuyɛlɩ, a de la Azɛɛrɩ buuri nẽra. Ẽŋa daan de la pug-sa'arɛ dee ele sɩra paagɛ yʋʋma ayopɔɩ tɩ a sɩra la ki.

La a sɩra la n ki la, a yãŋa de la pɔkõorɛ kʋrgɛ halɩ ka paagɛ yʋʋma pinii la anaasɩ. A daan boe la Wẽnde-kãtʋm na wakatɛ wuu, tõnna bɔ'ɔra Nawẽnnɛ wʋntɛɛŋa la yʋ'ʋŋɔ wuu ka basra, dee lʋta nõorɛ sɔsra Nawẽnnɛ.
Wakat-ẽŋa tɩ a paagɛ ba zẽ'am, pʋ'ʋsɛ Nawẽnnɛ a yel-sõnnɛ, dee tɔgra bia la yelle bɔ'ɔra sɛba wuu n gu'uri wakat-sɛka tɩ Nawẽnnɛ wʋn le fãagɛ Zerizalɛm nẽrba la basɛ.
La ban ẽŋɛ sɛla woo ba'asɛ wʋ Nawẽnnɛ lɔɔ la n yele se'em na, tɩ Azozɛfʋ la Amaari lebe kule Nazarɛtɩ n boe Galile so'olʋm na.
Tɩ bia la bɩta tara pãŋa la yɛm, dee tɩ Nawẽnnɛ yel-sõnnɛ bɔna la ẽ.
Yʋʋnɛ woo Azezi sɔ, la a ma sẽnnɩ la Zerizalɛm dita Zɔɔg-basɛ kibsa.
La Azezi daan tarɩ la yʋʋma pia la ayi, dee tɩ ba sẽŋɛ kibsa la wʋ ban ẽn ɩta se'em na.
La kibsa la dabsa n ba'asɛ la, tɩ ba lebe kulla. Dee tɩ Azezi weege Zerizalɛm, tɩ a sɔ la a ma daan ka bãŋɛ tɩ a weege ya.
Ba daan tẽ'esɛ tɩ a dolɩ la ba tẽŋa dõma, dee sẽŋɛ dabsrɛ mõonɛ sẽnnɛ. La ban ɛ ẽ ba nẽrba la, la ba sɩrdõma zẽ'am dee ka yẽ ẽ na,
ba daan lebe la Zerizalɛm ka ɛɛra ẽ.
La dabsa atã daarɛ tɩ ba yẽ ẽ Wẽnde-kãtʋm na, tɩ a zĩ la karẽnsãandõma sɛlsra, dee sɔkra ba sokrɩsɩ.
Azezi n daan tarɩ yɛm la ẽn lergrɩ se'em na, di'ige sɛba wuu n daan wõm na mɛ.
La a dɔgrɩba la n yẽ ẽ na, la ba di'ige ba mɛ. Tɩ a ma soke ẽ yetɩ: «M bia, bẽm tɩ fʋ ẽŋɛ tɩ wãna? Mam la fʋ sɔ ɛ fʋ mɛ halɩ la sũ-sã'aŋɔ.»
Tɩ a lerge ba yetɩ: «Bẽm tɩ ya ɛɛra ma? Yãma ka mi tɩ la masɛ mɛ tɩ mam bɔna m Sɔ yire wã bɩɩ?»
Tɩ ba ka bãŋɛ Azezi yetɔga la võorɛ.
Tɩ Azezi doose ba kule Nazarɛtɩ, dee sakɛ ba nõorɛ. Tɩ a ma tẽ'esra yel-bãma wuu a sũurum.
Tɩ Azezi bɩta, tɩ a yɛm pa'asra, tɩ Nawẽnnɛ la nẽrba nõŋɛ ẽ.

Na-keko Atibɛɛrɩ n daan di na'am na, a yʋʋma pia la anuu yʋʋnɛ, tɩ Apõnsɩ-pilatɩ de Zude gɔmna, dee tɩ A'erɔdɩ dɛna Galile naba, tɩ a sɔbia Afilipi mẽ dɛna Itiire la Trakoniti naba. Tɩ Alisaniyasɩ dɛna Abilɛnɩ naba.
La A'annɩ, la Akayifu de la Nawẽnnɛ kãabgɔ kẽma nẽŋadõma. Wakat-ẽŋa tɩ Azakari bia Azã daan boe mõom tɩ Nawẽnnɛ tɔgɛ bɔ ẽ.
Bɛla tɩ Azã sẽŋɛ tẽn-sɛba n boe Zʋrdẽ kʋlaa nõorʋm la wuu ka mõola yetɩ, ba teege yɛm basɛ tõon-be'ero, tɩ ba mise ba ko'om pʋam tɩ Nawẽnnɛ basɛ ba tõon-be'ero taalɛ.
Azã n mõolɩ se'em na ẽŋɛ wʋ Nawẽnnɛ nõtɔ'ɔsa A'ezayi n yʋʋn gʋlsɛ gõŋɔ pʋam se'em na. A yʋʋn yetɩ:
«Nẽra n mõolɩ weem tɔgra ke'enke'em yetɩ:
Malgɛ-ya sore sõŋa gu'ura Zuudãana,
malgɛ-ya sɔa la tɩ ba tɔ tẽntẽesɩ bɔ ẽ.
Palɛ-ya bɔgsɩ la wuu,
sirge-ya tãnsɩ la kũnkũma la wuu,
mãalɛ-ya so-gɔlma tɩ ba tɔ tẽntẽesɩ,
palɛ-ya sorɔɔrɔ bogro tɩ ba naagɛ taaba.
Bɛla nẽrsaalba wuu wʋn yẽ Nawẽnnɛ n ɩtɩ se'em fãagra nẽrba basra.»
La nẽrba zozo'e n sẽŋɛ ka lagsɛ Azã zẽ'am tɩ a mise ba ko'om pʋam. Tɩ a yele ba yetɩ: «Yãma ãn wʋ kãmpẽesɩ buuri, ãne n yele yãma yetɩ, ya tã wʋn zoe põsɛ Nawẽnnɛ sɩbgrɛ n sẽm na?

Tõm-ya tõon-sɛba n pa'alɩ tɩ ya teege yɛm basɛ tõon-be'ero. Da kãn tẽ'esɛ-ya tɩ Abraham n de yãma yaaba la, ya wʋn põsɛ Nawẽnnɛ sɩbgrɛ mɛ. Mam yetɩ yãma mɛ tɩ, Nawẽnnɛ tã wʋn dɩkɛ kuga wã botɩ ba lebge Abraham yɩɩsɩ.
Nẽra n põn tara lɩa a nu'usum tɩ a lʋbɛ tɩɩsɩ. Tɩ-sɛka woo n ka wɔnnɩ biɛ sõma la, a wʋn lʋbɛ ẽ mɛ, lobge bugum pʋam tɩ bugum di ẽ.»
Tɩ nẽr-kʋʋŋɔ la soke ẽ yetɩ: «Tɩ wʋn ẽŋɛ la wãne?»
Tɩ Azã lerge ba yetɩ, sɛka n tarɩ futo bayi, a looge bɔ sɛka n ka tarɩ. Tɩ sɛka n tarɩ dia, mẽ ẽŋɛ bɔ sɛka n ka tarɩ.
Tɩ lampo-tɔ'ɔsrɩba mẽ wa'am tɩ a mise ba ko'om pʋam, soke ẽ yetɩ: «Karẽnsãama, tɩ wʋn ẽŋɛ la wãne?»
Tɩ a lerge ba yetɩ: «Da to'oge-ya ligri gãŋɛ ban yele ya se'em na.»
Tɩ sʋdaasɩ mẽ soke ẽ yetɩ: «Dee tõma, tɩ wʋn ẽŋɛ la wãne?» Tɩ a yele ba yetɩ: «Da to'oge-ya nẽra bõnɔ la pãŋa bɩɩ dõrɛ nẽrba to'oge sɛla. Basɛ-ya tɩ ya yɔɔrɔ la seke ya.»
Tɩ nẽrba daan zɛ gu'ura tɩ Nawẽnnɛ fãagɛ ba, la ba wuu daan sokrɩ la ba mẽŋa bɔɔra tɩ ba bãŋɛ, Azã na'an dɛna Krisi tɩ ba gu'ura la bɩɩ?

La ban tẽ'esrɩ bɛla la, tɩ Azã yele ba yetɩ: «Mam misri ya la ko'om pʋam, la nẽra n boe tara pãŋa gãnna mam sẽna, la mam põn ka masɛ tɩ m pirge a tagra bɔ ẽ. Ẽŋa n wʋn mise ya Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa, la bugum pʋam.
A wʋn welge nẽrba wʋ nẽra n zãlɩ pɩ'ɩgɔ a nu'usum tɩ a vaagɛ a si zɛɛŋa yeele ẽŋɛ a bãarɛ pʋam, dee yõ urgo la, la bugum n ka kĩŋri.»
Yetɔg-bãna, la yetɔga basɛba zozo'e tɩ Azã daan dɩkɛ zãsʋm nẽrba la pa'alɛ ba Nawẽnnɛ kõ-yẽlga la.
La Azã daan zɛrgɛ naba A'erɔdɩ mɛ, se'ere n soe la, a daan fãagɛ la a kẽema pɔga yʋ'ʋrɛ n de A'erodɩadɩ di, dee tõm tõon-be'ero basɛba zozo'e pa'asɛ, tɩ Azã yele ẽ yetɩ la ka ãn sõŋa.
La A'erɔdɩ daan yõkɛ Azã ka pagɛ mɛ, bɛla A'erɔdɩ malɩn tõm la tõon-be'ero pa'asɛ.
Azã n daan misri nẽrba wuu ko'om pʋam na, a daan mẽ mise Azezi mɛ. La Azezi daan pʋ'ʋsrɩ la Nawẽnnɛ, tɩ saazuum yo'oge,
tɩ Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa sige a zuo, tɩ ba yẽ ẽ tɩ a wõn na na'adawenne. Tɩ kõa ze'ele Nawẽnnɛ yire yetɩ: «Fõn de la mam Dayʋa tɩ mam nõŋɛ la m sũure wuu. Fʋ paagɛ la mam yɛm.»
La Azezi n daan pĩ'ilum a tõoma la, a daan tarɩ la yʋʋma pitã, tɩ nẽrba daan tẽ'esra tɩ a de la Azozɛfʋ bia.
Azozɛfʋ sɔ daan de la Aheli,
tɩ Aheli sɔ dɛna Amata,
tɩ Amata sɔ dɛna Alevi,
tɩ Alevi sɔ dɛna Amelki,
tɩ Amelki sɔ dɛna Azanayi,
tɩ Azanayi sɔ dɛna Azozɛfʋ,
tɩ Azozɛfʋ sɔ dɛna Amatatɩasɩ,
tɩ Amatatɩasɩ sɔ dɛna Amõsɩ,
tɩ Amõsɩ sɔ dɛna Anahum,
tɩ Anahum sɔ dɛna A'esli,
tɩ A'esli sɔ dɛna Anagayi,
tɩ Anagayi sɔ dɛna Amatɩ,
tɩ Amatɩ sɔ dɛna Amatatɩasɩ,
tɩ Amatatɩasɩ sɔ dɛna Asemeyẽ,
tɩ Asemeyẽ sɔ dɛna Azozɛkɩ,
tɩ Azozɛkɩ sɔ dɛna Azoda,
tɩ Azoda sɔ dɛna Azoanã,
tɩ Azoanã sɔ dɛna Areza,
tɩ Areza sɔ dɛna Azorobabɛlɩ,
tɩ Azorobabɛlɩ sɔ dɛna Asalatɩyɛlɩ,
tɩ Asalatɩyɛlɩ sɔ dɛna Aneri,
tɩ Aneri sɔ dɛna Amelki,
tɩ Amelki sɔ dɛna Adi,
tɩ Adi sɔ dɛna Akozam,
tɩ Akozam sɔ dɛna A'elmadam,
tɩ A'elmadam sɔ dɛna A'eri,
tɩ A'eri sɔ dɛna Azoze,
tɩ Azoze sɔ dɛna A'eliezɛɛrɩ,
tɩ A'eliezɛɛrɩ sɔ dɛna Azorim,
tɩ Azorim sɔ dɛna Amata,
tɩ Amata sɔ dɛna Alevi,
tɩ Alevi sɔ dɛna Asimeyõ,
tɩ Asimeyõ sɔ dɛna Azuda,
tɩ Azuda sɔ dɛna Azozɛfʋ,
tɩ Azozɛfʋ sɔ dɛna Azonam,
tɩ Azonam sɔ dɛna A'eliakim,
tɩ A'eliakim sɔ dɛna Ameleya,
tɩ Ameleya sɔ dɛna Amena,
tɩ Amena sɔ dɛna Amatata,
tɩ Amatata sɔ dɛna Anatã,
tɩ Anatã sɔ dɛna Adavidi,
tɩ Adavidi sɔ dɛna Azese,
tɩ Azese sɔ dɛna A'obɛɛdɩ,
tɩ A'obɛɛdɩ sɔ dɛna Aboozɩ,
tɩ Aboozɩ sɔ dɛna Asala,
tɩ Asala sɔ dɛna Anaasõ,
tɩ Anaasõ sɔ dɛna Aminadabɩ,
tɩ Aminadabɩ sɔ dɛna Admẽ,
tɩ Admẽ sɔ dɛna Arni,
tɩ Arni sɔ dɛna A'ɛsrɔm,
tɩ A'ɛsrɔm sɔ dɛna Afarɛsɩ,
tɩ Afarɛsɩ sɔ dɛna Azuda,
tɩ Azuda sɔ dɛna Azakɔbɩ,
tɩ Azakɔbɩ sɔ dɛna A'izakɩ,
tɩ A'izakɩ sɔ dɛna Abraham,
tɩ Abraham sɔ dɛna Atara,
tɩ Atara sɔ dɛna Anakɔɔrɩ,
tɩ Anakɔɔrɩ sɔ dɛna Aseruki,
tɩ Aseruki sɔ dɛna Arago,
tɩ Arago sɔ dɛna Afalɛkɩ,
tɩ Afalɛkɩ sɔ dɛna A'ebɛrɩ,
tɩ A'ebɛrɩ sɔ dɛna Asala,
tɩ Asala sɔ dɛna Akayinam,
tɩ Akayinam sɔ dɛna Arfasadɩ,
tɩ Arfasadɩ sɔ dɛna Asɛm,
tɩ Asɛm sɔ dɛna Anoe,
tɩ Anoe sɔ dɛna Alemɛkɩ,
tɩ Alemɛkɩ sɔ dɛna Amatusala,
tɩ Amatusala sɔ dɛna A'enõkɩ,
tɩ A'enõkɩ sɔ dɛna Azarɛdɩ,
tɩ Azarɛdɩ sɔ dɛna Amalelɛlɩ,
tɩ Amalelɛlɩ sɔ dɛna Akayinam,
tɩ Akayinam sɔ dɛna A'enõsɩ,
tɩ A'enõsɩ sɔ dɛna Asetɩ,
tɩ Asetɩ sɔ dɛna Adam,
la Nawẽnnɛ n nãam Adam.
Azezi daan ze'ele la Zʋrdẽ kʋlaam lebe, tɩ Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa la kɔ'ɔn bɔna la ẽ. La Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa la tarɩ ẽ sẽŋɛ la weem.
Bilam tɩ Asũtãana makɛ ẽ dabsa pinaasɩ. La dabsa pinaasɩ la pʋam a ka di sɛla sɛla, tɩ a kɔm dõnna.
Bɛla tɩ Asũtãana yele ẽ yetɩ: «Fʋ sãn sɩrɩ dɛna la Nawẽnnɛ Dayʋa, fʋ yele kugre wã tɩ a lebge dia.»
Tɩ Azezi lerge ẽ yetɩ: «La gʋlsɛ Nawẽnnɛ gõŋɔ pʋam yetɩ:
‹Nẽrsaala kãn vɔa dia mã'a ĩyã.› »
Tɩ Asũtãana tarɩ ẽ sẽŋɛ ka zom tãŋa zuo, pa'alɛ ẽ dũnia so'olʋm wuu nif-kabsɩgɔ pʋam.
Dee yele ẽ yetɩ: «Bãna wuu de la mam n soe, bɛla mam tã wʋn bɔ nẽr-sɛka woo tɩ mam boorɩ mɛ. Mam wʋn bɔ fɔ dũnia wã na'am la wuu, la so'olʋm bãma wuu pẽka.
Fʋ sãn ka dũma tẽŋa nã'asɛ mam, ba wuu wʋn dɛna la fõn dẽnnɛ.»
Tɩ Azezi lerge ẽ yetɩ: «La gʋlsɛ Nawẽnnɛ yetɔga pʋam yetɩ:
‹Nã'asra Zuudãana Nawẽnnɛ,
dee sakra ẽŋa ayɩla mã'a.› »
Tɩ Asũtãana le tarɩ ẽ sẽŋɛ Zerizalɛm ka zom Wẽnde-kãtɛ la zuo yele ẽ yetɩ: «Fʋ sãn sɩrɩ dɛna la Nawẽnnɛ Dayʋa, fʋ ze'ele kalam ẽkɛ bisge tẽŋa,
tɩ la gʋlsɛ yetɩ:
‹Nawẽnnɛ wʋn tõm a malɛkadõma tɩ ba gu fo.
La ba wʋn kɔkɛ fɔ la ba nu'usi
tɩ fʋ kãn wẽ fʋ nã'arɛ la kugre.› »
Tɩ Azezi lerge yetɩ: «Nawẽnnɛ gõŋɔ yele tɩ:
‹Da makɛ fʋ Zuudãana Nawẽnnɛ bɩsɛ.› »
La Asũtãana n daan makɛ Azezi bɛla wuu zɩgɛ koŋe la, a basɛ ẽ dee gu'ura la a sãn le yẽ folle.
La Azezi daan lebe Galile la Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa la pãŋa, tɩ a yʋ'ʋrɛ kɔ'ɔn saagɛ zẽ'a wuu.
La a ẽn zãsna la nẽrba Nawẽnnɛ yetɔga Zifdõma wẽndeto pʋam, tɩ ba wuu pẽgra ẽ.
La Azezi daan sẽŋɛ la Nazarɛtɩ, ban daan uge ẽ tẽn-sɛka la. Tɩ Zifdõma vo'osgo daarɛ tɩ a kẽ ba wẽndeem wʋ ẽŋa ẽn kẽ'era se'em na, yãŋa isge ze'ele tɩ a karẽŋɛ.
Tɩ ba dɩkɛ gõn-sɛka tɩ Nawẽnnɛ nõtɔ'ɔsa A'ezayi yʋʋn gʋlsɛ la bɔ ẽ. Tɩ a lakɛ gõŋɔ la yẽ zẽ'e-sɛka tɩ a boorɩ la, yãŋa karẽŋɛ wʋ zẽ'a la n yele se'em na:
«Zuudãana Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa n boe la mam,
ẽŋa n looge mam bɔ mam pãŋa,
tɩ m bʋglɛ sũ-sã'aŋɔ dõma sũure,
tɩ m mõolɛ kõ-yẽlga la bɔ nasdõma,
dee tõm mam tɩ m tɔgɛ bɔ yamsɩ tɩ ba wʋn yẽ yolsgo,
dee tɔgɛ bɔ fɔɔsɩ tɩ ba nini wʋn pike,
dee yese sɛba n boe nãmsgɔ pʋam la basɛ,
dee mõolɛ tɩ wakatɛ paagɛ ya,
tɩ Zuudãana wʋn ẽŋɛ nẽrba yel-sõnnɛ.»
La ẽn karẽŋɛ ba'asɛ la, a lebe laglɛ gõŋɔ la mɛ bɔ sɛka n gu'uri gõnnɔ la, dee zĩ'ire. Tɩ nẽr-sɛba wuu n boe wẽndeem na bɩsra ẽ zĩi.
Tɩ a yele ba yetɩ: «Zĩna, lɛɛlɛ wã, sɛla tɩ ba gʋlsɛ Nawẽnnɛ gõŋɔ pʋam tɩ yãma wõm wã, la ẽŋɛ wʋ lan yele se'em na.»
Tɩ ba tɔgɛ pẽgɛ ẽ, la a yetɔg-sõma la tɩ a tɔgɛ la di'ige ba mɛ. Dee tɩ ba sɔkra yetɩ, la ka de Azozɛfʋ dayʋa la n wãna?

Tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: «Mam põn mina tɩ ya wʋn makɛ makrɛ ẽna bɔ mam yetɩ: ‹Tɩɩm dãana, tɩbɛ fʋ mẽŋa.› La ya wʋn ken yele mam yetɩ: ‹Bõn-sɛba tɩ fʋ daan ẽŋɛ Kapɛrnaʋm tẽŋam tɩ tõma wõm na, ẽŋɛ bɛla nõo fʋ mẽŋa tẽŋam kalam mẽ.› »
Tɩ Azezi le yele ba yetɩ: «Mam yetɩ ya la sɩra, tɩ ba ka nannɩ Nawẽnnɛ nõtɔ'ɔsa baa ayɩla a mẽŋa tẽŋam.
La de la sɩra tɩ mam yetɩ ya tɩ: Pɔkõpa zozo'e yʋʋn boe Ɩsrayɛlɩ tẽŋam A'eli wakatʋm na mɛ, la saaga ka ni yʋʋma atã la wõr-sɩyoobɩ, tɩ kɔm yʋʋn ba bɔna tẽŋa la wuu pʋam.
La Nawẽnnɛ ka tõm A'eli yetɩ a sẽŋɛ pɔkõ-bãma zẽ'am. A tõm ẽ na pɔkõorɛ n boe Sarɛpɩta n boe Sidõ so'olʋm pʋam na zẽ'am.
La kõnkɔma zozo'e yʋʋn boe Ɩsrayɛlɩ tẽŋam A'elize wakatʋm na mɛ, la baa ayɩla ka yẽ ĩmã'asʋm, la Anãamã sɛka n yese Siiri so'olʋm na mã'a n yẽ ĩmã'asʋm.»
La ban wõm bɛla la, sɛba n boe wẽndeego la pʋam wuu sũure daan yĩige mɛ.
Tɩ ba isge ve'ege Azezi tẽŋa la pʋam yese. Tẽŋa la boe la tãŋa zuo. Tɩ ba tarɩ ẽ sẽŋɛ zẽ'e-sɛka n zãagɛ la tẽŋa la, ba daan boorɩ tɩ ba zã'agɛ ẽ basɛ mɛ tɩ a lui ki.
La Azezi kẽ la nẽr-kʋʋŋɔ la tẽŋasʋka fõrgɛ.
Bɛla poorʋm, Azezi sẽŋɛ la Galile tẽŋa ayẽma yʋ'ʋrɛ n de Kapɛrnaʋm, tɩ Zifdõma vo'osgo daarɛ daan paagɛ, tɩ a sẽŋɛ ba wẽndeem ka zãsna nẽrba Nawẽnnɛ yetɔga.
Tɩ a zãsŋɔ la daan di'ige ba, a yetɔga la n tarɩ pãŋa la ĩyã.
Tɩ bʋraa daan bɔna wẽndeem na tɩ kʋlkã'arga tara ẽ, tɩ a tĩi kaasɛ yetɩ:
