«A'a! Azezi n de Nazarɛtɩ nẽra, fõn bẽm yelle n boe la tõma? Fõn wa'am tɩ fʋ sã'am na tõma? Mam mi fõn de sɛka, fõn de la pʋpeelem dãana n ze'ele Nawẽnnɛ zẽ'am.»
Tɩ Azezi tãsɛ kʋlkã'arga la yetɩ: «Go'oge, yese dee basɛ bʋraa la!» Tɩ kʋlkã'arga la lʋbɛ ẽ nẽrba la wuu nẽŋam, dee yese, la a ka pɔglʋm ẽ.
Tɩ ba wuu palẽŋa ẽkɛ tɩ ba yele taaba yetɩ: «Yetɔga ẽna de la bẽm? A tarɩ la pãŋa la ke'eŋo, dee tãsra kʋlkã'arsɩ, tɩ ba yɛsra.»
Tɩ Azezi yʋ'ʋrɛ saagɛ zẽ'e-bãma wuu.
Tɩ Azezi isge ba wẽndeego la pʋam yese ka kẽ Asimõ yire. Tɩ Asimõ dɛɛm-pɔka bẽ'era, tɩ a ĩyã ba tʋlgɛ. Tɩ ba tɔgɛ a yelle bɔ Azezi,
tɩ a sẽŋɛ ka suure a zuo, dee tãsɛ bã'a la yetɩ a basɛ ẽ. La ẽn yele la, bã'a la basɛ ẽ mɛ, tɩ a isge tɔtɔ ẽŋɛ ba sãanɔ.
Tɩ wẽnnɛ daan bɔna mĩ kẽ'era, tɩ ba tarɩ bã'adõma tɩ bã'asɩ buuri to'oto'ore tarɩ ba, sẽŋɛ Azezi zẽ'am. Tɩ Azezi dɩkɛ a nu'usi paglɛ ba nẽra woo zuo, tɩ ba wuu yẽ ĩmã'asʋm.

La kʋlkã'arsɩ daan yesrɩ mɛ dee basra nẽrba zozo'e, dee kaasra yetɩ: «Fõn de la Nawẽnnɛ Dayʋa.» Tɩ Azezi tãsɛ ba, ka basɛ tɩ ba tɔgɛ sɛla sɛla, se'ere n soe la, ba daan bãŋɛ tɩ a de la Krisi n de Fãagra la.
Tɩ beere wiige, tɩ Azezi yese tẽŋa la pʋam sẽŋɛ zẽ'e-sɛka tɩ nẽra ka boe mĩ. Tɩ nẽrba zozo'e ɛɛra ẽ. La ba daan yẽ ẽ mɛ, bɔɔra tɩ ba gu ẽ tɩ a da le yese ba zẽ'am.
La Azezi yele ba yetɩ: «Dẽnɩ tɩ mam mõolɛ kõ-yẽlga pa'alɛ Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm n ãn se'em tẽnsɩ basɛba mẽ pʋam, la de la bɛla ĩyã tɩ Nawẽnnɛ tõm mam.»
La a ẽn mõola kõ-yẽlga la Zifdõma wẽndeto pʋam mɛ.
Daarɛ ayɩla Azezi ze la Zenezarɛtɩ mõgrɛ nõorʋm, tɩ nẽr-kʋʋŋɔ kaagɛ ẽ mikra taaba bɔɔra tɩ ba wõm Nawẽnnɛ yetɔga.
Tɩ a yẽ õornɔ bayi n ze mõgrɛ la nõorʋm, tɩ zũn-yõgrɩba sige pɛɛra ba yʋgsɩ dee basɛ.

La õorŋɔ ayɩla daan de la Asimõ bõnɔ. Tɩ Azezi kẽ õorŋɔ la pʋam, dee yele Asimõ yetɩ: «Mõm õorŋɔ la tɩ a sẽŋɛ nẽŋa fẽe.» La Azezi n yele bɛla la, Asimõ mõm õorŋɔ la mɛ, tɩ a lebe ko'om pʋam fẽe. Tɩ Azezi zĩ'ire õorŋɔ la pʋam pa'alɛ nẽrba la.
La ẽn pa'alɛ ba ba'asɛ la, tɩ a yele Asimõ yetɩ: «Mõm õorŋɔ la tɩ a sẽŋɛ kʋlko'om tɩ ya lobe yʋgsɩ la.»
Tɩ Asimõ lerge ẽ yetɩ: «Zuudãana, tõma nãmsɛ mɛ yʋ'ʋŋɔ wã wuu dee ka yõkɛ sɛla sɛla. La fõn yele la ĩyã, tɩ wʋn lobe tɩ yʋgsɩ la.»
Tɩ ba sẽŋɛ kʋlko'om ka lobe ba yʋgsɩ la, yãŋa yõgɛ zũma ba zo'oge, tɩ ba yʋgsɩ la zɩgra la ba ãasʋm.
Tɩ ba yɩbsɛ ba taaba õorŋɔ ayɩla la pʋam yetɩ, ba wa'am sõŋɛ ba. La ba taaba la sẽŋɛ mɛ ka sõŋɛ ba, tɩ ba pɩrɛ õornɔ bayi la wuu la zũma, halɩ tɩ ba zɩgra la ba mise.
La Asimõ yʋ'ʋrɛ ayɩla n de Apɩyɛɛrɩ n yẽ bɛla la, tɩ a ka dũma tẽŋa Azezi nẽŋam yele ẽ yetɩ: «Zuudãana, fõrgɛ mam zẽ'am, se'ere n soe la, mam de la tõon-be'ero dãana.»
Se'ere n soe tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ yele bɛla la, ẽŋa la a taaba la n daan yẽ zũma la tɩ ba yõgɛ se'em na botɩ ba palẽŋa n ẽkɛ.

La dabeem mẽ n daan kẽ Azebede dayɔɔsɩ Azakɩ la Azã n daan ẽn dɔla la Asimõ tõnna la. Tɩ Azezi yele Asimõ yetɩ: «Da zoe dabeem, tɩ lan sẽŋɛ zĩna wɛ'ɛsa wuu, fʋ wʋn ɛɛra la nẽrba tɩ ba dɔla mam wʋ yãma n yõgrɩ zũma se'em na.»
La Azezi n yele bɛla la, ba tarɩ õornɔ la dooge mɛ yãŋa basɛ sɛla woo dee dɔla Azezi.

La Azezi daan boe la tẽŋa ayẽma pʋam, tɩ bʋraa mẽ bɔna mĩ dɛna kõnkonne, la bã'a la kẽ a ĩyã zo'oge mɛ. Tɩ a yẽ Azezi ka ka dũma Azezi nẽŋam dɩkɛ a nẽŋa võglɛ tẽŋa sose ẽ yetɩ: «Zuudãana, fʋ sãn bɔɔra, fʋ tã wʋn basɛ tɩ m yẽ ĩmã'asʋm mɛ le ãna sõŋa.»
Tɩ Azezi tẽegɛ a nu'ugo kalʋm ẽ dee yetɩ: «Mam bɔɔra, yẽ ĩmã'asʋm le ãna sõŋa.» Tɩ bã'a la basɛ ẽ bilam mẽŋa.

Tɩ Azezi yele ẽ yetɩ: «Da kãn yele nẽra nẽra, la sẽŋɛ Nawẽnnɛ kãabgɔ kẽema zẽ'am ka pa'alɛ ẽ fʋ mẽŋa tɩ a bɩsɛ, dee bɔ Nawẽnnɛ sɛla tɩ Amoyisi yʋʋn gʋlsɛ yetɩ ba bɔ la, tɩ la pa'alɛ ba tɩ fʋ sɩrɩ yẽ ĩmã'asʋm.»
La bɛla wuu, Azezi yelle daan malɩn saagɛ la zẽ'esɩ zozo'e, tɩ nẽrba zozo'e lagsɛ tɩ ba selse a yetɔga la, dee tɩ a botɩ ba bã'adõma yẽ ĩmã'asʋm.
La Azezi ẽn sẽnna la zẽ'e-sɛka tɩ nẽrba ka boe la pʋ'ʋsra Nawẽnnɛ.

La daarɛ ayɩla tɩ Azezi bɔna mĩ pa'ala nẽrba Nawẽnnɛ yetɔga, tɩ Farisi dõma, la Nawẽnnɛ lɔɔ karẽnsãandõma n ze'ele Galile, la Zude, la Zerizalɛm mẽ zẽa mĩ sɛlsra. Tɩ Zuudãana Nawẽnnɛ pãŋa daan bɔna la Azezi, tɩ a botɩ bã'adõma yẽ ĩmã'asʋm.
Tɩ bʋraasɩ zɛ bʋraa n de kɔɔrŋɔ gã a bõn-gã'ala pʋam wa'am. La ba boorɩ tɩ ba tarɩ ẽ kẽ la de-sɛka tɩ Azezi boe mĩ na pʋam, ka bĩŋe ẽ Azezi nẽŋam.

La nẽrba la mike mɛ, tɩ ba ka yẽ folle tarɩ ẽ kẽ. Bɛla ĩyã tɩ ba zɛ kɔɔrŋɔ la zom gɔsgɔ, ka lakɛ gɔsgɔ la bɔbrɛ ayɩla, doose bilam sike ẽ la a bõn-gã'ala la nẽrba la sʋkam bĩŋe ẽ Azezi nẽŋam.
Tɩ Azezi yẽ ban bɔ ẽŋa sɩra se'em na, yele kɔɔrŋɔ la yetɩ: «M sɩrɛ, fʋ tõon-be'ero taalɛ ka le bɔna fʋ zuo.»
Tɩ Nawẽnnɛ lɔɔ karẽnsãandõma, la Farisi dõma la tẽ'esra yetɩ: «A tẽ'esɛ tɩ ẽŋa de la ãne tɔgra pɔ'ɔra Nawẽnnɛ. Ãne n tã wʋn basɛ nẽra tõon-be'ero taalɛ, sãn dagna Nawẽnnɛ mã'a?»
Tɩ Azezi bãŋɛ ban tẽ'esrɩ se'em na, soke ba yetɩ: «Bẽm tɩ ya tẽ'esra wãna wã?
Bẽm n de nãana gãnna, mam sãn yele kɔɔrŋɔ la yetɩ, a tõon-be'ero taalɛ ka le bɔna a zuo n de nãana, bɩɩ mam sãn yele ẽ yetɩ, a isge sẽnna n de nãana?
Bɛla m wʋn botɩ ya bãŋɛ tɩ Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la tarɩ pãŋa dũnia zuo wʋn basɛ nẽrba tõon-be'ero taalɛ.» A yele bɛla dee yele kɔɔrŋɔ la yetɩ: «Mam yetɩ fʋ tɩ fʋ isge dɩkɛ fʋ bõn-gã'ala la kule.»
Bilam mẽŋa tɩ kɔɔrŋɔ la isge ba wuu nẽŋam dɩkɛ a bõn-gã'ala la kulla, dee pẽgra Nawẽnnɛ.
Tɩ nẽrba la wuu palẽŋa ẽkɛ, tɩ dabeem kẽ ba, tɩ ba pẽgra Nawẽnnɛ yetɩ: «Tɩ zĩna yẽ bõn-yãlma.»
Bɛla poorʋm tɩ Azezi yese sẽŋɛ ka yẽ lampo-tɔ'ɔsa yʋ'ʋrɛ n de Alevi, tɩ a zĩ lampo to'osgo deem. Tɩ a yele ẽ yetɩ: «Isge dɔla mam.»
Tɩ a isge basɛ sɛla woo dee dɔla ẽ.
Tɩ Alevi dʋgɛ dia zo'oge ẽŋɛ kibsa a yire bɔ Azezi, tɩ ẽŋa la lampo-tɔ'ɔsrɩba, la nẽrba zozo'e zẽa dita.
Tɩ Farisi dõma basɛba, la ba lɔɔ karẽnsãandõma yõnna Azezi karẽnbiisi la yetɩ: «Bẽm ĩyã tɩ yãma lagɩm na lampo-tɔ'ɔsrɩba, la tõon-be'ero dõma dita?»
Tɩ Azezi lerge ba yetɩ: «Nẽr-sɛba n tarɩ ĩmã'asʋm ka eerɩ tɩba. Sɛba n bẽ'erɩ n eerɩ tɩba.
Mam ka wa'am dũnia zuo sɛba dõma n yetɩ bãma masɛ ya la ĩyã, mam wa'am tɩ m yele la tõon-be'ero dõma tɩ ba teege yɛm basɛ tõon-be'ero.»
Tɩ nẽrba la yele Azezi yetɩ: «Azã karẽnbiisi, la Farisi dõma karẽnbiisi ẽn lʋta nõorɛ mɛ dee pʋ'ʋsra Nawẽnnɛ, dee tɩ fõn karẽnbiisi dita dee yũura.»
Tɩ a lerge ba yetɩ: «Nẽra n di pɔka ẽŋɛ kibsa, tɩ a tadãandõma bɔna mĩ tɩ ba naagɛ la ẽ di kibsa la, yãma wʋn sakɛ tɩ ba lʋ nõorɛ mɛ dee tɩ pɔgdita la ken bɔna ba zẽ'am bɩɩ?
Ayɛɩ. La wakatɛ wʋn wa'am tɩ ba wʋn yese pɔgdita la ba zẽ'am, wakat-ẽŋa tɩ ba yãŋa wʋn lʋ nõorɛ.»
Tɩ Azezi le makɛ makrɛ bɔ ba yetɩ: «Nẽra kãn ãagɛ fu-paalɛ dɩkɛ lige fu-kɛka. A sãn ẽŋɛ bɛla, a wʋn sã'am fu-paalɛ la mɛ, la tãn-paalɛ la kãn masɛ la fu-kɛka la.
La nẽra mẽ kãn dɩkɛ dã-paalga sũm wɔ-kɛgsɩ pʋam. A sãn ẽŋɛ bɛla, dã-paalga la sãn kɛlla, ba wʋn botɩ wɔɔsɩ la tãsɛ mɛ. Bɛla dãam na wʋn ka'agɛ mɛ sã'am, tɩ wɔɔsɩ la mẽ sã'am.
La masɛ tɩ ba dɩkɛ dã-paalga sũm na wɔ-paalsɩ pʋam.
La nẽra sãn yũ dã-kɛka n kele la, a ka le bɔɔra dã-paalga. A wʋn yetɩ, dã-kɛka la n ãn sõŋa.»
Zifdõma vo'osgo daarɛ ayɩla tɩ Azezi la a karẽnbiisi dɔla vatɔ pʋam tɔlla, tɩ a karẽnbiisi kɔ si wẽena ɔbra.
Tɩ Farisi dõma nẽrba basɛba yẽ ban ẽŋɛ bɛla la, yele ba yetɩ: «Bẽm tɩ yãma ẽŋɛ sɛla n sisri tõma vo'osgo daarɛ?»
Tɩ Azezi lerge soke ba yetɩ: «Yãma ka karẽŋɛ Adavidi la a nẽrba la kɔm n yʋʋn dõnnɩ tɩ Adavidi ẽŋɛ se'em na?

A yʋʋn kẽ la Nawẽnnɛ deego pʋam dɩkɛ borborɩ sɛba tɩ ba bĩŋe bɔ Nawẽnnɛ na obe. La sisri mɛ, nẽra nẽra ka obrɩ ba, sãn dagna Nawẽnnɛ kãabgɔ kẽma la mã'a. La Adavidi yʋʋn obe borborɩ bãma mɛ, dee bɔ a nẽrba la tɩ ba obe.»
La Azezi ken yele ba mɛ yetɩ: «Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la n soe vo'osgo daarɛ.»
Vo'osgo daarɛ ayẽma tɩ Azezi kẽ Zifdõma wẽndeem zãsna nẽrba Nawẽnnɛ yetɔga. Tɩ bʋraa daan bɔna mĩ, tɩ a zʋʋgɔ nu'ugo ki.

Tɩ Nawẽnnɛ lɔɔ karẽnsãandõma, la Farisi dõma la daan bɩsra Azezi wʋn botɩ nẽra la yẽ ĩmã'asʋm vo'osgo daarɛ la bɩɩ, a kãn botɩ a yẽ ĩmã'asʋm. Se'ere n soe la, ba daan eerɩ la so-sɛka tɩ ba wʋn yetɩ a sã'am bãma sisgo dõrɛ ẽ.
Tɩ Azezi bãŋɛ ba tẽ'esgɔ la, yele bʋraa la nu'ugo n ki la yetɩ: «Isge ze'ele nẽrba la tẽŋasʋka.» Tɩ a isge ze'ele.
Tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: «Mam yetɩ m soke ya mɛ bɩsɛ, sore boe tɩ nẽra ẽŋɛ sõŋa vo'osgo daarɛ bɩɩ, a ẽŋɛ be'em? Sore boe tɩ a fãagɛ nẽra vo'osgo daarɛ bɩɩ, a kʋ ẽ?»
Dee bɩsɛ ba wuu kaagɛ, dee yele bʋraa la yetɩ: «Tẽegɛ fʋ nu'ugo la.» Tɩ a tẽegɛ a nu'ugo la, tɩ a nu'ugo la yãŋa tẽegɛ ãna sõŋa.
Tɩ ba sũnsõa yĩige halɩ tɩ ba bãnna ban wʋn ẽŋɛ Azezi se'em.
La wakat-ẽŋa tɩ Azezi daan sẽŋɛ ka zom tãŋa zuo tɩ a pʋ'ʋsɛ Nawẽnnɛ, bɔna bilam pʋ'ʋsra Nawẽnnɛ yʋ'ʋŋɔ wuu.
Tɩ beere wiige, tɩ a wi a karẽnbiisi la, tɩ ba wa'am a zẽ'am. Tɩ a looge karẽnbiisi pia la ayi bãma pʋam. Bãma n de nẽr-sɛba tɩ a wʋn tõm na.
Ba daan de la Asimõ tɩ Azezi sɩ a yʋ'ʋrɛ tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ, la A'ãndre n de Apɩyɛɛrɩ yɩbga, la Azakɩ, la Azã, la Afilipi, la Abatelemi,
la Amatie, la Atoma, la Azakɩ sɛka n de Alfe bia la, la Asimõ sɛka n daan de Zelɔtɩ nẽra ayɩla la,
la Azudaasɩ n de Azakɩ bia la, la Azudaasɩ Iskariyo sɛka n wʋn zãm Azezi la.

La Azezi la a karẽnbiisi la ze'ele la tãŋa la zuo sige zẽ'e-sɛka n naagɛ taaba. La a karẽnbiisi basɛba zozo'e, la nẽr-kʋʋŋɔ zozo'e n yese Zude, la Zerizalɛm, la Tiiri la Sidõ so'olʋm n boe ko-kãtɛ nõorʋm na n lagsɛ bilam.
Ba wa'am tɩ ba selse la Azezi yetɔga, dee tɩ a bɔ ba bã'adõma ĩmã'asʋm. La nẽrba basɛba n daan boe mĩ tɩ kʋlkã'arsɩ dɔla ba, tɩ ba daan yẽ ĩmã'asʋm.
Tɩ nẽr-kʋʋŋɔ la wuu ɛɛra tɩ ba kalʋm ẽ, se'ere n soe la, pãŋa n yesrɩ a pʋam bɔ'ɔra ba wuu ĩmã'asʋm.
Tɩ Azezi gorge bɩsɛ a karẽnbiisi la yetɩ: «Yãma sɛba n de nasdõma la tarɩ zu-yẽlga, se'ere n soe la, Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm de la ya bõnɔ.
Yãma sɛba kɔm n dõnnɩ lɛɛlɛ wã tarɩ zu-yẽlga, se'ere n soe la, ya wʋn ka di seke. Yãma sɛba n kaasrɩ lɛɛlɛ wã tarɩ zu-yẽlga, se'ere n soe la, ya wʋn ka la'ara.
Yãma sɛba tɩ nẽrba sisri ya, dee bɔkra ya, tʋʋra ya, dee ka nanna ya wʋ ya de la tõon-be'ero dõma, mam n de Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la ĩyã la, tarɩ zu-yẽlga.
Wakat-sɛka tɩ ba ɩtɩ yãma bɛla la, ẽŋɛ-ya sũ-yẽlga sɩrʋm, se'ere n soe la, ya wʋn yẽ yɔɔrɔ zo'oge mɛ Nawẽnnɛ yire. Bãŋɛ-ya tɩ ba yaabdõma yʋʋn ẽŋɛ Nawẽnnɛ nõtɔ'ɔsrɩba la bɛla.
La yãma sɛba n de bõntatba la wʋn yẽ toogo, yãma n põn yẽ bõn-sõma la ĩyã.

La yãma sɛba n tarɩ sɛla woo lɛɛlɛ wã tɩ la seke la, wʋn yẽ toogo, se'ere n soe la, ya wʋn ka sẽnna la kɔm. La yãma sɛba n la'arɩ lɛɛlɛ wã wʋn yẽ toogo, se'ere n soe la, ya sũure wʋn ka sã'am tɩ ya kaasɛ.
La yãma sɛba tɩ nẽrba wuu pẽgrɩ ya la, wʋn yẽ toogo. Bãŋɛ-ya tɩ ba yaabdõma mẽ yʋʋn pẽgrɩ nõtɔ'ɔs-sɛba n de põmpɔrndõma la bɛla.»
Azezi le yele ba yetɩ: «La mam yetɩ yãma sɛba n selsrɩ mam wã tɩ, ya nõŋɛ ya bɛ'ɛba, la sɛba n sisri ya la, ya ɩta ba sõŋa.
La ya kã'ara kã'a-sõma bɔ'ɔra sɛba n kã be'em bɔ'ɔra ya la, dee pʋ'ʋsra Nawẽnnɛ bɔ'ɔra sɛba n ɩtɩ ya be'em na.
Nẽra sãn wẽ fʋ pɛka ayɩla, fʋ basɛ tɩ a wẽ ayẽma la pa'asɛ. La nẽra sãn fãagɛ fʋ fu-kãtɛ, fʋ basɛ tɩ a to'oge fʋ fu-pɩka pa'asɛ.
La nẽra sãn sose fʋ sɛla, fʋ bɔ ẽ. La nẽra sãn dɩkɛ sɛla n de fʋ bõnɔ, fʋ da yetɩ a bɔ fɔ fʋ bõnɔ na.
La yãma n boorɩ tɩ nẽrba ɩta bõn-sɛba bɔ'ɔra ya la, ya mẽ ɩta bɛla bɔ'ɔra ba.
La ya sãn nõŋɛ sɛba n nõŋɛ ya la mã'a, Nawẽnnɛ wʋn bɔ ya sɛla mɛ bɩɩ? Baa la tõon-be'ero dõma nõŋɛ sɛba n nõŋɛ ba mɛ.
La ya sãn ɩta sɛba n ɩtɩ ya sõŋa la mã'a sõŋa, Nawẽnnɛ wʋn bɔ ya sɛla mɛ bɩɩ? Baa la tõon-be'ero dõma ɩtɩ la bɛla.
La ya sãn pɛŋra sɛba tɩ ya tẽ'esrɩ tɩ ba wʋn yẽ lebse ya la, Nawẽnnɛ wʋn bɔ ya sɛla mɛ bɩɩ? Baa la tõon-be'ero dõma peŋrɩ tõon-be'ero dõma mɛ dee le tɔ'ɔsra bɛla.

La, la sãn dɛna yãma, nõŋɛ-ya ya bɛ'ɛba, dee ẽŋɛ ba sõŋa. Peŋe-ya nẽrba dee da tẽ'esra tɩ ba le bɔ ya. Ya sãn ẽŋɛ bɛla, ya yɔɔrɔ wʋn zo'oge mɛ, la ya wʋn dɛna Nawẽnnɛ n gãnnɩ sɛla wuu kɔma, se'ere n soe la, a ɩtɩ sɛba n ka mi yel-sõnnɛ, la pʋtʋʋl-dõma sõŋa mɛ.
Zɔta-ya nẽrba ninbãalga, wʋ ya Sɔ Nawẽnnɛ n zotɩ nẽrba ninbãalga se'em na.»

«Da tɔgra-ya nẽra yelle yetɩ a ẽŋɛ be'em, tɩ Nawẽnnɛ mẽ kãn tɔgɛ ya yelle yetɩ ya ẽŋɛ be'em. Da zɛrgra-ya nẽrba, tɩ Nawẽnnɛ mẽ kãn zɛrgɛ ya. Basɛ-ya taaba taalɛ, tɩ Nawẽnnɛ mẽ wʋn basɛ ya taalɛ.

Bɔ-ya ya taaba, tɩ Nawẽnnɛ mẽ wʋn bɔ ya. Nawẽnnɛ wʋn bɔ ya zo'oge wʋ ban dɩkɛ wan-kãtɛ makɛ pɩrɛ sõŋa tɩ la saara. Bõn-sɛka tɩ yãma dɩkɛ makɛ bɔ ya taaba la, bõn-ẽŋa tɩ Nawẽnnɛ mẽ wʋn dɩkɛ makɛ bɔ ya.»
Tɩ Azezi daan makɛ makrɛ bɔ ba yetɩ: «Fʋa tã wʋn ve'ege fʋa mɛ tɩ ba wuu kãn lui boko pʋam?
Karẽnbia ka gãnnɩ a karẽnsãama, la karẽnbia sãn zãsʋm sɛla woo ba'asɛ, a ãn wʋ a karẽnsãama la.
Bẽm tɩ fʋ bɩsra sɔkɔ n boe fʋ sɔbia nifum, dee ka bɩsra dɔɔgɔ n boe fʋ mẽŋa nifum na?

Fõn ẽŋɛ la wãne yɛta fʋ sɔbia yetɩ, a basɛ tɩ fʋ yese sɔkɔ a nifum, dee ka bɩsra dɔɔgɔ n boe fʋ mẽŋa nifum? Pʋlibsum dãana, dẽŋɛ yese dɔɔgɔ la fʋ mẽŋa nifum, dee yãŋa tã'agɛ yẽ sõŋa yese sɔkɔ la n boe fʋ sɔbia nifum na.»
«Tɩ-sõŋɔ ka wɔnnɩ biɛ be'ero. Tɩ-be'ego mẽ ka wɔnnɩ biɛ sõma.
Ba bãŋrɩ tɩɩsɩ wuu la ba biɛ pʋam. Gõ'osɩ kãn wɔm kẽnkãma, la kẽkɔ mẽ kãn wɔm tã'ama.
Nẽr-sõŋɔ sũure n ãn sõŋa botɩ a tɔgra la bõn-sõma, la nẽr-be'ego sũure n ka ãn sõŋa botɩ a tɔgra la bõn-be'ero. Se'ere n soe la, bõn-sɛba n boe nẽrsaala sũurum n yesrɩ a nõorʋm.»
«Bẽm ĩyã tɩ yãma wi'ira mam tɩ ‹Zuudãana, Zuudãana›, dee ka ɩta mam n yetɩ ya ɩta se'em na?
Nẽr-sɛka woo n sẽm mam zẽ'am, dee sɛlsra mam yetɔga, dee sakra ɩta mam n yele se'em na, mam wʋn pa'alɛ ya ẽŋa dãana n ãn se'em:
A ãn wʋ nẽra n boorɩ tɩ a mẽ a yire, tũ paagɛ tãmpĩa, ẽebɛ a yire tãmpĩa la zuo. Tɩ saaga ni, tɩ ko'om pɩrɛ kʋlsɩ zoe wẽ yire la, tɩ a ka lui, ẽn mẽ sõŋa la ĩyã.

La nẽr-sɛka n wõnnɩ mam yetɔga, dee ka ɩta mam n yele se'em na, ãn wʋ nẽra n mẽ a yire tẽntõnnɔ zuo, dee ka tũ ẽebɛ. Tɩ saaga ni, tɩ ko'om pɩrɛ kʋlsɩ zoe wa wẽ yire la, tɩ a kɔ'ɔn lui saam saam.»
Azezi tɔgɛ bɛla wuu bɔ nẽrba la ba'asɛ, dee sẽŋɛ la Kapɛrnaʋm.
Tɩ Rom sʋda-kɛ'ɛma bɔna mĩ tara a tõntõnna tɩ a nõŋɛ. Tɩ tõntõnna la bẽ'era dee la a ki.
Tɩ sʋda-kɛ'ɛma la wõm Azezi yelle, tõm Zifdõma kẽma basɛba a zẽ'am tɩ ba sose ẽ yetɩ, a wa'am wa botɩ a tõntõnna la yẽ ĩmã'asʋm.
Tɩ ba sẽŋɛ Azezi zẽ'am ka tĩi belem ẽ yetɩ: «Bʋraa la de la nẽr-sõŋɔ.
A nõŋɛ tõma buuri mɛ, la ẽŋa n mẽ wẽndeego bɔ tõma. Bɛla ĩyã, mõrgɛ sõŋɛ ẽ.»
Tɩ Azezi dɔla ba wɛ'ɛsa ka lɛm yire la, tɩ sʋda-kɛ'ɛma la le tõm a sɩrdõma tɩ ba yele ẽ yetɩ: «Zuudãana, da nãmsɛ fʋ mẽŋa. Mam ka narɩ tɩ fʋ wa'am mam yire,
bɛla ĩyã tɩ mam tẽ'esɛ yetɩ mam mẽŋa ka narɩ tɩ m wa'am fõn zẽ'am. Wen tɔgɛ yetɔga mã'a, tɩ m tõntõnna la wʋn yẽ ĩmã'asʋm.

Se'ere n soe la, nẽrba n soe mam, la mam mẽ soe la sʋdaasɩ basɛba. Mam sãn yele sʋda-sɛka yetɩ: ‹Sẽŋɛ›, a we'esɩ mɛ. La mam sãn yele ayẽma yetɩ: ‹Wa'am›, a sẽm mɛ. Mam sãn yele m tõntõnna yetɩ: ‹Ẽŋɛ wãna›, a ɩtɩ mɛ.»

Azezi n wõm bɛla la, la daan di'ige ẽ mɛ, tɩ a wẽrgɛ yele nẽr-sɛba n dolɩ ẽ na yetɩ: «Mam yetɩ yãma mɛ tɩ mam nãn ka yẽ nẽra n bɔ mam sɩra wʋ bʋra-ẽna wã, baa Ɩsrayɛlɩ buuri la pʋam mam ka yẽ.»
Tɩ sʋda-kɛ'ɛma la n tõm sɛba la lebe a yire ka yẽ tɩ tõntõnna la tarɩ ĩmã'asʋm.
Bɛla poorʋm, Azezi we'esɩ la tẽŋa ayɩla yʋ'ʋrɛ n de Nayin, tɩ a karẽnbiisi, la nẽrba zozo'e dɔla ẽ.

La Azezi paagɛ tẽŋa la nõorʋm, tʋ'ʋsɛ la nẽrba n zɛɛrɩ budibla n ki wɛ'ɛsa tɩ ba ka laagɛ. Budibla la ma de la pɔkõorɛ. La a bia de la ẽŋa mã'a. Tɩ tẽŋa la nẽrba zozo'e daan kɔlgɛ ẽ dɔla wɛ'ɛsa.
La Zuudãana Azezi n yẽ pɔkõorɛ la, tɩ a ninbãalga yõkɛ ẽ, tɩ a yele ẽ yetɩ: «Da kɛlla.»
A yele bɛla dee sẽŋɛ paagɛ kalʋm na sãŋandɛ la, tɩ nẽr-sɛba n zɛɛrɩ kũm na ze'ele, tɩ a yele kũm na yetɩ: «Budib-polle, mam yetɩ fʋ tɩ fʋ isge.»
Tɩ sɛka n ki la vo'oge isge zĩ'ire, yãŋa tɔgra. Tɩ Azezi yele a ma la yetɩ: «Fʋ bia n bɛla.»
Tɩ dabeem kẽ ba wuu, tɩ ba pẽgra Nawẽnnɛ yetɩ: «Nawẽnnɛ nõtɔ'ɔs-kãtɛ n wa'am tõma zẽ'am.» Dee le yetɩ: «Nawẽnnɛ n wa'am tɩ a sõŋɛ a nẽrba.»
Tɩ yetɔga la saagɛ Zude so'olʋm, la tẽn-sɛba n lɛm na wuu, tɩ ba wõm Azezi n ẽŋɛ se'em.
Tɩ Azã karẽnbiisi tɔgɛ bõn-bãma wuu pa'alɛ ẽ. Tɩ Azã wi a karẽnbiisi bayi
tõm ba Zuudãana Azezi zẽ'am, tɩ ba ka soke ẽ yetɩ: «Fõn de la sɛka tɩ Nawẽnnɛ yetɩ a wʋn wa'am na bɩɩ, tɩ gu'ura nẽra ayẽma?»

Tɩ karẽnbiisi la sẽŋɛ ka paagɛ Azezi zẽ'am yele ẽ yetɩ: «Azã sɛka n mise nẽrba ko'om pʋam na n tõm tõma yetɩ, tɩ soke fʋ bɩsɛ, fõn de sɛka tɩ Nawẽnnɛ yʋʋn yetɩ a wʋn wa'am na bɩɩ, tɩ gu'ura nẽra ayẽma?»
Wakat-ẽŋa Azezi daan botɩ bã'adõma zozo'e tɩ bã'asɩ to'oto'ore tarɩ ba, la sɛba tɩ kʋlkã'arsɩ dolɩ ba n yẽ ĩmã'asʋm, dee botɩ fɔɔsɩ zozo'e nini yẽta.

Tɩ Azezi lerge sɛba tɩ Azã tõm na yetɩ: «Sẽŋɛ-ya ka yele Azã yãma n yẽ bõn-sɛba, dee wõm se'em na wuu: Fɔɔsɩ nini yẽtɩ mɛ, tɩ kɔɔrnɔ sẽnna, tɩ kõnkɔma yẽ ĩmã'asʋm le ãna sõŋa, tɩ wansɩ wõnna, tɩ kũm vɔ'ɔra, tɩ nasdõma wõnna Nawẽnnɛ kõ-yẽlga.
La nẽr-sɛka n ka lebrɩ poorʋm mam ĩyã tarɩ zu-yẽlga.»
Sɛba tɩ Azã tõm na lebe kule mɛ. Tɩ Azezi yãŋa tɔgɛ nẽrba la Azã yelle yetɩ: «Yãma daan sẽŋɛ mõom tɩ ya ka bɩsɛ la bẽm? Yãma sẽŋɛ ka bɩsɛ la mõogɔ tɩ kʋsebgo mĩini bɩɩ? Ayɛɩ.
La bẽm tɩ yãma sẽŋɛ ka bɩsɛ? Yãma sẽŋɛ ka bɩsɛ la nẽra n yɛ fu-sõma bɩɩ? Ayɛɩ. Nẽr-sɛba n yɛɛrɩ fu-sõma dee tarɩ bõn-sõma la, kẽ'erɩ la na'adõma yiɛ pʋam.
La yãma sẽŋɛ ka bɩsɛ la bẽm? Ya sẽŋɛ ka bɩsɛ la Nawẽnnɛ nõtɔ'ɔsa bɩɩ? Ẽe. La mam yetɩ ya tɩ a de la nẽra n gãnnɩ Nawẽnnɛ nõtɔ'ɔsa.
La de la ẽŋa yelle tɩ la gʋlsɛ Nawẽnnɛ gõŋɔ pʋam tɩ Nawẽnnɛ yetɩ:
‹Mam tõntõnna n wãna
tɩ mam tõm tɩ a dẽŋɛ fʋ nẽŋa malgɛ sore bɔ fɔ.›
Mam yetɩ ya tɩ nẽrsaalba tɩ ba dɔgɛ la wuu pʋam, nẽra ka boe n gãnnɩ Azã, la nẽr-sɛka n de pɩka Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm na pʋam gãnnɩ Azã mɛ.
La nẽrba la wuu, baa la lampo-tɔ'ɔsrɩba la n wõm Azã yetɔga la, ba basɛ tɩ Azã mise ba ko'om pʋam mɛ. Bɛla pa'alɩ mɛ tɩ ba sakɛ mɛ tɩ Nawẽnnɛ n tarɩ sɩra.
La Farisi dõma, la Nawẽnnɛ lɔɔ karẽnsãandõma n zagsɛ tɩ Azã ka mise ba ko'om pʋam na, ba zagsɛ la bõn-sɛba tɩ Nawẽnnɛ yetɩ a ẽŋɛ bɔ ba la.»
Tɩ Azezi le yetɩ: «Bẽm tɩ mam wʋn dɩkɛ makɛ la zamãan-ẽna wã nẽrba n ɩtɩ se'em na. Ba ɩrgɔ wõn na bẽm?
Ba ãn wʋ kɔma n zĩ da'am wi'ira taaba yetɩ: ‹Tõma peebe wɩɩsɩ mɛ, tɩ yãma zagsɛ ka wa. Tɩ tõma yõom kʋʋrɛ yõoma, tɩ yãma ka kɛlla.›
Se'ere n soe la, Azã n misri nẽrba ko'om pʋam na wa'am mɛ wa lʋta nõorɛ, dee ka yũura dãam, tɩ ba yetɩ kʋlkã'arga n dolɩ ẽ.
Tɩ Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la wa'am wa dita dee yũura, tɩ ba yetɩ, a de la dita, la dã-yũura, la lampo-tɔ'ɔsrɩba la tõon-be'ero dõma sɩrɛ.
Nẽr-sɛba n sakrɩ Nawẽnnɛ yɛm n boorɩ se'em na n mi tɩ a tarɩ yɛm.»
Farisi nẽra ayɩla yʋ'ʋrɛ n de Asimõ n daan wi Azezi tɩ a wa'am ẽŋa yire tɩ ba di. Tɩ Azezi sẽŋɛ yire la ka zĩ'ire bɔna mĩ tɩ a di.
La pɔka n boe tẽŋa la pʋam tõnna yalsɩ tõoma. La pɔka la n wõm tɩ Azezi boe Farisi nẽra la yire dita la, tɩ a tarɩ albatrɩ dugla n pɩrɛ la tɩdarɛ kaam yũuŋo n ãn sõŋa wa'am Azezi zẽ'am.
Yãŋa ze'ele lɛm Azezi nãma bɔba kɛlla. Tɩ a nintãm yɛsra tɔgra Azezi nãma zuo. Tɩ pɔka la suure duuse Azezi nãma la, la a zomto, dee kɔkɛ a nãma la, sõogɛ ba la tɩdarɛ kaam na.
Tɩ Farisi nẽra la n wi Azezi la yẽ bɛla, tẽ'esɛ yetɩ: «Bʋra-ẽna sãn dɛna Nawẽnnɛ nõtɔ'ɔsa, a wʋn bãŋɛ nɩ pɔg-ẽna n kalʋm ẽ wã n de nẽr-sɛka, a wʋn bãŋɛ nɩ tɩ a tõnnɩ la yalsɩ tõoma.»
Tɩ Azezi yele ẽ yetɩ: «Asimõ, mam tarɩ la sɛla tɩ m yele fo.» Tɩ Asimõ lerge ẽ yetɩ: «Karẽnsãama, yele!»
Tɩ Azezi yele ẽ yetɩ: «Nẽra n daan boe tɩ nẽrba bayi tara a sãnnɛ. Nẽra ayɩla sãnnɛ de la lig-kõba kɔbsnuu. Tɩ ayẽma la mẽ sãnnɛ dɛna lig-kõba pinuu.
Tɩ ba daan ka tãna wʋn yɔ ẽ a ligri la. Tɩ a basɛ ligri la bɔ ba. Bãma bayi la, ãne n wʋn nõŋɛ ligri la dãana gãnna?»
Tɩ Asimõ lerge ẽ yetɩ: «Mam tẽ'esɛ tɩ sɛka sãnnɛ n zo'oge la.» Tɩ Azezi yele ẽ yetɩ: «Fõn lerge se'em na de la sɩra.»
Dee gelge bɩsɛ pɔka la, yele Asimõ yetɩ: «Fõn yẽ pɔka wã? Mam n kẽ fõn yire la, fõn ka bɔ mam ko'om tɩ mam peege m nãma. La pɔka la peege mam nãma mɛ la a nintãm, dee duuse ba la a zomto.
Fõn ka kɔkɛ mam tɩ la pa'alɛ tɩ fʋ to'oge mam sõŋa. La mam n kẽ'em na, pɔka la kɔkɛ mam nãma mɛ ka basɛ.
La fõn ka nã'asɛ mam ẽŋɛ kaam mam zuugo, la a sõogɛ mam nãma mɛ la tɩdarɛ kaam.

Bɛla ĩyã tɩ mam yele fʋ yetɩ, Nawẽnnɛ basɛ a tõon-be'ero n zo'oge la taalɛ mɛ. Bɛla n soe tɩ a nõŋrɛ la zo'oge. La nẽr-sɛka tɩ Nawẽnnɛ basɛ a tõon-be'ero taalɛ fẽfẽe la, a nõŋrɛ mẽ de la fẽe.»
Azezi yele bɛla, dee yele pɔka la yetɩ: «Fʋ tõon-be'ero taalɛ ka le bɔna fʋ zuo.»
Tɩ sɛba n daan diti la ẽ na tɔgra la taaba sɔkra yetɩ: «A tẽ'esɛ tɩ ẽŋa de la ãne basɛ nẽrba tõon-be'ero taalɛ?»
Tɩ Azezi yele pɔka la yetɩ: «Fõn bɔ mam sɩra la ĩyã n fãagɛ fɔ basɛ. Sẽŋɛ la sũ-mã'asʋm.»
Bɛla poorʋm, Azezi sẽŋɛ la tẽn-kãra, la tẽn-pɩgsɩ pʋam ka mõola Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm kõ-yẽlga. Tɩ a karẽnbiisi pia la ayi la dɔla ẽ.

La pɔgsɩ basɛba n mẽ daan dolɩ ẽ. La kʋlkã'arsɩ, la bã'asɩ n daan nãmsrɩ pɔg-bãma, tɩ Azezi botɩ ba yẽ ĩmã'asʋm. Pɔgsɩ la ayɩla yʋ'ʋrɛ de la Amaari n yese Magdala, ẽŋa tɩ kʋlkã'arsɩ bayopɔɩ daan yese dee basɛ ẽ na.

La ayẽma yʋ'ʋrɛ de la Azanɩ. Ẽŋa de la Asuza n bɩsrɩ naba A'erɔdɩ yire yelle la pɔga. La ayɩla yʋ'ʋrɛ de la Asuzanɩ. Pɔg-bãna, la pɔgsɩ zozo'e n tarɩ ba mẽŋa lɔgrɔ sõŋra Azezi la a karẽnbiisi la.
La nẽrba n ze'ele tẽnsɩ to'oto'ore sẽnna Azezi zẽ'am. Nẽrba la n daan lagsɛ zo'oge pãɩ la, tɩ Azezi makɛ makrɛ bɔ ba yetɩ:
«Kaara n daan yese tɩ a lobge a bõnbuuri. Ẽŋa n boe mĩ lɔbgra la, tɩ bõnbuuri la basɛba lui sore zuo tɩ nẽrba nẽ ba, dee tɩ niinto mẽ wa'am wa di ba.
Tɩ basɛba lui tãmpĩa zuo bule, la mã'asrɛ n ka boe mĩ na ĩyã tɩ ba zẽkɛ ki.
Tɩ bõnbuuri basɛba lui gõ'osɩ zẽ'a, tɩ bãma la gõ'osɩ la wuu lagɩm yese, tɩ gõ'osɩ la fʋrɛ ba.
Tɩ basɛba lui zẽ'e-sõŋɔ zẽ'a yese, wɔm biɛ zo'oge paagɛ kɔbga kɔbga.» Azezi n tɔgɛ bɛla la, dee yetɩ: «Sɛka n wõm yetɔga wã, a selse sõŋa sõŋa.»
Tɩ a karẽnbiisi la soke ẽ makrɛ la võorɛ.
Tɩ a lerge ba yetɩ: «Nawẽnnɛ botɩ yãma bãŋɛ a so'olʋm yelle n sʋgɛ la mɛ, la sɛba n ka boe tõma pʋam na, mam makrɩ la magsa bɔ'ɔra ba.
‹Bɛla tɩ ba wʋn bɩsra,
dee ka yẽta,
ba wʋn wõnna,
dee ka bãŋra ba võorɛ.›
Makrɛ la võorɛ n wãna: Bõnbuuri la de la Nawẽnnɛ yetɔga.
Sore la zuo tɩ bõnbuuri sɛba lui la, ãn wʋ nẽr-sɛba n wõm yetɔga la, tɩ Asũtãana wa'am wa yese yetɔga la ba sũure pʋam, botɩ ba kãn sakɛ yẽ fãarɛ.

La tãmpĩa la zuo tɩ bõnbuuri sɛba lui la, ãn wʋ nẽr-sɛba n wõm yetɔga la, dee sakɛ la sũ-yẽlga, la yetɔga la ka kẽ ba sũure pʋam sõŋa. Ba sakɛ la wakatɛ fẽe, tɩ yelle sãn paagɛ ba, tɩ ba basɛ.

La gõ'osɩ la zẽ'a tɩ bõnbuuri sɛba lui la, ãn wʋ nẽr-sɛba n wõm Nawẽnnɛ yetɔga, tɩ ba yɛm yɔɔra la ba vɔm yelle, tɩ bõntarsõm la dũnia yẽlʋm yɛmleego botɩ ba ka tãna wʋn bɩ Nawẽnnɛ sore la pʋam.

La zẽ'e-sõŋɔ la tɩ bõnbuuri sɛba lui la, ãn wʋ nẽr-sɛba n wõm yetɔga la, dee sakra dɩkra yetɔga la ɩta ba sũure pʋam sõŋa sõŋa, mõrgɛ zɛ kãŋkãŋɛ Nawẽnnɛ sore la pʋam wʋ bõnbuuri la n wɔm biɛ se'em na.»
Azezi le yetɩ: «Nẽra ka yõ'orɩ fɩtla dɩkɛ lɔkɔ vuge ẽ, bɩɩ dɩkɛ ẽ sʋgɛ gɔrgɔ tilum. A wʋn dɩkɛ ẽ zoole la sɛla zuo, tɩ a nẽegɛ peelem tɩ sɛba n kẽ'erɩ la yẽta.
Bõn-sɛka woo n lile la wʋn lilge mɛ, la bõn-sɛka woo n sʋgɛ wʋn wa puke mɛ tɩ nẽrba bãŋɛ.
Mõrgɛ-ya bãŋɛ yãma n selsrɩ se'em na võorɛ. Se'ere n soe la, nẽr-sɛka n tarɩ sɛla, ba wʋn bɔ ẽ pa'asɛ, la nẽr-sɛka n ka tarɩ sɛla, bõn-sɛba fẽe tɩ a tẽ'esɛ tɩ a tara la, ba wʋn to'oge ba.»
Azezi ma, la a yɩbsɩ n daan wa'am tɩ ba yẽ ẽ. La nẽrba zo'oge mɛ tɩ ba ka tã'agɛ paagɛ a zẽ'am.
Tɩ ba yele Azezi yetɩ: «Fʋ ma, la fʋ yɩbsɩ n boe yẽŋa bɔɔra tɩ ba yẽ fɔ.»
Tɩ a lerge ba yetɩ: «Nẽr-sɛba wuu n wõnnɩ Nawẽnnɛ yetɔga, dee sakɛ ɩta lan yele se'em na, n de mam ma, la mam yɩbsɩ.»
Daarɛ ayɩla tɩ Azezi la a karẽnbiisi kẽ õorŋɔ, tɩ a yele ba yetɩ: «Basɛ-ya tɩ dooge ya mõgrɛ la ke bɔba doone.» Tɩ ba mõnna õorŋɔ la wɛ'ɛsa.
La ban mõnnɩ wɛ'ɛsa la, tɩ gẽem yõkɛ Azezi, tɩ a gĩse. Tɩ kʋseb-kãtɛ isge ko'om na zuo vugra, tɩ ko'om kẽ'era õorŋɔ la pʋam, tɩ la lebge pakrɛ bɔ ba.
Tɩ ba paagɛ nẽegɛ Azezi, yele ẽ yetɩ: «Karẽnsãama, karẽnsãama, tõma yetɩ tɩ ki mɛ.» Tɩ a isge tãsɛ kʋsebgo, la ko-mĩ'isi tɩ ba ãna sĩm. Tɩ kʋsebgo la ko-mĩ'isi la yõkɛ, tɩ la ãna sĩm.
Tɩ a soke a karẽnbiisi la yetɩ: «Bẽm tɩ ya ka bɔ mam sɩra?» Tɩ dabeem kẽ ba. Tɩ ba palẽŋa ẽkɛ, tɩ ba sɔkra taaba yetɩ: «Ãne n de ẽna tã'agɛ tãsra kʋsebgo la ko'om, tɩ ba sakra a nõorɛ?»
La ba paagɛ la Geraza dõma tẽŋa. Mõgrɛ la boe la tẽn-ẽŋa la Galile tẽŋasʋka.
Tɩ Azezi ze'ele õorŋɔ pʋam sige. Tɩ tẽŋa la bʋraa ayɩla tɩ kʋlkã'arsɩ dolɩ ẽ sẽnna tʋ'ʋsra ẽ. A ka yɛɛrɩ fuugo, halɩ tɩ la yuuge, la a ka kẽ'erɩ yire, a boe la zẽ'e-sɛba tɩ yɔɔrɔ boe mĩ na.
Nõor-faa tɩ kʋlkã'arga la ẽn girge ẽ. Tɩ ba gu'ura ẽ, dee ba a nãma, la a nu'usi wuu la bãnsɩ. Tɩ a kɔ'ɔra bãnsɩ la. La kʋlkã'arga la ẽn tarɩ ẽ sẽŋɛ la mõom.

La bʋraaga la n yẽ Azezi la, a kaasɛ mɛ ka dũma tẽŋa a nẽŋam, tĩi tɔgra yetɩ: «Azezi, Nawẽnnɛ n gãnnɩ wuu Dayʋa, bẽm boe mam la fõn tẽŋasʋka? M sosrɩ fʋ mɛ tɩ fʋ da nãmsɛ mam.» Azezi dẽŋɛ yele kʋlkã'arga la mɛ tɩ a yese dee basɛ bʋraa la, bɛla n soe tɩ kʋlkã'arga la yele bɛla.
Tɩ Azezi soke ẽ yetɩ: «Fõn yʋ'ʋrɛ?» Tɩ a lerge yetɩ: «Mam yʋ'ʋrɛ de la Atʋsa.» Se'ere n soe tɩ a yele bɛla la, kʋlkã'arsɩ la n dolɩ ẽ na zo'oge mɛ.
Tɩ kʋlkã'arsɩ la sose Azezi yetɩ, a da botɩ ba sẽŋɛ bug-tẽŋa bog-ko'ogo la pʋam.
La kurkurdõma n daan zo'oge bɔna tãŋa zuo ɔbra yɔnnɔ. Tɩ kʋlkã'arsɩ la belem Azezi yetɩ, a bɔ ba nõorɛ tɩ ba kẽ kurkurdõma la. Tɩ Azezi sakɛ ban yele se'em na.
Tɩ kʋlkã'arsɩ la basɛ bʋraa la, dee sẽŋɛ ka kẽ kurkurdõma la. Tɩ ba wuu zoe sige ka lui mõgrɛ pʋam ki.
La sɛba n gu'uri kurkurdõma la n yẽ bõn-sɛka n ẽŋɛ la, ba zoe sẽŋɛ la tẽŋa pʋam, la kẽnkɛrsɩ wuu ka yele sɛla n ẽŋɛ la.

Tɩ nẽrba sẽŋɛ tɩ ba ka bɩsɛ lan ẽŋɛ se'em na. La ban paagɛ Azezi zẽ'am na, ba yẽ bʋraa la tɩ kʋlkã'arsɩ la yese dee basɛ ẽ na, tɩ a yɛ la futo zẽa Azezi nẽŋam, dee tarɩ yɛm sõŋa sõŋa. Tɩ dabeem kẽ ba.
Tɩ sɛba n yẽ bõn-sɛka n ẽŋɛ la, yele ba lan ẽŋɛ se'em tɩ kʋlkã'arsɩ la yese dee basɛ bʋraa la.
Tɩ Geraza tẽŋa nẽrba la wuu belem Azezi yetɩ, a fõrgɛ dee basɛ ba tẽŋa, se'ere n soe la, dabeem n ba kẽ ba. Tɩ Azezi kẽ'era õorŋɔ la tɩ a fõrgɛ.
Tɩ bʋraa la tɩ kʋlkã'arsɩ la yese dee basɛ ẽ na, sose Azezi tɩ a basɛ tɩ a doose ẽ. Tɩ Azezi zagsɛ, dee yele ẽ yetɩ:
«Lebe kule ya yire, ka pa'alɛ bõn-sɛba wuu tɩ Nawẽnnɛ ẽŋɛ bɔ fʋ la.» Tɩ a doose tẽŋa la wuu pʋam, mõola pa'ala Azezi n ẽŋɛ bõn-sɛba wuu bɔ ẽ na.
Azezi daan lebe dooge la mõgrɛ la ke bɔba. La nẽr-kʋʋŋɔ n põn lagsɛ bilam zɛ gu'ura ẽ. Azezi n daan paagɛ mĩ na, ba to'oge ẽ mɛ sõŋa sõŋa.
La bʋraa ayɩla n boe mĩ tɩ a yʋ'ʋrɛ dɛna Azayirusi, a de la Zifdõma wẽndeego nẽŋadãana, wa'am wa ka dũma tẽŋa Azezi nẽŋam sose ẽ yetɩ: «Wa'am mam yire,
tɩ mam pɔyʋa n tarɩ yʋʋma pia la ayi n dee la a ki.» Bʋraa la bia de la ẽŋa ayɩla mã'a.
Tɩ Azezi dɔla ẽ wɛ'ɛsa, tɩ nẽr-kʋʋŋɔ la mikra ẽ.
La pɔka n daan boe mĩ luta sɩkẽŋa yʋʋma pia la ayi tɩ la ka gɔ'ɔra. Tɩ a daan dɩkɛ ẽn tarɩ sɛla la wuu sã'am tɩbdõma zẽ'am, la baa ayɩla ka yãŋɛ botɩ a yẽ ĩmã'asʋm.
Tɩ a paagɛ Azezi poorʋm, kalʋm Azezi fuugo nõorɛ. La bilam mẽŋa tɩ a zɩɩm na ze'ele ka le yɛsra.
Tɩ Azezi soke yetɩ: «Ãne n kalʋm mam?» Tɩ nẽra woo sɩ'ɩsɛ. Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ yetɩ: «Zuudãana, nẽrba wã wuu n lagɩm gilge fõn mikra se'em wã tɩ fõn sɔkra?»
Tɩ Azezi yetɩ: «Nẽra n kalʋm mam, se'ere n soe la, mam bãŋɛ mɛ tɩ pãŋa n yese mam zẽ'am.»

La pɔka la n bãŋɛ tɩ a kãn yãŋɛ sʋgɛ la Azezi la, tɩ a gõgra wa'am wa ka dũma tẽŋa Azezi nẽŋam, yele ẽ nẽrba la wuu nẽŋam se'ere n soe tɩ ẽŋa kalʋm ẽ, la ẽŋa n yẽ ĩmã'asʋm bilam mẽŋa se'em.
Tɩ Azezi yele pɔka la yetɩ: «M bia, fõn bɔ mam sɩra la ĩyã n botɩ fʋ yẽ ĩmã'asʋm. Sẽŋɛ la sũ-mã'asʋm.»
La Azezi n nãn boe mĩ tɔgra la, tɩ nẽra ze'ele Zifdõma wẽndeego nẽŋadãana la yire wa'am wa yele ẽ yetɩ: «Fʋ pɔyʋa la ki mɛ, da le nãmsɛ karẽnsãama la.»
La Azezi n wõm bɛla la, tɩ a yele Azayirusi yetɩ: «Da zoe dabeem, wen bɔ mam sɩra, tɩ fʋ pɔyʋa la wʋn yẽ ĩmã'asʋm.»
Tɩ Azezi sẽŋɛ ka paagɛ a yire, la a ka botɩ nẽra nẽra doose ẽ kẽ, sãn dagna Apɩyɛɛrɩ, la Azakɩ, la Azã, la bia la sɔ, la a ma mã'a.
La nẽrba la wuu daan kellɩ mɛ fabla bia la ĩyã. Tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: «Da kaasra-ya, bia la ka ki, a gĩsri mɛ.»
Tɩ ba la'ara Azezi, ban mi tɩ bia la ki mɛ na ĩyã.
Tɩ Azezi gʋrɛ bia la nu'ugo, tĩi tɔgɛ ẽ yetɩ: «Bia, isge.»
Tɩ bia la vɔm leme, tɩ a isge bilam mẽŋa. Tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: «Bɔ-ya bia la dia tɩ a di.»
Tɩ la daan di'ige bia la sɔ, la a ma. Tɩ Azezi kã'an ba yetɩ, ba da yele nẽra nẽra sɛla n ẽŋɛ la.
Azezi daan wi a karẽnbiisi pia la ayi la lagsɛ mɛ, bɔ ba pãŋa, la nõorɛ tɩ ba dige kʋlkã'arsɩ dee botɩ bã'adõma yẽ ĩmã'asʋm.
Dee tõm ba yetɩ ba mõolɛ Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm yelle, dee botɩ bã'adõma yẽ ĩmã'asʋm.
La a yele ba yetɩ: «Da dɩkɛ-ya sɛla sɛla sẽŋɛ. Da dɩkɛ-ya dasaarɛ, bɩɩ tãmpɔkɔ, bɩɩ dia, bɩɩ ligri. Da dɩkɛ ya futo bayi bayi.
La yi-sɛka tɩ ya paagɛ tɩ ba to'oge ya, bɔna-ya yi-ẽŋa pʋam ka paagɛ daar-sɛka tɩ ya wʋn fõrgɛ tẽŋa la.
La zẽ'e-sɛka tɩ nẽrba ka to'oge ya, yese-ya tẽn-ẽŋa pʋam, dee pɩɩsɛ ya nãma tẽntõnnɔ basɛ. Ya sãn ẽŋɛ bɛla, la wʋn pa'alɛ ba tɩ ba ka ẽŋɛ sõŋa.»
Azezi n yele bɛla la, karẽnbiisi la yese mɛ sẽŋɛ tẽn-pɩgsɩ wuu pʋam ka mõola Nawẽnnɛ kõ-yẽlga, dee botɩ bã'adõma yẽta ĩmã'asʋm.
Galile Naba A'erɔdɩ n daan wõm bõn-sɛba wuu n ɩtɩ la, a palẽŋa n ẽkɛ, se'ere n soe la, nẽrba basɛba n daan yele ẽ tɩ Azezi de la Azã sɛka n daan misri nẽrba ko'om pʋam na n vo'oge.
Tɩ nẽrba basɛba yetɩ, Nawẽnnɛ nõtɔ'ɔsa A'eli n le wa'am dũnia zuo, tɩ nẽrba basɛba yetɩ, kʋrʋm kʋrʋm Nawẽnnɛ nõtɔ'ɔsa ayẽma n vo'oge.
Tɩ A'erɔdɩ yetɩ: «Mam daan botɩ ba wike Azã zuugo mɛ, dee tɩ ãne n de ẽna wã tɩ mam wõm a yelle wãna wã?» La a daan boorɩ tɩ a yẽ Azezi mɛ.
Azezi karẽnbiisi pia la ayi la tɩ a daan tõm na, lebe mɛ ka tɔgɛ pa'alɛ ẽ bãma n ẽŋɛ se'em na wuu. Tɩ Azezi botɩ ba doose la ẽ yese kẽnkɛrŋa ka lɛm tẽŋa yʋ'ʋrɛ n de Betisayida.
Tɩ nẽr-kʋʋŋɔ la bãŋɛ ẽn sẽŋɛ zẽ'am na, babsɛ ẽ. Tɩ a to'oge ba, tɔgɛ Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm yelle bɔ ba, dee botɩ bã'adõma yẽ ĩmã'asʋm.

La wẽnnɛ n daan boe mĩ tɩ a kẽ, tɩ karẽnbiisi pia la ayi la wa'am a zẽ'am wa yele ẽ yetɩ: «Botɩ nẽrba la sẽŋɛ tẽn-pɩgsɩ, la yiɛ n lɛm na ka ɛ dia, la gã'a-zẽ'a, se'ere n soe la, tɩn boe zẽ'e-sɛka wã de la mõom.»
Tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: «Yãma mẽŋa bɔ ba dia tɩ ba di.» Tɩ ba lerge yetɩ: «Tõma tarɩ la borborɩ banuu, la zũma bayi mã'a, sãn dagna tɩ tɩ sẽŋɛ ka da dia wa'am wa bɔ nẽr-bãna wuu.»
La bʋraasɩ n daan boe mĩ de wʋ tʋsanuu. Tɩ Azezi yele karẽnbiisi la yetɩ: «Basɛ-ya tɩ nẽrba la welse zĩ'ire pinu-nu.»
Tɩ karẽnbiisi la botɩ nẽrba la wuu zĩ'ire bɛla.
Tɩ Azezi dɩkɛ borborɩ banuu, la zũma bayi la gorge bɩsɛ saazuum pʋ'ʋsɛ Nawẽnnɛ dia la ĩyã, dee fiise borborɩ la zũma la bɔ a karẽnbiisi la tɩ ba to'oge pʋɩ nẽrba la.
Tɩ ba wuu di tɩgɛ, dee tɩ karẽnbiisi la vaagɛ bõn-gito n deege pɩrɛ pɩtɔ pia la ayi.
Daarɛ ayɩla Azezi daan boe la kẽnkɛrŋa pʋ'ʋsra Nawẽnnɛ, tɩ a karẽnbiisi la bɔna a zẽ'am, tɩ a soke ba yetɩ: «Nẽrba yetɩ mam de la ãne?»

Tɩ ba lerge yetɩ: «Nẽrba basɛba yetɩ fõn de la Azã sɛka n daan misri nẽrba ko'om pʋam na, tɩ nẽrba basɛba yetɩ, fõn de la Nawẽnnɛ nõtɔ'ɔsa A'eli, tɩ basɛba yetɩ, fõn de la kʋrʋm kʋrʋm Nawẽnnɛ nõtɔ'ɔsa ayẽma n vo'oge.»
Tɩ a soke ba yetɩ: «Dee yãma yetɩ mam de la ãne?» Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ lerge yetɩ: «Fõn de la Krisi tɩ Nawẽnnɛ tõm na.»
Tɩ Azezi kã'an ba yetɩ, ba da yele nẽra nẽra,

dee yetɩ: «Dẽnɩ tɩ mam n de Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la nãmsɛ zozo'e. Tẽŋa wã kẽma, la kãabgɔ kẽma nẽŋadõma, la lɔɔ karẽnsãandõma nifo wʋn kẽ mam mɛ, tɩ ba kʋ mam, la dabsa atã daarɛ mam wʋn vo'oge mɛ.»
Azezi yele bɛla dee yele nẽrba la wuu yetɩ: «Nẽra sãn bɔɔra tɩ a doose mam, dẽnɩ tɩ a basɛ a mẽŋa n boorɩ se'em, dee sakɛ nãmsgɔ daarɛ woo wʋ nẽra n buke a kũm dɔ-puurŋa dɔla mam.
Nẽr-sɛka woo n boorɩ tɩ a gu a vɔm, a wʋn koŋe ẽ, la nẽr-sɛka n sakɛ tɩ a koŋe a vɔm mam ĩyã, a wʋn yẽ vɔm.
Nẽra sãn yẽ dũnia sɛla woo dee koŋe vɔm Nawẽnnɛ zẽ'am, a yõorɔ de la bẽm?

Nẽr-sɛka n zoe yãnnɛ mam ĩyã, la mam yetɔga la ĩyã, mam n de Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la mẽ wʋn zoe yãnnɛ la ẽ wakat-sɛka tɩ mam wʋn leme wa'am la m na'am pãŋa, la Nawẽnnɛ, la a malɛkadõma na'am pãŋa la.
Mam yetɩ ya la sɩra sɩra, tɩ yãma nẽr-sɛba n boe kalam wã basɛba kãn ki, sãn dagna tɩ ba wa yẽ la Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm.»
Yetɔg-bãma poorʋm, la daan ẽŋɛ wʋ dabsa anii, tɩ Azezi botɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ, la Azakɩ, la Azã doose ẽ zom tãŋa zuo tɩ a ka pʋ'ʋsɛ Nawẽnnɛ.
La ẽn boe mĩ pʋ'ʋsra la, tɩ a nẽŋa teege, tɩ a futo pelge yẽgra.
Tɩ bʋraasɩ bayi darɛ zɛ tɔgra la ẽ. Ba de la Amoyisi, la A'eli
n puke ba mẽŋa nẽegɛ la Nawẽnnɛ na'am peelem tɔgra la Azezi, ẽŋa n wʋn ki Zerizalɛm se'em tɩ bõn-sɛka tɩ a wa'am tɩ a ẽŋɛ la, ẽŋɛ ba'asɛ yelle.
La gẽem n daan tarɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ la a taaba la tɩ ba gĩse, yãŋa nẽegɛ yẽ Azezi n yẽgrɩ, tɩ nẽrba bayi la zɛ a zẽ'am.

Tɩ nẽrba bayi la daan bɔna mĩ tɩ ba fõrgɛ, tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ yele Azezi yetɩ: «M Zuudãana, tõma n boe kalam wã, la ãn sõŋa mɛ. Basɛ tɩ tɩ tĩ põnsɩ batã, ayɩla bɔ fõn, ayɩla bɔ Amoyisi, la ayɩla bɔ A'eli.» A daan wen tɔgɛ mɛ, a ka mi ẽn tɔgrɩ se'em na.
La ẽn daan boe mĩ tɔgra bɛla la, tɩ sawatɛ wa'am wa lile ba la a mã'asʋm. La sawatɛ la n lile ba la, dabeem n yõkɛ karẽnbiisi la.
Tɩ kõa ze'ele sawatɛ la pʋam yetɩ: «Ẽna de la mam Dayʋa tɩ mam looge. Selse-ya ẽ.»
La kõa la n tɔgɛ la, ba yẽ la Azezi mã'a n ze. Tɩ ba daan sĩna wakat-ẽŋa ka yele nẽra nẽra bãma n yẽ sɛla la.
Tɩ beere daan wiige, tɩ Azezi la a karẽnbiisi la ze'ele tãŋa la zuo sige, tɩ nẽr-kʋʋŋɔ daan tʋ'ʋsɛ ẽ.
La bʋraa ayɩla n daan boe nẽr-kʋʋŋɔ la pʋam tĩi tɔgɛ yetɩ: «Karẽnsãama, mam belnɩ fʋ mɛ, bɩsɛ m bia wã. A de la mam bi-yẽŋa, la kʋlkã'arga n dolɩ ẽ.
Kʋlkã'arga la sãn ẽn girge ẽ, a botɩ a kaasra mɛ, dee luta kinki'ire, tɩ nõtõorʋm yɛsra a nõorʋm. Kʋlkã'arga la ẽn nãmsɛ ẽ zo'oge mɛ, pɔglʋm ẽ dee basɛ ẽ.
Bɛla tɩ mam belem fʋ karẽnbiisi yetɩ, ba dige ẽ tɩ a yese, tɩ ba ka yãŋɛ.»
Tɩ Azezi yetɩ: «Zamãan-ẽna nẽrba, ya ka bɔ'ɔrɩ mam sɩra, la ya ka ɩtɩ sõŋa. Mam wʋn mã'agɛ m mẽŋa la yãma yuuge paagɛ la wakat-kãna?» A yele bɛla dee yele bʋraa la yetɩ: «Tarɩ bia la wa'am.»

La bia la n paarɩ Azezi zẽ'am na, tɩ kʋlkã'arga la lʋbɛ ẽ tɩ a gõgra. Tɩ Azezi tãsɛ kʋlkã'arga la tɩ a basɛ bia la. Tɩ kʋlkã'arga la basɛ bia la, tɩ a yẽ ĩmã'asʋm, tɩ Azezi dɩkɛ ẽ lebse a sɔ.
La nẽrba la wuu n yẽ Nawẽnnɛ pãn-kãtɛ la, la di'ige ba mɛ.
Nẽrba la wuu daan ken ze la yɛrɩ la bõn-sɛba wuu tɩ Azezi ẽŋɛ la. Tɩ Azezi yele a karẽnbiisi la yetɩ:
«Selse-ya yetɔg-ẽna tɩ mam yetɩ m tɔgɛ wã sõŋa: Ba wʋn yõkɛ Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la sẽŋɛ ka ẽŋɛ la nẽrsaalba nu'usum.»
La ba daan ka bãŋɛ a yetɔga la võorɛ. Yetɔga la daan sʋgɛ mɛ tɩ ba ka tã'agɛ bãŋɛ a võorɛ, dee zɔta dabeem ka soke ẽ.
Azezi karẽnbiisi la daan wẽ'erɩ la nõke'ene la taaba, bɔɔra tɩ ba bãŋɛ bãma pʋam nẽr-sɛka n wʋn dɛna nẽr-kãtɛ gãnna.
Tɩ Azezi bãŋɛ ban tẽ'esrɩ se'em na, yõkɛ bia ze'ele lɛm a mẽŋa,

dee yetɩ: «Nẽr-sɛka woo n to'oge bi-pɩka n ãn wʋ ẽna mam yʋ'ʋrɛ ĩyã, a to'oge la mam, la sɛka n mẽ to'oge mam, a to'oge la sɛka n tõm mam na. Nẽr-sɛka n de pɩka ya zẽ'am na, ẽŋa n de nẽr-kãtɛ.»
Tɩ Azã yele Azezi yetɩ: «Zuudãana, tõma yẽ la bʋraa n digri kʋlkã'arsɩ la fõn yʋ'ʋrɛ tɩ ba yɛsra, la ẽŋa n ka po dɛna tõma nẽra la ĩyã, tɩ tõma gu ẽ yetɩ a basɛ.»
Tɩ Azezi lerge ba yetɩ: «Da gu-ya ẽ, nẽr-sɛka n ka sisri yãma, a de la ya nẽra.»
Dabs-sɛba tɩ Azezi daan wʋn zẽkɛ sẽŋɛ Nawẽnnɛ yire la n daan lɛm, tɩ a kɔ'ɔn yetɩ, dẽnɩ tɩ ẽŋa sẽŋɛ Zerizalɛm.
A daan tõm na nẽrba yetɩ ba dẽŋɛ nẽŋam. Tɩ nẽrba la daan dẽŋɛ sẽŋɛ ka kẽ Samaari tẽn-pɩka pʋam tɩ ba mãasna sɛla woo dee gu'ura ẽ.
Tɩ tẽŋa la nẽrba zagsɛ tɩ bãma kãn to'oge ẽ, ẽn we'esɩ Zerizalɛm na ĩyã.
La a karẽnbiisi Azakɩ la Azã n bãŋɛ bɛla la, tɩ ba soke Azezi yetɩ: «Zuudãana, fõn boorɩ tɩ tɩ wi bugum tɩ ba ze'ele saazuum wa di ba mɛ bɩɩ?»
Tɩ Azezi wẽrgɛ, gi ba [yetɩ: «Yãma ka mi sɩ-sɛka n tarɩ ya la.
Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la ka wa'am tɩ a sã'am nẽrba vɔm, a wa'am tɩ a fãagɛ ba mɛ.»] Tɩ ba wɛ'ɛsa tẽŋa ayẽma.
Ban boe sore wɛ'ɛsa la, tɩ bʋraaga yele Azezi yetɩ: «Mam wʋn dɔla fɔ sẽnna zẽ'e-sɛba wuu tɩ fʋ wʋn sẽnna.»
Tɩ Azezi lerge ẽ yetɩ: «Pɩɩna tarɩ yogro mɛ, tɩ niinto mẽ tara tʋgrɔ, la Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la ka tarɩ zẽ'a wʋn gã'arɛ vo'ose.»
Dee le yele bʋraa ayẽma mẽ yetɩ: «Doose mam.» Tɩ bʋraa la lerge ẽ yetɩ: «Basɛ tɩ m sẽŋɛ ka laagɛ m sɔ dee wa'am wa dɔla fɔ.»
Tɩ Azezi lerge ẽ yetɩ: «Basɛ tɩ sɛba n ka tarɩ vɔm Nawẽnnɛ zẽ'am na laagɛ ba kũm. Dee tɩ fõn sẽŋɛ ka mõolɛ Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm kõ-yẽlga la.»
Tɩ bʋraa ayɩla yele ẽ yetɩ: «Zuudãana, mam wʋn doose fo, la basɛ tɩ m sẽŋɛ ka keese m yir-dõma.»
Tɩ Azezi lerge ẽ yetɩ: «Nẽr-sɛka n gʋrɛ nii-kũure kɔɔra dee bɩsra poorʋm, ka tã wʋn tõm Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm tõoma.»
Bɛla poorʋm, Azezi looge la karẽnbiisi basɛba pisyopɔɩ la ayi tɩ a tõm ba bayi bayi tɩ ba dẽŋɛ nẽŋa sẽŋɛ tẽn-sɛba, la zẽ'e-sɛba wuu tɩ ẽŋa mẽŋa wʋn sẽŋɛ la.
A yele ba yetɩ: «Va'am na bõnkɔɔla lagsgɔ zo'oge mɛ, la tõntõnɩba n wʋn lagsɛ bõnkɔɔla la pɔ'ɔrɩ mɛ. Bɛla ĩyã sose-ya va'am na dãana tɩ a tõm tõntõnɩba pa'asɛ tɩ ba lagsɛ bõnkɔɔla la.»
Dee yãŋa yele ba yetɩ: «Sẽŋɛ-ya, yãma ãn wʋ piisi tɩ mam tõm saasaadõma tẽŋasʋka.
Da dɩkɛ-ya pʋtmãanɛ, bɩɩ tãmpɔkɔ, la da dɩkɛ-ya tagra pa'asɛ, da ze'ele-ya sore bɔ nẽra gã'a.
La ya sãn yetɩ ya kẽ yire pʋam, ya dẽŋɛ pʋ'ʋsɛ yire la dõma yetɩ: ‹Nawẽnnɛ wʋn bɔ ya sũ-mã'asʋm.›
Nẽra sãn bɔna mĩ bɔɔra sũ-mã'asʋm, ya sũ-mã'asʋm wʋn bɔna la ẽ. La nẽra sãn ka bɔna mĩ bɔɔra sũ-mã'asʋm, ya sũ-mã'asʋm wʋn leme ya mẽŋa zẽ'am.
Da lɔsna-ya yiɛ, bɔna-ya yire ayɩla pʋam, yũura dee dita bõn-sɛba tɩ ba bɔ ya la, se'ere n soe la, la masɛ mɛ tɩ tõntõnna to'oge a yɔɔrɔ.
Ya sãn paagɛ tẽn-sɛka woo pʋam tɩ ba to'oge ya, di-ya bõn-sɛba tɩ ba bɔ ya la,
la ya botɩ tẽn-ẽŋa bã'adõma yẽ ĩmã'asʋm, dee yele nẽrba la yetɩ: ‹Wakatɛ lɛm mɛ tɩ Nawẽnnɛ wʋn di na'am ya tẽŋasʋka.›
La tẽn-sɛka woo pʋam tɩ ya kẽ tɩ ba ka to'oge ya, ya yese sore dee yele tẽŋa la nẽrba wuu yetɩ:
‹Tõma pɩɩsrɩ la ya tẽŋa tẽntõnnɔ n tabɛ tõma nãma la, tɩ la pa'alɛ tɩ ya ka ẽŋɛ sõŋa. La bãŋɛ-ya tɩ wakatɛ lɛm mɛ tɩ Nawẽnnɛ wʋn di na'am nẽrba tẽŋasʋka.›
Mam yetɩ ya mɛ tɩ sarɩyadia daarɛ, Sodom nẽrba kãn ba yẽ toogo wʋ tẽn-ẽŋa nẽrba n wʋn yẽ toogo se'em na.

Korazẽ dõma, ya wʋn yẽ toogo! Betisayida dõma, ya wʋn yẽ toogo! Se'ere n soe la, tõon-yãlma sɛba n tõm ya tẽnsɩ pʋam na, daan sãn tõm nɩ na Tiiri, la Sidõ tẽnsɩ pʋam, ba wʋn teege nɩ yɛm basɛ tõon-be'ero halɩ kʋrʋm kʋrʋm, yɛ bɔra futo ẽŋɛ tãmpɛglʋm ẽŋɛ ba zuto tɩ la pa'alɛ tɩ ba teege yɛm.
La sarɩyadia daarɛ, la wʋn dɛna toogo bɔ yãma gãnna Tiiri, la Sidõ dõma.
La yãma Kapɛrnaʋm dõma, yãma tẽ'esɛ tɩ ya wʋn zẽkɛ mɛ ka paagɛ saazuum bɩɩ? Ayɛɩ, ya wʋn sige mɛ ka paagɛ bug-tẽŋa.»
La Azezi le yele a karẽnbiisi la yetɩ: «Sɛka n selsrɩ ya yetɔga, a selsrɩ la mam yetɔga, la sɛka n zagsɛ ya, a zagsɛ la mam. La sɛka n zagsɛ mam, a zagsɛ la sɛka n tõm mam na.»
La karẽnbiisi pisyopɔɩ la ayi la sẽŋɛ mɛ dee leme wa'am la sũ-yẽlga wa yetɩ: «Zuudãana, baa la kʋlkã'arsɩ sakrɩ tõma nõorɛ mɛ, ban zotɩ fõn yʋ'ʋrɛ la ĩyã.»
Tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: «Mam yẽ la Asũtãana n ze'ele saazuum lui tẽŋa wʋ saaga n yãkɛ la.
Bãŋɛ-ya tɩ mam bɔ ya pãŋa mɛ tɩ ya nẽ bõnsɛ'ɛdõma, la nãnsɩ, dee yãŋɛ Asũtãana la a pãŋa wuu, la sɛla sɛla ka tã wʋn ẽŋɛ ya be'em.
La da ɩta-ya sũ-yẽlga kʋlkã'arsɩ n sakrɩ ya nõorɛ la ĩyã, ɩta-ya sũ-yẽlga ya yʋ'ʋra n gʋlsɛ Nawẽnnɛ yire vɔm gõŋɔ pʋam na ĩyã.»

Wakat-ẽŋa tɩ Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa botɩ Azezi sũure ẽŋɛ yẽlʋm, tɩ a yetɩ: «Mam Sɔ Nawẽnnɛ n de saazuum la tẽŋa wã Zuudãana, mam pẽgrɩ fɔ, se'ere n soe la, fõn sʋgɛ bõn-bãna wã mɛ tɩ yɛm dõma la bãŋrɩba ka mina, dee pa'alɛ nẽr-sɛba n ãn wʋ kɔm-pɩgsɩ la. Ẽe, mam Sɔ, la de la fõn boorɩ bɛla la ĩyã.»

«Mam Sɔ dɩkɛ sɛla woo ẽŋɛ la mam nu'usum. La nẽra ka mi mam n de Nawẽnnɛ Dayʋa la n de sɛka, sãn dagna mam Sɔ la, la nẽra mẽ ka mi mam Sɔ la n de se'em, sãn dagna mam n de a Dayʋa la, la sɛba tɩ mam wʋn botɩ ba bãŋɛ ẽ na.»
Azezi yele bɛla dee wẽrgɛ la a karẽnbiisi la bɔba, yele bãma mã'a yetɩ: «Yãma sɛba n yẽtɩ sɛla tɩ ya yẽtɩ wã, tarɩ zu-yẽlga.
La mam yetɩ ya tɩ Nawẽnnɛ nõtɔ'ɔsrɩba, la na'adõma zozo'e yʋʋn boorɩ tɩ ba yẽ yãma n yẽ sɛla la mɛ, la ba ka yẽ, ba yʋʋn boorɩ tɩ ba wõm sɛla tɩ yãma wõm na mɛ, la ba ka wõm.»
Tɩ lɔɔ karẽnsãama isge tɩ a di Azezi yɛm bɩsɛ, soke ẽ yetɩ: «Karẽnsãama, mam wʋn ẽŋɛ la wãne yẽ vɔm n ka ba'asrɩ?»
Tɩ Azezi lerge ẽ yetɩ: «La gʋlsɛ Nawẽnnɛ lɔɔ gõŋɔ la pʋam yetɩ bẽm? Fõn karẽŋrɩ ẽ na, a yetɩ bẽm?»
Tɩ a lerge yetɩ: «La yetɩ: Nõŋɛ fʋ Zuudãana Nawẽnnɛ la fʋ sũure wuu, la fʋ sɩa wuu, la fʋ pãŋa wuu, la fʋ yɛm wuu, dee nõŋɛ fʋ tadãana wʋ fõn nõŋɛ fʋ mẽŋa se'em na.»
Tɩ Azezi yele ẽ yetɩ: «Fʋ yele sõŋa. Ẽŋɛ bɛla tɩ fʋ wʋn yẽ vɔm na.»
La ẽŋa n boorɩ tɩ a bɔ a mẽŋa bʋʋrɔ la, tɩ a soke Azezi yetɩ: «Ãne n de mam tadãana?»
Tɩ Azezi lerge ẽ yetɩ: «Nẽra n daan yese Zerizalɛm wɛ Zeriko, tɩ fãarba yõkɛ ẽ fã a lɔgrɔ wuu, dee wẽ ẽ tɩ a dee la a ki, tɩ ba basɛ ẽ dee fõrgɛ.
Tɩ Nawẽnnɛ kãabgɔ kẽema ayɩla dɔla so-ẽŋa tɔlla, yẽ ẽ, lɔkɛ tole dee basɛ ẽ.
Tɩ Leviti nẽra mẽ wa'am tɔlla, yẽ ẽ, bʋrgɛ tole dee basɛ ẽ.
La Samaari nẽra n mẽ daan dolɩ so-ẽŋa tɔlla yẽ ẽ, tɩ a ninbãalga yõkɛ ẽ.
Tɩ a paagɛ a zẽ'am dɩkɛ dãam peege a nõtɔ la, ẽŋɛ kaam ĩmĩ vile. Yãŋa yõkɛ ẽ bã a bõŋa zuo, tarɩ ẽ sẽŋɛ sãama yire ka bɩsɛ a yelle.
Tɩ beere wiige tɩ a dɩkɛ lig-kõba bayi bɔ nẽr-sɛka n bɩsrɩ sãama yire yelle la, dee yele ẽ yetɩ: ‹Bɩsra a yelle, ligri la sãn pɔ'ɔgɛ, mam sãn leme, mam wʋn yɔ fɔ.› »
Azezi tɔgɛ bɛla kɩ'ɩlɩm dee soke ẽ yetɩ: «Nẽrba batã wã, fõn tẽ'esɛ tɩ ãne n de nẽra la tɩ fãarba yõkɛ la tadãana?»
Tɩ lɔɔ karẽnsãama la lerge yetɩ: «Sɛka n zoe a ninbãalga sõŋɛ ẽ na.» Tɩ Azezi yele ẽ yetɩ: «Sẽŋɛ mẽ ka ẽŋɛ bɛla.»
Azezi la a karẽnbiisi daan sẽnnɩ mɛ ka kẽ tẽŋa ayɩla pʋam. Tɩ pɔka yʋ'ʋrɛ n de Amartɩ bɔna tẽn-ẽŋa pʋam to'oge ẽ a yire.
Amartɩ tarɩ la yɩbga tɩ a yʋ'ʋrɛ dɛna Amaari. Tɩ Amaari zẽa Zuudãana Azezi nãma bɔba sɛlsra a yetɔga.
La Amartɩ tõoma yelle n daan mõ'ogɛ a nini, tɩ a sẽŋɛ ka yele Azezi yetɩ: «Mam Zuudãana, mam yɩbga la n basɛ tɩ mam m yɩla mã'a tõnna la, fõn yetɩ bẽm? Yele ẽ tɩ a wa'am wa sõŋɛ ma.»
Tɩ Zuudãana Azezi lerge ẽ yetɩ: «Amartɩ, Amartɩ, fõn botɩ fʋ yɛm n yɔɔra la yɛla zozo'e yelle.
La bõnɔ ayɩla mã'a n de yel-kãŋkãŋɛ. Amaari looge la bõn-sõŋɔ, la nẽra nẽra kãn tã'agɛ to'oge bõn-ẽŋa a zẽ'am.»

Azezi daan boe la zẽ'a ayɩla pʋ'ʋsra Nawẽnnɛ. La ẽn pʋ'ʋsɛ kɩ'ɩlɩm na, tɩ a karẽnbia ayɩla yele ẽ yetɩ: «Zuudãana, pa'alɛ tɔ tõma n wʋn pʋ'ʋsra Nawẽnnɛ se'em, wʋ Azã n pa'alɛ a karẽnbiisi se'em na.»
Tɩ a yele ba yetɩ: «Ya sãn pʋ'ʋsra, ya yetɩ:
‹Tõma Sɔ, botɩ fʋ yʋ'ʋrɛ yẽta pẽka,
wa'am wa di na'am nẽrba tẽŋasʋka,
bɔ'ɔra tɔ daarɛ woo la a dia.
Basɛ tɩ tõon-be'ero taalɛ,
tɩ tõma mẽ basrɩ sɛba n ẽŋɛ tõma be'em taalɛ mɛ.
Da basɛ tɩ yelle paagɛ tɔ tɩ tɩ lui.› »
Dee le yele ba yetɩ: «Tẽ'esɛ-ya bɩsɛ, yãma nẽr-sɛka sãn tara sɩrɛ, tɩ a wa'am a zẽ'am yʋ'ʋŋɔ wa sose ẽ yetɩ: ‹M sɩrɛ, bɔ ma borborɩ batã,
mam sɩrɛ n ze'ele sore wa'am, tɩ mam ka tara sɛla wʋn bɔ ẽ tɩ a di.›
Tɩ a sɩrɛ la bɔna deem dee lerge ẽ yetɩ: ‹Da dãam mam, mam yʋ m zanõrɛ mɛ, tɩ mam la m kɔma gã, mam kãn yãŋɛ isge bɔ fɔ fõn boorɩ sɛla la.›
Mam yetɩ ya mɛ tɩ, baa a sãn põn kãn isge bɔ ẽ sɛla ban de sɩtɔ la ĩyã, a wʋn isge bɔ ẽ ẽn boorɩ sɛla la mɛ, ẽn bʋlɛ ẽ na ĩyã.
Bɛla mam yetɩ ya mɛ tɩ ya sose Nawẽnnɛ, tɩ a wʋn bɔ ya, ya ɛ, tɩ ya wʋn yẽ, ya wẽ kʋlɩŋa, tɩ a wʋn yo'oge bɔ ya.
Se'ere n soe la, nẽr-sɛka woo n sosrɩ Nawẽnnɛ, a wʋn bɔ ẽ. La nẽr-sɛka n eerɩ, wʋn yẽ. La nẽr-sɛka n wẽ'erɩ kʋlɩŋa, ba wʋn yo'oge bɔ ẽ.
Ãne n boe yãma pʋam tɩ a bia wʋn sose ẽ zũfo, tɩ a dɩkɛ bõnsɛla bɔ ẽ?
Bɩɩ a sãn sose ẽ zelle, tɩ a dɩkɛ nãŋa bɔ ẽ?
Yãma n de tõon-be'ero dõma la sãn mina tɩ ya bɔ ya kɔma bõn-sõma, Nawẽnnɛ n de ya Sɔ n boe saazuum n ãn sõŋa la wʋn bɔ nẽr-sɛba n sosrɩ ẽ a Sɩa la gãnna.»
La Azezi daan dige la kʋlkã'arga n tarɩ bʋraa tɩ a dɛna muko, tɩ kʋlkã'arga la daan yese, dee tɩ bʋraa la n de muko la yãŋa tã'agɛ tɔgra, tɩ la di'ige nẽrba la.
Tɩ nẽrba la basɛba yele ẽ yetɩ: «Ẽn digri kʋlkã'arsɩ la, la de la Abelzebuli n de kʋlkã'arsɩ naba la pãŋa tɩ a tarɩ digra ba.»
Tɩ nẽrba basɛba bɔɔra tɩ ba makɛ ẽ bɩsɛ, yele ẽ yetɩ, a tõm tõon-yãlma n pa'alɛ tɩ a pãŋa la ze'etɩ la Nawẽnnɛ zẽ'am.
Tɩ Azezi bãŋɛ ban tẽ'esrɩ se'em na, yele ba yetɩ: «So'olʋm sɛka woo nẽrba n welge wẽrgɛ zɛbra la taaba, so'olʋm na wʋn sã'am mɛ. La so'olʋm ẽŋa yiɛ mẽ wʋn lui mɛ.
La Asũtãana sãn welge zɛbra la a mẽŋa, a so'olʋm na kãn tã'agɛ ze'ele. Yãma n yetɩ mam digri kʋlkã'arsɩ la Abelzebuli pãŋa la ĩyã tɩ mam yele bɛla.
Yãma n yetɩ mam digri kʋlkã'arsɩ la Abelzebuli pãŋa la, yãma nẽrba tarɩ la ãn pãŋa digri kʋlkã'arsɩ? Bɛla, ya nẽrba la mẽŋa n wʋn pa'alɛ tɩ ya ka tarɩ bʋʋrɔ.
La de la Nawẽnnɛ pãŋa tɩ mam tarɩ digra kʋlkã'arsɩ, bɛla pa'alɛ tɩ Nawẽnnɛ wa'am mɛ wa dita na'am ya tẽŋasʋka.
Pãŋa dãana sãn mãasʋm sõŋa la a bʋdaan-lɔgrɔ gu'ura a yire, sɛla kãn ẽŋɛ a bõntarsõm.
La nẽra n tarɩ pãŋa gãnna ẽ sãn wa'am wa zɛbɛ yãŋɛ ẽ, a wʋn fãagɛ la a zɛbrɛ lɔg-sɛba tɩ a te'ege la yiɛn, dee yãŋa vaagɛ a yire lɔgrɔ la pʋɩ.
Nẽr-sɛka n ka boe la mam, sisri mam mɛ, la nẽr-sɛka n ka lagɩm na mam lagsra, a wɩrgrɩ mɛ.»

Azezi le yetɩ: «Kʋlkã'arga sãn yese dee basɛ nẽra, a sẽŋɛ la pɔgẽntɩɩsɩ pʋam ka ɛɛra zẽ'a tɩ a vo'ose, la a sãn ɛ zẽ'a koŋe, a yetɩ mɛ tɩ: ‹Mam wʋn lebe la m yi-sɛka tɩ m yese dee basɛ la pʋam.›
La a sãn lebe ka yẽ tɩ a pɩɩsɛ mɛ malgɛ ãna sõŋa,
a wʋn lebe mɛ ka tarɩ kʋlkã'arsɩ bayopɔɩ n de wẽensɩ gãnna ẽŋa mẽŋa wa'am, tɩ ba kẽ lagɩm bɔna mĩ. Bɛla, nẽr-ẽŋa toogo yãŋa wʋn gãnna a kʋrʋm toogo la mɛ.»
Azezi n tɔgɛ bɛla kɩ'ɩlɩm na, tɩ pɔka ze'ele nẽrba la tẽŋasʋka tĩi tɔgɛ yetɩ: «Pɔg-sɛka n dɔgɛ fɔ, tɩ fʋ mõgɛ a bĩ'isum na, tarɩ zu-yẽlga.»
Tɩ Azezi lerge yetɩ: «Nẽr-sɛba n wõnnɩ Nawẽnnɛ yetɔga, dee sakra ɩta lan yele se'em na, n tõn tarɩ zu-yẽlga.»

Nẽr-kʋʋŋɔ n lagsɛ Azezi zẽ'am zo'oge, tɩ a yele ba yetɩ: «Zamãan-ẽna wã nẽrba de la nẽr-bɛ'ɛsɩ. Ba eerɩ la bõn-yãlma n wʋn pa'alɛ Nawẽnnɛ pãŋa, la ba kãn yẽ bõn-yãlma ayẽma, sãn dagna bõn-yãlma sɛka n yʋʋn ẽŋɛ Nawẽnnɛ nõtɔ'ɔsa Azonaasɩ la.
Bõn-sɛka n yʋʋn ẽŋɛ Azonaasɩ la, pa'alɛ Niniivi dõma la Nawẽnnɛ pãŋa, bɛla Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la mẽ de la sɛka n pa'alɩ zamãan-ẽna dõma Nawẽnnɛ pãŋa.

Sarɩyadia daarɛ, na-pɔka la n yʋʋn yese wẽntulle gɔbga bɔba la wʋn isge mɛ zɛrgɛ zamãan-ẽna wã dõma ba tõon-be'ero la ĩyã. Se'ere n soe la, a yʋʋn ze'ele la zẽ'a n zãagɛ wa'am wa selse naba Asalomõ yɛm yetɔga la, la sɛka n gãnnɩ Asalomõ n boe kalam, dee tɩ yãma ka sɛlsra ẽ.

Sarɩyadia daarɛ, Niniivi dõma mẽ wʋn isge zɛrgɛ zamãan-ẽna wã dõma mɛ ba tõon-be'ero la ĩyã. Se'ere n soe la, Azonaasɩ n yʋʋn mõolɛ Nawẽnnɛ yetɔga bɔ ba la, ba yʋʋn teege yɛm mɛ basɛ tõon-be'ero. La sɛka n gãnnɩ Azonaasɩ n boe kalam, dee tɩ yãma ka teege yɛm.»
«Nẽra kãn yõ fɩtla sʋgɛ, bɩɩ dɩkɛ pɩ'ɩgɔ vuge ẽ, a wʋn dɩkɛ ẽ zoole la sɛla zuo tɩ a nẽegɛ bɔ sɛba n kẽ'erɩ la.
Fʋ nini n nẽerɩ peelem bɔ'ɔra fʋ ĩyã wʋ fɩtla la, bɛla fʋ nini sãn ãna sõŋa, fʋ ĩyã wuu tarɩ peelem mɛ. La fʋ nini sãn ka ãna sõŋa, fʋ ĩyã wuu boe la lika pʋam.
Bɛla ĩyã, guuse tɩ bõn-sɛka n de peelem fʋ pʋam na, da dɛna lika.
La fʋ ĩyã wuu sãn tara peelem sõŋa, tɩ baa bɔbrɛ ayɩla ka tara lika, fʋ ĩyã wuu tarɩ peelem mɛ wʋ fɩtla n tarɩ peelem nẽera bɔ'ɔra nẽrba se'em na.»
Azezi n daan tɔgɛ kɩ'ɩlɩm na, tɩ Farisi nẽra ayɩla wi ẽ tɩ a wa'am ẽŋa yire tɩ ba di. Tɩ a sẽŋɛ ka kẽ zĩ'ire bɔna mĩ tɩ a di.
Tɩ Farisi nẽra la yẽ tɩ Azezi ka peege nu'usi wʋ ban ɩtɩ ba sisgo se'em na, dee yetɩ a di, tɩ la di'ige ẽ.
Tɩ Zuudãana Azezi yele ẽ yetɩ: «Yãma Farisi dõma peerɩ ya wama la ya laasɩ pɔa mɛ, la yãma mẽŋa pʋam pɩrɛ la dẽgrɔ n de fãaga la pʋtʋʋlgɔ.
Ya de la geto! La dagɩ Nawẽnnɛ n ẽŋɛ poorʋm na, n ken ẽŋɛ pʋam na?
Dɩkɛ-ya yan tarɩ sɛla la bɔ nasdõma la ya sũure wuu, tɩ sɛla woo wʋn ãna sõŋa bɔ ya.

Farisi dõma, ya wʋn yẽ toogo. Se'ere n soe la, yãma bɔ'ɔrɩ Nawẽnnɛ zẽvõorɔ buuri wuu pia pʋrɛ mɛ, baa ba sãn ãna pɩka pɩka, la ya ka ɩtɩ sɛla n masɛ, la ya ka nõŋɛ Nawẽnnɛ. La de la bõn-bãna tɩ ya wʋn dẽŋɛ ɩta, dee yãŋa ɩta sɛla tɩ ya ɩtɩ la pa'asɛ.
Farisi dõma, ya wʋn yẽ toogo. Se'ere n soe la, yãma eerɩ la zẽ'esɩ nẽŋa tɩ ya zĩ'ire wẽndeto pʋam, dee bɔɔra tɩ ba nã'asra ya da'asɩ pʋam.
Ya wʋn yẽ toogo. Se'ere n soe la, ya ãn wʋ yɔɔrɔ n naagɛ la tẽŋa tɩ nẽrba nẽera ba zuto tɔlla, dee ka mina tɩ yɔɔrɔ n boe mĩ.»
Tɩ lɔɔ karẽnsãama ayɩla yele ẽ yetɩ: «Karẽnsãama, fʋ sãn tɔgra bɛla fʋ po pɔ'ɔra la tõma wuu.»

Tɩ Azezi lerge yetɩ: «Yãma lɔɔ karẽnsãandõma mẽ wʋn yẽ toogo. Se'ere n soe la, yãma n botɩ nẽrba la ɩta se'em na, ãn wʋ ze-tɩbsa tɩ ya zelgrɩ nẽrba la, la yãma mẽŋa ka boorɩ tɩ ya kalʋm ba la ya nu'ubiire.
Ya wʋn yẽ toogo. Se'ere n soe la, yãma mẽtɩ la yɔɔrɔ bɔ'ɔra Nawẽnnɛ nõtɔ'ɔsrɩba la. La yãma yaabdõma n yʋʋn kʋ ba.
La yãma n mẽtɩ sɛba tɩ ya yaabdõma kʋ la yɔɔrɔ la, la pa'alɛ tɩ ya sakɛ tɩ ban yʋʋn tõm se'em na ãn sõŋa mɛ.
Bɛla ĩyã tɩ Nawẽnnɛ n tarɩ yɛm na yʋʋn yetɩ: ‹Mam wʋn tõm nõtɔ'ɔsrɩba, la Tõntõnɩba bɔ ba, la ba wʋn kʋ basɛba, dee nãmsɛ basɛba.›
Bɛla Nawẽnnɛ wʋn sɩbgɛ zamãan-ẽna wã dõma wʋ la de la bãma n kʋ nõtɔ'ɔsrɩba la halɩ dũnia pĩ'iluŋo, wa paam lɛɛlɛ wã,
lan pɔsɛ la Abɛlɩ kʋa, halɩ wa paagɛ Azakari tɩ ba kʋ kãabgɔ bĩmbĩnne, la Nawẽnnɛ zẽ'e-sõŋɔ tẽŋasʋka la. Mam yetɩ ya la sɩra, tɩ tõon-be'ero bãma wuu taalɛ boe la zamãan-ẽna nẽrba zuo.

Yãma lɔɔ karẽnsãandõma la wʋn yẽ toogo. Se'ere n soe la, yãma n gu'uri nẽrba tɩ ba ka bãŋra Nawẽnnɛ sɩra. Yãma mẽŋa ka sakrɩ Nawẽnnɛ sɩra la, dee mẽ gu'ura nẽr-sɛba n boorɩ tɩ ba sakɛ la.»
La Azezi n ze'ele bilam fõrgɛ la, tɩ lɔɔ karẽnsãandõma la Farisi dõma sũure ba isge la ẽ. Tɩ ba bɔɔra tɩ ba bẽrɛ ẽ, sɔkra ẽ sokrɩsɩ zozo'e
bɔɔra tɩ a tɔgɛ tuuge tɩ ba yõkɛ ẽ.

Wakat-ẽŋa nẽr-kʋʋŋɔ n lagsɛ zo'oge mikra taaba, nẽera taaba nãma, tɩ Azezi dẽŋɛ yele a karẽnbiisi la yetɩ: «Guuse ya mẽŋa la Farisi dõma pʋlibsum na n ãn wʋ dãbɩllɛ n botɩ dãam wuu kɛlla la.
Bõn-sɛka woo n lile wʋn lilge, la bõn-sɛka woo n sʋgɛ wʋn puke.
Bɛla, bõn-sɛka woo tɩ ya tɔgɛ lika pʋam, ba wʋn tɔgɛ ẽ na peelem pʋam tɩ nẽrba wuu wõm, la bõn-sɛka tɩ ya waasʋm deem na, ba wʋn zom na gɔsgɔ mõolɛ tɩ nẽrba wuu wõm.»
«M sɩrdõma, mam yetɩ ya tɩ ya da zɔta dabeem la sɛba n kʋʋrɩ ĩyã mã'a, dee ka tãna wʋn ẽŋɛ sɛla pa'asɛ la.
Mam wʋn pa'alɛ ya lan masɛ tɩ ya zɔta sɛka. Zɔta-ya Nawẽnnɛ n tã wʋn kʋ, dee tara pãŋa wʋn kẽ'esɛ ya bug-tẽŋa la. Asɩra, zɔta-ya Nawẽnnɛ.
Ba ka koosrɩ mõom niinto banuu la lig-kõba bayi mã'a? La Nawẽnnɛ ka yĩnni baa ayɩla yelle.
La baa yãma zuugo zomto, Nawẽnnɛ mi ba wuu kãllɛ mɛ. Bɛla ĩyã, da zɔta-ya dabeem, tɩ yãma tarɩ yõorɔ gãnna niinto zozo'e mɛ.»
«La mam yetɩ ya tɩ nẽr-sɛka woo n ze'ele nẽrba nẽŋam yetɩ ẽŋa de la mam nẽra, mam n de Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la mẽ wʋn ze'ele Nawẽnnɛ malɛkadõma nẽŋam yetɩ a de la mam nẽra.
La nẽr-sɛka woo n sɩ'ɩsɛ nẽrba nẽŋam tɩ ẽŋa dagɩ mam nẽra, mam mẽ wʋn sɩ'ɩsɛ Nawẽnnɛ malɛkadõma nẽŋam tɩ a dagɩ mam nẽra.
La nẽr-sɛka woo n tɔgɛ Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la be'em, Nawẽnnɛ wʋn basɛ a tõon-be'ero taalɛ, la nẽr-sɛka woo n pɔ'ɔgɛ Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa, Nawẽnnɛ kãn basɛ a tõon-be'ero taalɛ.
Ba sãn yõgɛ ya sẽŋɛ ba wẽndeto pʋam, bɩɩ na'adõma nẽŋam, bɩɩ kɛ'ɛndõma nẽŋam tɩ ba di ya sarɩya, da fabla-ya yan wʋn lerge se'em, bɩɩ yan wʋn tɔgɛ se'em to'oge ya mẽŋa.
Se'ere n soe la, Nawẽnnɛ Sɩa n wʋn pa'alɛ ya wakat-ẽŋa yan wʋn tɔgɛ se'em.»
Azezi n tɔgɛ kɩ'ɩlɩm na, tɩ nẽra ayɩla n boe nẽr-kʋʋŋɔ la pʋam yele ẽ yetɩ: «Karẽnsãama, yele m kẽema tɩ a dɩkɛ tõma sɔ n ki dee bõn-sɛba la, pʋɩ bɔ ma m bõnɔ.»
Tɩ Azezi soke ẽ yetɩ: «Ãne n bɔ mam nõorɛ tɩ m dɛna ya sarɩyadita, bɩɩ m pʋta ya bõntarsõm bɔ'ɔra ya?»
Dee yele nẽrba la wuu yetɩ: «Guusra-ya ya mẽŋa, da ɛɛra bõntarsõm zozo'e, se'ere n soe la, la dagɩ nẽra n tarɩ bõntarsõm zo'oge ĩyã tɩ a tarɩ yõvore.»
A yele bɛla, dee makɛ la makrɛ bɔ ba yetɩ: «Bʋraaga n daan boe dɛna bõntarsa, tɩ a vatɔ bõnkɔɔla mãalɛ sõŋa,
tɩ a tẽ'esɛ a pʋtẽ'erʋm yetɩ: ‹Zẽ'a ka boe tɩ m wʋn sũm m bõnkɔɔla la. Bɛla ĩyã, mam wʋn ẽŋɛ la wãne?›
Yãŋa yele a mẽŋa yetɩ: ‹Mam mi mam wʋn ẽŋɛ se'em. Mam wʋn wõrɛ m bã la mɛ, malgɛ mẽ bã-kãra, sũm m bõnkɔɔla, la m sɛla woo.
Dee yele m sũurum yetɩ: M tarɩ bõntarsõm zo'oge, la wʋn seke ma paagɛ yʋʋma zozo'e. Bɛla m wʋn vo'ose mɛ di dee yũ, dee ẽŋɛ sũ-yẽlga.›
Tɩ Nawẽnnɛ yele ẽ yetɩ: ‹Gergo wã, yʋ'ʋŋ-ẽna wã m wʋn to'oge fʋ vɔm na. La ãne n wʋn sɔna bõn-sɛba tɩ fʋ bĩŋe la?› »
La Azezi le yetɩ: «La de la bɛla la nẽr-sɛka woo n lagsrɩ bõntarsõm bĩŋra a mẽŋa ĩyã, dee ka tara sɛla sɛla Nawẽnnɛ zẽ'am.»
Bɛla poorʋm, Azezi yele a karẽnbiisi la yetɩ: «Bɛla ĩyã, mam yetɩ ya tɩ ya da fabla ya vɔm yelle, ya wʋn di sɛla, bɩɩ ya wʋn yɛ fu-sɛba la yelle.
Vɔm yelle gãnnɩ dia mɛ, tɩ ĩyã yelle mẽ gãnna futo.
Bɩsɛ-ya gõorɔ, ba ka bʋtɩ, ba ka lagsrɩ bõnkɔɔla, la ba ka tarɩ bãarɛ bɩɩ dia bĩŋre zẽ'a, la Nawẽnnɛ n bɔ'ɔrɩ ba dia. La yãma ka tarɩ yõorɔ gãnna bõn-ẽgla zo'oge sɩra?
Ãne n boe ya pʋam n tã wʋn pa'asɛ a vɔm woglʋm fẽfẽe ẽn fablɩ la ĩyã?
La yãma sãn ka tãna wʋn ẽŋɛ bɛla n de bõn-pɩka, bẽm ĩyã tɩ yãma fabla bõn-sɛba n weege la yelle?
Bɩsɛ-ya mõ-puuro n ãn sõŋa se'em, ba ka tõnnɩ, ba mẽ ka wʋgrɩ futo. La mam yetɩ ya mɛ tɩ, baa naba Asalomõ na'am n yʋʋn tarɩ pãŋa la, a yʋʋn ka tã'agɛ yɛ fuugo n ãn sõŋa wʋ mõ-puugo ayɩla.
La Nawẽnnɛ sãn botɩ mõorɔ n boe zĩna dee tɩ ba wʋn yõ ba bugum beere ãna sõŋa bɛla, a kãn bɩsɛ ya yelle sõŋa gãnna bɛla mɛ bɩɩ? Bẽm tɩ yãma ka bɔ Nawẽnnɛ sɩra zo'oge?
Da basɛ-ya tɩ yan wʋn di sɛla, bɩɩ yan wʋn yũ sɛla yelle pakɛ ya.
La de la nẽr-sɛba n ka mi Nawẽnnɛ n eerɩ bõn-bãma wuu. La yãma Sɔ Nawẽnnɛ mi tɩ yãma boorɩ bõn-bãma wuu mɛ.
Ɛ-ya Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm na gãnna wuu, tɩ a wʋn bɔ ya bõn-bãma pa'asɛ.»
«M nẽrba, ya ka zo'oge, la da zɔta-ya dabeem, se'ere n soe la, la paagɛ ya Sɔ Nawẽnnɛ yɛm mɛ tɩ a yetɩ a bɔ ya a so'olʋm.

Koose-ya yãma n tarɩ sɛla la dɩkɛ ligri la bɔ nasdõma. Ya sãn ẽŋɛ bɛla, ya eerɩ la bõntarsõm n ka sã'anɩ. Ɛ-ya bõntarsõm tɩ ba bɔna Nawẽnnɛ yire wakatɛ wuu, bilam tɩ nayigba kãn tã'agɛ zũ, tɩ bõn-mõgla mẽ kãn tã'agɛ sã'am ba.
Se'ere n soe la, ya bõntarsõm n boe zẽ'a na, ya pʋtẽ'era mẽ boe la bilam.»
Azezi le yetɩ: «Mãasʋm-ya lʋ ya sagãna ya sɩɩsɩ tɩ ya wʋn tã'agɛ tõm, dee yõ ya fɩtladõma,
ãna wʋ nẽrba n gu'uri ba zuudãana n wʋn ze'ele pɔgdire kibsa wa'am, tɩ a sãn wa'am wa wi, tɩ ba yo'oge yaŋa tɔtɔ bɔ ẽ.
Tõntõn-sɛba tɩ ba zuudãana wʋn paam tɩ ba ze gu'ura ẽ, tarɩ zu-yẽlga. Mam yetɩ ya la sɩra tɩ, a wʋn basɛ tɩ ba zĩ'ire, tɩ zuudãana la mẽŋa mãasʋm wa pʋɩ ba dia.
A sãn wa'am sõnsʋa, bɩɩ bewiine, wa yẽ tɩ ba ken gu'ura ẽ, ba tarɩ zu-yẽlga.
Bãŋɛ-ya tɩ yidãana sãn mina wakat-sɛka tɩ nayiga wʋn wa zũ ẽ, a wʋn gu'ura a yire mɛ kãn basɛ tɩ nayiga la kẽ zũ ẽ.
Bɛla, yãma mẽ mãasʋm zɛ sõŋa, tɩ Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la sẽm na wakat-sɛka tɩ yãma ka tẽ'esrɩ tɩ a wʋn wa'am na.»
Tɩ Apɩyɛɛrɩ soke ẽ yetɩ: «Zuudãana, fõn makɛ makrɛ ẽna wã la tõma mã'a bɩɩ, nẽrba wuu?»
Tɩ Zuudãana Azezi lerge ẽ yetɩ: «Ãne n de tõntõn-sõŋɔ n tarɩ yɛm? La de la ẽŋa tɩ a zuudãana wʋn yetɩ a bɩsra a yire yelle, bɔ'ɔra a tõntõnɩba dia wʋ lan masɛ, dee sẽŋɛ sore.
Zuudãana la sãn leme wa yẽ tɩ tõntõnna la tõm wʋ ẽŋa n yele se'em na, tõntõnna la tarɩ zu-yẽlga.
Mam yetɩ ya la sɩra tɩ, a zuudãana la wʋn dɩkɛ ẽŋa n tarɩ sɛla la wuu bɔ ẽ mɛ tɩ a bɩsra.
La tõntõnna la sãn tẽ'esɛ yetɩ, ẽŋa zuudãana la yuuri mɛ ka kulna, yãŋa wẽ'era tõntõn-bʋraasɩ, la tõntõn-pɔgsɩ, dita, dee yũura bugra,
a zuudãana la wʋn kulum na daar-sɛka tɩ a ka tẽ'esrɩ tɩ a wʋn wa'am, la wakat-sɛka tɩ a ka mi, wa di'ige ẽ. La a wʋn dige ẽ mɛ botɩ a lagɩm na sɛba n ka bɔ ẽŋa sɩra la yẽ sɩbgrɛ.
Tõntõn-sɛka n mi a zuudãana n boorɩ se'em, dee ka mãasʋm bɩɩ ka tõm ẽn boorɩ se'em na, ba wʋn wẽ ẽ mɛ zozo'e.

La tõntõn-sɛka n ka mi a zuudãana n boorɩ se'em, dee ẽŋɛ sɛla n masɛ tɩ ba wẽ ẽ, ba wʋn wẽ ẽ na fẽe. Sɛka tɩ ba bɔ ẽ zo'oge, ba mẽ wʋn soke ẽ yɛla zozo'e yelle mɛ, la sɛka tɩ ba gu'ule ẽ zo'oge, ba mẽ wʋn soke ẽ halɩ yɛla zozo'e yelle gãnna mɛ.»
«Mam wa'am tɩ m tʋʋrɛ la bugum dũnia wã zuo, la mam boorɩ nɩ mɛ zozo'e tɩ bugum na põn darɛ dita.
La dẽnɩ tɩ mam yẽ nãmsgɔ zozo'e wʋ mam mise la ko'om pʋam na, la a yelle la wʋn nãmsɛ mam mɛ halɩ tɩ la wa ẽŋɛ ba'asɛ.
Ya tẽ'esɛ tɩ mam wa'am tɩ m botɩ nẽrba nõorɛ n dɛna ayɩla dũnia zuo bɩɩ? Ayɛɩ, mam yetɩ ya tɩ mam tarɩ la welgre wa'am.
La, lan pɔsɛ lɛɛlɛ wã wɛ'ɛsa, nẽrba banuu sãn bɔna yire ayɩla pʋam, nẽrba batã wʋn welge mɛ sisra nẽrba bayi la, tɩ nẽrba bayi la mẽ sisra nẽrba batã la.
La sɔ wʋn sise a dayʋa, tɩ dayʋa mẽ sise a sɔ. La ma wʋn sise a pɔyʋa, tɩ pɔyʋa mẽ sise a ma. La dayʋa pɔga wʋn sise a sɩra ma, tɩ sɩra ma mẽ sise a dayʋa pɔga.»
Tɩ Azezi yele nẽr-kʋʋŋɔ la yetɩ: «Ya sãn yẽ tɩ wara sobge bɔbrɛ ayẽma, ya yetɩ mɛ tɔtɔ tɩ saaga wʋn ni mɛ, tɩ a sɩrɩ ni.
La ya sãn le yẽ tɩ kʋsebgo vugri bɔbrɛ ayẽma, ya yetɩ mɛ tɩ wɔlgɔ lɛm mɛ, tɩ wɔlgɔ wʋn sɩrɩ paagɛ.
Pʋlibsum dõma wã! Yãma bɩsrɩ mɛ mina tẽŋa, la saazuum yɛla n ãn se'em. La bẽm tɩ yãma ka mina bõn-sɛba n ɩtɩ lɛɛlɛ wã võorɛ bɔkɛ?»
«Bẽm tɩ ya mẽŋa ka tẽ'esɛ bãŋɛ sɛla n masɛ tɩ ya wʋn ẽŋɛ bɔkɛ?

Fʋ sãn tara yelle la nẽra, tɩ a tarɩ fʋ wɛ'ɛsa sarɩyadia zẽ'am, mõrgɛ tɩ ya mãalɛ yelle la sore, tɩ a da dɩkɛ fʋ bɔ sarɩyadita, tɩ a tɔgɛ fʋ yetɔga la dɩkɛ fʋ bɔ gu'ura, tɩ a kẽ'esɛ fɔ yʋ'a deem.
Mam yetɩ fʋ la sɩra, tɩ fʋ kãn yẽ sore yese yʋ'a deem na, halɩ tɩ fʋ wʋn wa yɔ fʋ sãnnɛ na wuu ba'asɛ.»

La wakat-ẽŋa nẽrba basɛba n wa'am wa tɔgɛ pa'alɛ Azezi, gɔmna Apilatɩ n daan botɩ ba kʋ Galile nẽrba basɛba wakat-sɛka tɩ ba boe mĩ kãabra bɔ'ɔra Nawẽnnɛ, tɩ ba zɩɩm yese gaam na kãabgɔ la zɩɩm.
Tɩ Azezi lerge ba yetɩ: «Yãma tẽ'esɛ tɩ Galile nẽr-bãma n daan yẽ nãmsgɔ ẽŋa la, bãma n de tõon-be'ero dõma gãnna Galile dõma basɛba la bɩɩ?
Mam yetɩ ya tɩ ayɛɩ, yãma sãn ka teege yɛm basɛ tõon-be'ero, yãma wuu mẽ wʋn sã'am na bɛla.
La nẽrba pia la anii tɩ de-tʋgma yʋʋn lui kʋ ba Silo tẽŋa la, yãma tẽ'esɛ tɩ bãma n de tõon-be'ero dõma gãnna Zerizalɛm nẽrba basɛba la bɩɩ?
Mam yetɩ ya tɩ ayɛɩ, yãma sãn ka teege yɛm basɛ tõon-be'ero, yãma wuu mẽ wʋn sã'am na bɛla.»
Azezi le makɛ la makrɛ ẽna wã yetɩ: «Bʋraaga n tarɩ kẽnkãŋa n sele a va'am pʋam, yãŋa wa'am tɩ a bɩsɛ a sãn tara biɛ, ka yẽ sɛla sɛla.
Tɩ a yele va'am na gu'ura yetɩ: ‹Bɩsɛ, yʋʋma atã n wãna tɩ mam sẽnnɩ dee ka yẽta biɛ kẽnkãŋa wã zuo. Sɛ ẽ basɛ, tɩ a yẽrɛ la zẽ'a.›
Tɩ gu'ura la lerge ẽ yetɩ: ‹Zuudãana, basɛ ẽ yʋʋn-ẽna mã'a, tɩ mam wʋn kɔ gilge a tille, ẽŋɛ bugulgo basɛ ẽ,
la yʋʋnɛ sãn kaagɛ tɩ a wɔm, la ãn sõŋa, la a sãn ken ka wɔm, fʋ yãŋa sɛ ẽ basɛ.› »
Azezi daan boe la Zifdõma wẽndeem vo'osgo daarɛ zãsna nẽrba,
tɩ pɔka ayɩla bɔna mĩ tɩ kʋlkã'arga tara ẽ botɩ a dɛna kobgo paagɛ yʋʋma pia la anii, yũre ka tãna wʋn dɔ'ɔgɛ.
Tɩ Azezi yẽ pɔka la, wi ẽ yetɩ: «Pɔka, fʋ yẽ yolsgo, fʋ bã'aga la basɛ fɔ.»
Dee dɩkɛ a nu'usi paglɛ pɔka la zuo, tɩ bã'aga la basɛ pɔka la bilam mẽŋa, tɩ a tã'agɛ dɔ'ɔra, yãŋa pẽgra Nawẽnnɛ.

Tɩ wẽndeego la naba sũure isge la Azezi, ẽŋa n botɩ pɔka la yẽ ĩmã'asʋm vo'osgo daarɛ la ĩyã. Tɩ a yele nẽrba la yetɩ: «Dabsa ayoobɩ n boe tɩ ya tãna wʋn tõm. Wa'am-ya dabs-bãma pʋam wa tɩbɛ ya mẽŋa, dee da sẽnna vo'osgo daarɛ tɩbra ya mẽŋa.»
Tɩ Zuudãana Azezi lerge ẽ yetɩ: «Pʋlibsum dõma wã! Yãma nẽra woo ka lorgrɩ a lɔlga, bɩɩ a bõŋa sẽnna yũula ko'om vo'osgo daarɛ mɛ bɩɩ?
Tɩ pɔg-ẽna wã n de Abraham yɩɩŋa tɩ Asũtãana lʋ ẽ yʋʋma pia la anii wã, la ka narɩ tɩ mam lorge ẽ vo'osgo daarɛ?»
La ẽŋa n yele bɛla la, tɩ yãnnɛ yõkɛ a bɛ'ɛba la wuu, tɩ nẽr-kʋʋŋɔ la wuu sũure ẽŋɛ yẽlʋm la a tõon-yãlma sɛba wuu tɩ a ẽŋɛ la.
Tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: «Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm wõn na bẽm? La mam wʋn dɩkɛ la bẽm makɛ la ẽ?
A ãn wʋ sɔ'ɔrɔ biire tɩ nẽra bʋrɛ a va'am pʋam, tɩ a bɩ lebge tɩ-kãtɛ. Tɩ niinto sẽnna tɛ'ɛra ba tʋgrɔ a wila zuo.»
La a le yetɩ: «Mam wʋn le dɩkɛ la bẽm makɛ la Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm?
A ãn wʋ dãbɩllɛ tɩ pɔka dɩkɛ gaam na borborɩ zom la-kãra batã wẽ, tɩ dãbɩllɛ la botɩ ba wuu uke.»
Azezi daan we'esɩ la Zerizalɛm dɔla tẽn-kãra la tẽn-pɩgsɩ pʋam zãsna nẽrba.
Tɩ nẽra soke ẽ yetɩ: «Zuudãana, nẽrba fẽe mã'a n wʋn yẽ fãarɛ bɩɩ?» Tɩ a lerge ba yetɩ:
«Nargɛ-ya pãŋa doose zanõrɛ n ãn mika kẽ Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm pʋam, tɩ mam yetɩ ya mɛ tɩ nẽrba zozo'e wʋn wa ɛɛra mɛ tɩ ba kẽ, la ba kãn yãŋɛ.
La wakatɛ sãn paagɛ, yidãana wʋn isge yʋ yaŋa la mɛ, la ya sãn weege yẽŋa, ya wʋn wẽ'era mɛ kɔkɔ yetɩ: ‹Zuudãana, yo'oge tɩ tɩ kẽ.› La a wʋn lerge ya yetɩ: ‹Mam ka mi yãma n ze'ele zẽ'a.›
La ya wʋn yele ẽ yetɩ: ‹Dagɩ tõma la fõn n daan lagɩm dita, dee yũura, tɩ fʋ sẽnna tõma tẽŋam zãsna nẽrba?›
La a wʋn le lerge ya yetɩ: ‹Mam ka mi yãma n ze'ele zẽ'a, fõrgɛ ya mam zẽ'am, yãma de la tõon-be'ero dõma.›
La ya wʋn ka yẽ Abraham, la A'izakɩ, la Azakɔbɩ, la Nawẽnnɛ nõtɔ'ɔsrɩba wuu, tɩ ba boe Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm pʋam, la yãma wʋn weege la yẽŋa kɛlla dee dɩkɛ ya nu'usi gɩ nõorʋm.
La nẽrba wʋn yese dapɔ-bɔba, la zanõ-bɔba, la zʋʋgɔ bɔba, la gɔbga bɔba wa'am wa zĩ'ire Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm pʋam di.
Bãŋɛ-ya tɩ nẽrba basɛba n de poorʋm dõma wʋn lebge nẽŋam dõma, tɩ basɛba n mẽ de nẽŋam dõma wʋn wa lebge poorʋm dõma.»
La wakat-ẽŋa tɩ Farisi dõma basɛba sẽŋɛ ka yele Azezi yetɩ: «Basɛ kalam dee sẽŋɛ zẽ'a ayẽma, tɩ Naba A'erɔdɩ eerɩ fʋ mɛ tɩ a kʋ.»

Tɩ a lerge ba yetɩ: «Sẽŋɛ-ya ka yele yɛm be'ero dãana la yetɩ: ‹Zĩna la beesã, mam wʋn dige kʋlkã'arsɩ mɛ tɩ ba yese, dee botɩ bã'adõma yẽ ĩmã'asʋm, la dabsa atã daarɛ tɩ mam wʋn ba'asɛ m tõoma la wuu.›
La dẽnɩ tɩ mam sẽŋɛ m sẽnnɛ na zĩna, la beesã, la dabsa atã daarɛ, se'ere n soe la, la ka masɛ tɩ Nawẽnnɛ nõtɔ'ɔsa ki zẽ'a ayẽma, sãn dagna Zerizalɛm pʋam.

Zerizalɛm nẽrba, Zerizalɛm nẽrba, yãma kʋʋrɩ la Nawẽnnɛ nõtɔ'ɔsrɩba, dee lɔbra sɛba tɩ Nawẽnnɛ tõm ba ya zẽ'am la kuga kʋʋra. Nõorɛ faa tɩ mam boorɩ tɩ m lagsɛ ya wʋ nõ-yã'aŋa n lagsrɩ a kɔma ũna a kempagsɩ pʋam se'em na, tɩ ya ka bɔɔra.
Bɛla, Nawẽnnɛ wʋn basɛ ya tẽŋa bɔ ya, tɩ a lebge daboto. Mam yetɩ ya tɩ ya kãn le yẽ mam, halɩ tɩ ya wʋn wa yetɩ: ‹Pẽgɛ-ya sɛka n sẽm na Zuudãana Nawẽnnɛ yʋ'ʋrɛ la.› »
Vo'osgo daarɛ ayɩla tɩ Azezi daan sẽŋɛ Farisi dõma naba ayɩla yire tɩ ba di. Tɩ nẽrba la n boe mĩ na bɩsra ẽn wʋn ẽŋɛ se'em.
La bʋraaga ayɩla n boe mĩ tɩ ĩ-fʋʋsŋɔ bã'aga tara ẽ, tɩ a zɛ Azezi nẽŋam.
Tɩ Azezi soke lɔɔ karẽnsãandõma, la Farisi dõma la yetɩ: «Sore boe tɩ nẽra botɩ nẽrba yẽ ĩmã'asʋm vo'osgo daarɛ bɩɩ, sore ka boe?»
Tɩ ba sĩna. Tɩ Azezi botɩ bʋraaga la yẽ ĩmã'asʋm, basɛ ẽ tɩ a kule.
Dee soke ba yetɩ: «Ãne n boe yãma pʋam tɩ a dayʋa, bɩɩ a lɔlga wʋn lui lʋa pʋam vo'osgo daarɛ tɩ a kãn zoe tɔtɔ sẽŋɛ ka yaagɛ ẽ?»
Tɩ ba makɛ tɩ ba lerge ẽ koŋe.
Tɩ Azezi yẽ nẽr-sɛba tɩ ba wi tɩ ba wa'am wa di la n loosrɩ zẽ'e-sõma zĩ'ita, tɩ a makɛ makrɛ yele ba yetɩ:
«Nẽra sãn ẽŋɛ pɔgdire kibsa wi fo, da kãn sẽŋɛ ka zĩ'ire zẽ'e-sõŋɔ, tã tɩ a mẽ wi la nẽra n gãnnɩ fõn.
Tɩ sɛka n wi ya wuu la, da wa'am wa yele fʋ yetɩ: ‹Isge, dee tɩ ẽna zĩ'ire.› Tɩ fʋ yãŋa isge sẽŋɛ ka zĩ'ire poorʋm poorʋm la yãnnɛ.
Nẽra sãn wi fo, sẽŋɛ ka zĩ'ire poorʋm, tɩ sɛka n wi fʋ la sãn wa'am yẽ fɔ, a wʋn yetɩ: ‹M sɩrɛ, wa'am wa zĩ'ire nẽŋam.› Bɛla tɩ fʋ wʋn yẽ nã'asgɔ nẽr-sɛba tɩ fʋ zĩ la ba la zẽ'am.
Nẽr-sɛka woo n zẽkrɩ a mẽŋa, Nawẽnnɛ wʋn sike ẽ, la nẽr-sɛka n sikri a mẽŋa, Nawẽnnɛ wʋn zẽkɛ ẽ.»

La Azezi yele sɛka n wi ẽ na yetɩ: «Fʋ sãn yetɩ fʋ ẽŋɛ dia wʋntɛɛŋa, bɩɩ yʋ'ʋŋɔ wi nẽrba tɩ ba wa'am wa di, da wi'ira fʋ sɩrdõma, bɩɩ fʋ sɔbiisi, bɩɩ fʋ nẽrba, bɩɩ fʋ sawiiba n de bõntatba, se'ere n soe la, ba mẽ wʋn wa ẽŋɛ bɛla daar-sɛka mɛ wi fo lebse bɛla sãnnɛ.
Fʋ sãn yetɩ fʋ ẽŋɛ dia wi nẽrba tɩ ba wa'am di, wi nasdõma, la kɔɔrnɔ, la wɔbsɩ, la fɔɔsɩ.
Fʋ sãn ẽŋɛ bɛla, fʋ wʋn tara zu-yẽlga, se'ere n soe la, ba kãn yãŋɛ ẽŋɛ lebse fo. Bɛla, wakat-sɛka tɩ Nawẽnnɛ wʋn botɩ nẽr-sɛba n ẽŋɛ sɛla n masɛ a yɛm na vo'oge la, fʋ wʋn yẽ yɔɔrɔ.»
La nẽrba la n lagsɛ zẽa dia zẽ'a la Azezi la, ba wõm ẽn yele se'em na mɛ, tɩ nẽra ayɩla yele ẽ yetɩ: «Nẽr-sɛka woo n wʋn po di dia Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm pʋam na tarɩ zu-yẽlga.»
Tɩ Azezi makɛ makrɛ bɔ ẽ yetɩ: «Bʋraa ayɩla n daan boe, ẽŋɛ dia zozo'e, wi nẽrba zozo'e tɩ ba wa'am wa di.
Tɩ dia la wakatɛ paagɛ, tɩ a tõm a tõntõnna yetɩ, a sẽŋɛ ka yele nẽrba la tɩ ẽŋa yetɩ: ‹Wa'am-ya tɩ mam mãasʋm ba'asɛ mɛ gu'ura ya.›
Tɩ ba nẽra woo yɛta lan pakɛ ẽŋa se'em, tɩ ẽŋa sɔsra sugri. Pɔspɔsɩ dãana la yele ẽ yetɩ: ‹Mam da la va'am, tɩ m sẽŋɛ ka bɩsɛ lan ãn se'em, bɛla tɩ mam sɔsra ẽ sugri.›
Tɩ ayɩla yetɩ: ‹Mam da la nii-kɔɔrsɩ pia bɔɔra tɩ m makɛ ba bayi bayi kɔ bɩsɛ, bɛla tɩ mam sɔsra ẽ sugri.›
Tɩ ayẽma mẽ yetɩ: ‹Mam di la pɔg-sãana, bɛla tɩ mam kãn yãŋɛ wa'am.›

Tɩ tõntõnna la lebe ka tɔgɛ bɛla bɔ a zuudãana la. Tɩ a zuudãana la sũure yĩige, tɩ a yele a tõntõnna la yetɩ: ‹Yese tɔtɔ sẽŋɛ tẽŋa la sorɔɔrɔ zuto ka tarɩ nasdõma, la kɔɔrnɔ, la fɔɔsɩ, la wɔbsɩ wa'am tɩ ba di.›
Tɩ tõntõnna la sẽŋɛ ka ẽŋɛ a zuudãana la n yele se'em na, dee yele ẽ yetɩ: ‹M zuudãana, fõn yetɩ mam ẽŋɛ se'em na, mam ẽŋɛ mɛ, la zẽ'a ken dee mɛ.›
Tɩ zuudãana la le yele a tõntõnna la yetɩ: ‹Yese tẽŋa la pʋam sẽŋɛ sorɔ-pɩgsɩ la wuu zuo, ka mõrgɛ tarɩ nẽrba la wa'am tɩ ba kẽ tɩ mam yire pɩrɛ.›
La mam yetɩ yãma mɛ tɩ nẽr-sɛba tɩ mam dẽŋɛ yele ba tɩ ba wa'am, tɩ ba zagsɛ la, ba nẽra nẽra kãn le malɩn di mam dia la.»
Azezi daan sẽnnɩ mɛ, tɩ nẽr-kʋʋŋɔ dɔla ẽ, tɩ a gelge yele ba yetɩ:
«Nẽra sãn yetɩ a doose mam dee ka nõŋɛ mam gãnna a sɔ, la a ma, la a pɔga, la a kɔma, la a sɔbiisi, la a tãpa, bɩɩ a sãn ka nõŋɛ mam gãnna a mẽŋa vɔm, a kãn tã'agɛ dɛna mam karẽnbia.
La sɛka woo n ka sakɛ nãmsgɔ wʋ nẽra n zɛɛrɩ a kũm dɔ-puurŋa dɔla mam, a kãn tã'agɛ dɛna mam karẽnbia.
Ya mi tɩ nẽra sãn bɔna ya pʋam bɔɔra tɩ a mẽ de-tʋgma, a wʋn dẽŋɛ zĩ'ire mɛ geele bɩsɛ, ẽn tarɩ se'em na wʋn seke tɩ a yãŋɛ mẽ ba'asɛ, bɩɩ la kãn seke?
La sãn dagna bɛla, a sãn ẽebɛ ẽbrɛ dee ka yãŋɛ mẽ ba'asɛ, sɛba wuu n yẽ bɛla la wʋn la ẽ mɛ
yetɩ: ‹Nẽr-ẽna ẽebɛ la deego, dee ka yãŋɛ mẽ ba'asɛ.›
Bɩɩ naba sãn wɛ'ɛsa tɩ a zɛbɛ la a na-tadãana, dẽnɩ tɩ a dẽŋɛ tẽ'esɛ bɩsɛ, ẽŋa n tarɩ nẽrba tʋspia la, a wʋn tã'agɛ zɛbɛ la na-sɛka n tarɩ nẽrba tʋspisyi, bɩɩ a kãn tã'agɛ?
La a sãn bãŋɛ tɩ a kãn tã'agɛ, naba ayẽma la n ken zãagɛ la, a wʋn dẽŋɛ tõm na a tõntõnɩba tɩ ba sẽŋɛ naba la zẽ'am ka soke ẽ bɩsɛ, bãma wʋn ẽŋɛ la wãne tɩ zɛbrɛ la ba'asɛ.
Bɛla mẽ, yãma nẽr-sɛka woo n ka basrɩ bõn-sɛba wuu tɩ a tarɩ la, ka tã wʋn dɛna mam karẽnbia.
Yaarʋm ãn sõŋa mɛ, la a sãn sabgɛ, ba wʋn ẽŋɛ la wãne botɩ a le ãna yẽlʋm?
A ka le tara yõorɔ la tẽŋa, la a ka tã wʋn dɛna bugulgo mẽ, ba lobrɩ ẽ basra mɛ. Sɛka n wõm yetɔga wã, a selse sõŋa sõŋa.»
Lampo-tɔ'ɔsrɩba, la tõon-be'ero dõma zozo'e n daan sẽŋɛ Azezi zẽ'am tɩ ba selse a yetɔga.
Tɩ Farisi dõma, la lɔɔ karẽnsãandõma la yõnna yetɩ: «Bʋra-ẽna wã to'orɩ la tõon-be'ero dõma, dee dita la ba.»
Tɩ Azezi makɛ makrɛ wã soke ba yetɩ:
«Bʋra-kãna n boe ya pʋam tara piisi kɔbga, tɩ ayɩla sãn bɔɩ, tɩ a kãn lagsɛ piisi piswɛɩ la awɛɩ la basɛ dũnsẽkam, dee sẽŋɛ ka ɛ ayẽma n bɔɩ la halɩ yãŋa yẽ ẽ?
La a sãn yẽ ẽ, a wʋn yõkɛ ẽ mɛ buke la sũ-yẽlga.
La a sãn kule yire, a wʋn wi a sɩrdõma, la a sawiiba mɛ yele ba yetɩ: ‹Naagɛ-ya la mam tɩ tɩ ẽŋɛ sũ-yẽlga, se'ere n soe la, mam yẽ m pesgo la n bɔɩ la mɛ.›
Bɛla mam yetɩ ya tɩ tõon-be'ero dãana ayɩla sãn teege yɛm basɛ tõon-be'ero, sũ-yẽlga boe Nawẽnnɛ yire pʋam la bɛla gãnna nẽr-sõma piswɛɩ la awɛɩ n ka eerɩ tɩ ba teege yɛm.
Bɩɩ, pɔg-kãna n boe wʋn tara lig-kõba pia, tɩ ayɩla sãn bɔɩ, tɩ a kãn yõ fɩtla pɩɩsɛ deego la ɛ lagfɔ la sõŋa halɩ wa yẽ ẽ?
La a sãn yẽ ẽ, a wʋn wi a sɩrdõma, la a sawiiba mɛ yele ba yetɩ: ‹Naagɛ-ya la mam tɩ tɩ ẽŋɛ sũ-yẽlga, se'ere n soe la, mam yẽ m lagfɔ la n bɔɩ la mɛ.›
Bɛla mam yetɩ ya tɩ tõon-be'ero dãana ayɩla sãn teege yɛm basɛ tõon-be'ero, sũ-yẽlga boe Nawẽnnɛ malɛkadõma zẽ'am na bɛla.»
Tɩ Azezi le yele ba yetɩ: «Bʋraa n daan boe tara a dayɔɔsɩ bayi.
Tɩ yɩbga la yele a sɔ yetɩ: ‹M sɔ, pʋɩ fʋ bõntarsõm na bɔ mam m bõnɔ.› Tɩ a sɔ pʋɩ a bõntarsõm na bɔ ba.
Tɩ la ẽŋɛ dabsa fẽe, tɩ yɩbga la lagsɛ a bõntarsõm na wuu yese sẽŋɛ tẽŋa n zãagɛ, ka tõm tõon-yooro sã'am ẽn tarɩ sɛla la wuu.
La ẽn sã'am a bõntarsõm na wuu ba'asɛ la, kɔm kãtɛ n wa'am tẽŋa la pʋam, tɩ a ka le tara sɛla wʋn di.
Tɩ a sẽŋɛ tẽŋa la nẽra ayɩla zẽ'am tɩ a dɩkɛ ẽ tɩ a tõnna. Tɩ nẽra la dɩkɛ ẽ botɩ a sẽŋɛ mõom ka gu'ura a kurkurdõma.
Tɩ a kɔm dõnna tɩ a bɔɔra tɩ a di kurkuri dia. Tɩ nẽra nẽra ka bɔ ẽ.
Tɩ a tẽ'esɛ a sũurum yetɩ: ‹Mam sɔ tarɩ tõntõnɩba zo'oge mɛ tɩ ba dita tɩgra dee basra, dee tɩ mam bɔna kalam kiira la kɔm.›
Yãŋa yetɩ: ‹Mam wʋn lebe kule la m sɔ yire ka yele ẽ yetɩ, mam tõm na Nawẽnnɛ la fõn be'em,
mam ka le masɛ tɩ ba wi mam tɩ fʋ bia. Ɩta mam wʋ fʋ tõntõnɩba la ayɩla.›
Dee isge kulla a sɔ yire. La ẽn nãn boe zãazãarɛ la, tɩ a sɔ la yẽ ẽ, tɩ a ninbãalga yõkɛ ẽ, tɩ a zoe tʋ'ʋsɛ kɔkɛ ẽ, mõbgɛ ẽ.
Tɩ bia la yele ẽ yetɩ: ‹M sɔ, mam tõm na Nawẽnnɛ la fõn be'em. Mam ka masɛ tɩ ba le wi'ira mam tɩ fʋ bia.›
Tɩ a sɔ la yele a tõntõnɩba yetɩ: ‹Sẽŋɛ-ya tɔtɔ ka tarɩ fu-sɛka n ãn sõŋa gãnna la wa'am wa yɛ ẽ, dee dɩkɛ nutʋa pire a nu'ubiire, dee dɩkɛ tagra pire ẽ.
La ya yõkɛ lɔl-polle n nõbɛ wa'am wa kʋ tɩ tɩ ẽŋɛ dia di, dee ẽŋɛ sũ-yẽlga.
Se'ere n soe la, mam bia wã daan wõn na a ki mɛ, dee le vo'oge. A daan bɔɩ mɛ, tɩ tɩ le yẽ ẽ.› Tɩ ba yãŋa ɩta sũ-yẽlga.
Wakat-ẽŋa tɩ a dayɔ-kẽema la boe la va'am. La ẽn lebe kulna wa lɛm yire la, a wõm na duursi tɩ ba wẽ'erɩ wa'ara.
Tɩ a wi a sɔ tõntõnna ayɩla soke ẽ yetɩ: ‹Bẽm n ẽŋɛ?›
Tɩ tõntõnna la lerge ẽ yetɩ: ‹Fʋ yɩbga la n wa'am, tɩ fʋ sɔ kʋ lɔl-polle n nõbɛ, ẽŋa n yẽ fʋ yɩbga la tɩ a tarɩ ĩmã'asʋm na ĩyã.›
Tɩ kẽema la sũure yĩige halɩ. Tɩ a zagsɛ tɩ ẽŋa kãn kẽ yire. Tɩ a sɔ yese belem ẽ yetɩ, a wa'am wa kẽ.
Tɩ a lerge a sɔ la yetɩ: ‹Bɩsɛ, yʋʋma zozo'e tɩ mam tõnnɩ fʋ tõoma, dee ka zagsɛ fʋ nõorɛ baa daarɛ ayɩla, la fõn ka bɔ mam bulla baa daarɛ ayɩla tɩ m kʋ tɩ mam la m sɩrdõma ẽŋɛ sũ-yẽlga.
La fʋ bi-ẽna wã n dɩkɛ fʋ bõntarsõm sẽŋɛ ka tõm yalsɩ tõoma sã'am ba wuu dee kulum wã, fʋ kʋ la lɔl-polle bɔ ẽ.›
Tɩ a sɔ lerge ẽ yetɩ: ‹M bia, fõn boe la mam zẽ'am daarɛ woo. La mam n tarɩ sɛla wuu la de la fõn bõnɔ.
La, la masɛ mɛ tɩ tɩ ẽŋɛ sũ-yẽlga sɩrʋm, se'ere n soe la, fʋ yɩbga wã daan wõn na a ki mɛ, dee le vo'oge. A daan bɔɩ mɛ. Tɩ tɩ le yẽ ẽ.› »
Tɩ Azezi le yele a karẽnbiisi la yetɩ: «Bʋraaga n daan boe dɛna bõntarsa, tara tõntõnna tɩ a bɩsra a yire yelle. Tɩ ba wa'am wa yele bõntarsa la yetɩ, tõntõnna la sã'anɩ a bõntarsõm na mɛ.
Tɩ zuudãana la wi a tõntõnna la yetɩ: ‹Bẽm tɩ ba tɔgra fõn yelle tɩ mam wõnna wãna? Geele pa'alɛ ma fõn ẽŋɛ mam bõntarsõm na se'em. Fʋ kãn le bɩsra mam yire yelle.›
Tɩ tõntõnna la yele a mẽŋa yetɩ: ‹Mam zuudãana la yetɩ a dige mam a tõoma la pʋam mɛ, mam wʋn ẽŋɛ la wãne? Kʋa? Mam ka tarɩ pãŋa wʋn kɔ. La yãnnɛ n wʋn tara mam la sosgo.
Mam mi mam wʋn ẽŋɛ se'em, tɩ a sãn wa dige ma, m tara sɩrdõma n wʋn to'oge mam ba yiɛ sõŋa.›
Tɩ a wi a zuudãana sãnditba ayɩla ayɩla, soke pɔspɔsɩ dãana la yetɩ: ‹Fõn tarɩ mam zuudãana sãnnɛ la wãne?›
Tɩ a lerge yetɩ: ‹Mam tarɩ a sãnnɛ na kaam dugl-kãra kɔbga.› Tɩ a yele ẽ yetɩ: ‹To'oge fʋ sãnnɛ gõŋɔ tɔtɔ zĩ'ire gʋlsɛ yetɩ, kaam dugl-kãra pinuu.›
Dee soke ayẽma yetɩ: ‹Fõn tarɩ mam zuudãana sãnnɛ na wãne?› Tɩ a lerge yetɩ: ‹Mam tarɩ a sãnnɛ na mui bɔra kɔbga.› Tɩ a yele ẽ yetɩ: ‹To'oge fʋ sãnnɛ gõŋɔ gʋlsɛ yetɩ pinii.›
Baa la tõntõnna wã ɩrgɔ n ka doose sore la, a zuudãana pẽgɛ ẽ mɛ, ẽn tõm na yɛm na ĩyã. Dũni-ẽna wã dõma tarɩ la yɛm tõnna la taaba gãnna nẽr-sɛba n bãŋɛ Nawẽnnɛ peelem.
Bɛla ĩyã, mam yetɩ ya tɩ ya dɩkɛ dũnia bõntarsõm yõgɛ sɩrdõma, tɩ dũnia bõntarsõm na sãn wa ba'asɛ, ba wʋn to'oge ya tɩ ya bɔna Nawẽnnɛ yire wakatɛ n ka ba'asrɩ.»
«Nẽr-sɛka woo n de sɩra dãana bõn-pɩgsɩ pʋam, mẽ de la sɩra dãana bõn-kãra pʋam. La sɛka n ka de sɩra dãana bõn-pɩgsɩ pʋam, mẽ ka de sɩra dãana bõn-kãra pʋam.
Bɛla, ya sãn ka dɛna sɩra dõma dũnia wã bõntarsõm pʋam, ãne n wʋn dɩkɛ bõntarsõm sɩra sɩra gu'ule ya?
La ya sãn ka dɛna sɩra dõma la bõn-sɛba n dagɩ ya mẽŋa bõnɔ, ãne n wʋn dɩkɛ bõnɔ bɔ ya tɩ la dɛna ya mẽŋa bõnɔ?

Tõntõnna ka tã wʋn sakɛ zuudãandõma bayi. A wʋn sise ayɩla mɛ, dee nõŋɛ ayɩla, bɩɩ a wʋn nanna ayɩla la mɛ, dee pɔ'ɔra ayɩla la. Bɛla, yãma ka tã wʋn sakɛ Nawẽnnɛ n de ya Zuudãana, dee botɩ bõntarsõm mẽ dɛna ya zuudãana.»
Farisi dõma n nõŋɛ ligri la n wõm bɛla la, ba la'arɩ Azezi mɛ.
Tɩ Azezi yele ba yetɩ: «Yãma pa'alɩ ya mẽŋa nẽrba nẽŋam wʋ ya de la nẽr-sõma. La Nawẽnnɛ mi ya pʋtẽ'era n ãn se'em mɛ. Bõn-sɛka tɩ nẽrsaalba pẽgrɩ la, de la bõn-dẽgrɔ Nawẽnnɛ zẽ'am.

Amoyisi lɔɔ, la Nawẽnnɛ nõtɔ'ɔsrɩba n yʋʋn pa'alɩ nẽrba ban wʋn ãna se'em, ka paagɛ wakat-sɛka tɩ Azã wa'am na. Lan pɔsɛ Azã n misri nẽrba ko'om pʋam na, ba mõolɛ Nawẽnnɛ so'olʋm kõ-yẽlga mɛ, tɩ nẽra woo nargra pãŋa tɩ a kẽ.
La, la de la nãana tɩ saazuum la dũnia tole gãnna tɩ Nawẽnnɛ lɔɔ la bõn-pɩka ayɩla bɔɩ.
Nẽr-sɛka woo n basɛ a pɔga, dee le di pɔka ayẽma, a ẽŋɛ la be'em wʋ nẽra n gã'arɩ la a tadãana pɔga, la sɛka woo n di pɔka tɩ a sɩra basɛ mẽ ẽŋɛ la be'em.»
Tɩ Azezi yetɩ: «Bõntarsa n daan boe, yɛɛra futo n ba ãna sõŋa, dee tara sɛla woo daarɛ woo tɩ la seke.
Tɩ nasa ayɩla mẽ daan bɔna, tɩ a yʋ'ʋrɛ dɛna Alazaarɩ, tɩ a ĩyã wuu tara nõtɔ. A daan ẽn gã la bõntarsa la zanõrʋm,
bɔɔra tɩ a di bõntarsa la n diti tɩ di-zõra luta la. Tɩ baasɩ sẽnna lɛɛla a nõtɔ la.
Tɩ Alazaarɩ wa ki. Tɩ Nawẽnnɛ malɛkadõma tarɩ ẽ sẽŋɛ Nawẽnnɛ yire Abraham zẽ'am. Tɩ bõntarsa la mẽ wa ki, tɩ ba laagɛ ẽ.
Tɩ bõntarsa la daan bɔna bug-tẽŋa nãmsra, yãŋa gorge yẽ Abraham halɩ zẽ'a n zãagɛ, tɩ Alazaarɩ zẽa a sakʋkɔ.
Tɩ bõntarsa la wi Abraham yetɩ: ‹M sɔ Abraham, zoe m ninbãalga, dee tõm Alazaarɩ tɩ a dɩkɛ a nu'ubiire tẽ'egɛ ko'om mã'alɛ m zɩlɩŋa, se'ere n soe la, mam boe la bugum pʋam nãmsra.›

Tɩ Abraham yele ẽ yetɩ: ‹M bia, tẽegɛ tɩ fõn daan boe dũnia zuo wakat-sɛka la, fõn daan tarɩ bõn-sõma mɛ, dee tɩ Alazaarɩ yẽta toogo. La lɛɛlɛ wã, a sũure mã'agɛ mɛ, dee tɩ fõn yãŋa nãmsra.

La bõn-sɛka n pa'asɛ, bog-ko'ogo n beŋe tõma la yãma, tɩ nẽra sãn bɔɔra tɩ a ze'ele kalam sẽŋɛ yãma zẽ'am, a kãn tã'agɛ. La nẽra mẽ sãn bɔɔra tɩ a ze'ele yãma zẽ'am wa'am tõma zẽ'am, a kãn tã'agɛ.›
Tɩ a lerge Abraham yetɩ: ‹M sɔ Abraham, la sãn dɛna bɛla, mam sosrɩ fʋ mɛ tɩ fʋ tõm Alazaarɩ tɩ a sẽŋɛ mam sɔ yire,
tɩ mam tarɩ la sɔbiisi banuu, a sẽŋɛ ka kã'an ba, tɩ ba mẽ da wa'am nãmsgɔ zẽ'a wã.›
Tɩ Abraham yele ẽ yetɩ: ‹Ba tarɩ Amoyisi la Nawẽnnɛ nõtɔ'ɔsrɩba n gʋlsɛ gõn-sɛba la mɛ. La masɛ tɩ ba sakɛ la gõn-bãma yetɔga.›
Tɩ a lerge ẽ yetɩ: ‹M sɔ, ayɛɩ, nẽra sãn vo'oge lebe sẽŋɛ ba zẽ'am, ba wʋn teege yɛm basɛ tõon-be'ero.›
Tɩ Abraham lerge ẽ yetɩ: ‹Ba sãn kãn sakɛ Amoyisi, la Nawẽnnɛ nõtɔ'ɔsrɩba la nõorɛ, baa nẽra n ki sãn vo'oge lebe, ba kãn sakɛ.› »
Tɩ Azezi yele a karẽnbiisi la yetɩ: «La ka tã tɩ bõn-sɛba n pã'asrɩ nẽrba tɩ ba basra Nawẽnnɛ sore la ka wa'am. La nẽr-sɛka n wʋn botɩ bõn-bãma wa'am na wʋn yẽ toogo.
Ba sãn dɩkɛ nẽerɛ kug-kãtɛ lʋ yulse a yugla lobe ẽ basɛ ko-kãtɛ pʋam, n sõɩ ẽŋa n wʋn botɩ bi-pɩka ayɩla basɛ Nawẽnnɛ sore.
Guuse-ya ya mẽŋa.
Fʋ sɔbia sãn tõm be'em, fʋ kã'an ẽ. La a sãn teege yɛm basɛ tõon-be'ero la, fʋ basɛ ẽ taalɛ.
La a sãn ẽŋɛ fʋ be'em nõorɛ ayopɔɩ daarɛ ayɩla, dee leme fʋ zẽ'am nõorɛ ayopɔɩ wa yetɩ: ‹Mam tõm na be'em, bɔ mam sugri›, dẽnɩ tɩ fʋ basɛ ẽ taalɛ.»
Tɩ Zuudãana Azezi karẽnbiisi pia la ayi la yele ẽ yetɩ: «Botɩ tɩ bɔ fɔ sɩra zo'oge.»
Tɩ Zuudãana la yele ba yetɩ: «Ya sãn bɔ mam sɩra fẽe wʋ sɔ'ɔrɔ biire la, ya tã wʋn yele kẽnkãŋa wã tɩ a võogɛ sẽŋɛ ka sele mõgrɛ pʋam ke, la a wʋn sakɛ ya nõorɛ mɛ.»
«Tẽ'esɛ-ya bɩsɛ, nẽra sãn bɔna yãma pʋam tara tõntõnna tɩ a kɔɔra, bɩɩ gu'ura a dũnsi, tɩ tõntõnna la sãn ze'ele va'am wa'am, a wʋn yele ẽ mɛ yetɩ, wa'am wa di bɩɩ?
Ayɛɩ, a wʋn yele ẽ yetɩ: ‹Dʋgɛ m dia, dee teege fuugo yɛ, tarɩ dia la wa'am wa bɔ ma tɩ m di. M sãn di dee yũ ba'asɛ, tɩ fʋ mẽ yãŋa di dee yũ.›
La zuudãana la n yele tõntõnna la tɩ a ẽŋɛ se'em, tɩ a ẽŋɛ la, zuudãana la kãn pʋ'ʋsɛ ẽ.
Bɛla mẽ, ya sãn ẽŋɛ sɛla woo tɩ Nawẽnnɛ yele ya tɩ ya ẽŋɛ la, ya yetɩ: ‹Tõma wen dɛna la tõntõnɩba, tõma ka narɩ pʋ'ʋsgɔ, se'ere n soe la, la de la tɩ tõoma, la masɛ mɛ tɩ tɩ tõm.› »
Azezi daan boe la sore wɛ'ɛsa Zerizalɛm dɔla Samaari la Galile tẽŋasʋka,
paagɛ tẽŋa ayɩla pʋam, tɩ kõnkɔma pia tʋ'ʋsra ẽ, ze'ele kẽnkɛrŋa
kaasra yetɩ: «Zuudãana Azezi, zoe tɩ ninbãalga.»
La ẽn yẽ ba la, tɩ a yele ba yetɩ: «Sẽŋɛ-ya kãabgɔ kẽma la zẽ'am tɩ ba ka bɩsɛ ya ĩyã la n ãn se'em.» La ban sẽnnɩ wɛ'ɛsa la, tɩ bã'asɩ la basɛ ba, tɩ ba ãna sõŋa.
La ba nẽra ayɩla n yẽ tɩ a kõnkɔm na basɛ ẽ na, tɩ a lɛbra Azezi zẽ'am dee tɔgra ke'enke'em pẽgra Nawẽnnɛ,
sẽŋɛ ka ka dũma dɩkɛ a nẽŋa võglɛ tẽŋa Azezi nẽŋam pʋ'ʋsɛ ẽ. A daan de la Samaari nẽra.
Tɩ Azezi yetɩ: «La dagɩ bãma pia n yẽ ĩmã'asʋm? Tɩ bawɛɩ la bɔna la bɛ?
Bẽm tɩ ẽna n de sãana la mã'a n leme wa'am tɩ a pʋ'ʋsɛ Nawẽnnɛ a yel-sõnnɛ?»
Dee yele ẽ yetɩ: «Fõn bɔ mam sɩra la n botɩ fʋ yẽ fãarɛ, isge sẽŋɛ.»
Farisi dõma soke Azezi mɛ tɩ ba bãŋɛ wakat-sɛka tɩ Nawẽnnɛ wʋn di na'am nẽrba sʋkam. Tɩ a lerge ba yetɩ: «Nawẽnnɛ sãn wa dita na'am, la ka de sɛla tɩ nẽrba tã wʋn yẽ la nini.
La nẽra kãn yetɩ: ‹Bɩsɛ-ya, a boe la kalam›, bɩɩ ‹a boe la ke›. Bãŋɛ-ya tɩ Nawẽnnɛ boe la ya tẽŋasʋka dita na'am.»
La Azezi yele a karẽnbiisi la yetɩ: «Wakatɛ sẽm mɛ tɩ ya wʋn bɔɔra tɩ ya yẽ Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la, baa la sãn dɛna daarɛ ayɩla, la ya kãn yẽ ẽ.
La nẽrba wʋn yele ya yetɩ: ‹Bɩsɛ-ya, a boe la ke›, bɩɩ ‹bɩsɛ-ya, a boe la kalam.› Da kãn sẽŋɛ-ya, da doose-ya ba.
Se'ere n soe la, daar-sɛka tɩ Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la wʋn leme na, la wʋn ãna wʋ saaga n ẽn yãkɛ saazuum tɩ la nẽegɛ zẽ'a wuu se'em na.
La, lan dẽŋɛ tɩ bõn-bãma wʋn ẽŋɛ, dẽnɩ tɩ a nãmsɛ zozo'e tɩ zamãan-ẽna wã dõma zagsɛ ẽ.
Wakat-sɛka tɩ Nẽrsaala Dayʋa la wʋn leme wa'am na, la wʋn ãna wʋ Anoe wakatɛ tɩ la yʋʋn ãn se'em na.
